Best !. We had an excellent time in Istanbul thanks to Turkland Tours and our guide Esin Yasar .She was absolutely wonderful - very knowledgeable, professional. We were a family of 4 and she was so great with our kids. She kept them engaged and interested and did everything she could to accommodate our needs. We also used them to book our tour in Cappadocia - Ephesus it was excellent as well. Ibrahim who arranged everything was prompt and professional. We will definitely return to Turkey one day and we would definitely make plans with Turkland Tours again. They are outstanding in every way!

Would never have appreciated Istanbul without it!. We booked the one-day tour of Istanbul. Our guide, Ahmed, was a fountain of knowledge. He came right to our hotel and every step of the way he spoke and enlightened us as to what we were seeing: Hagia Sofia, The Blue Mosque, etc. He gave us great tips on shopping in the Bazaar and we never felt like we weren't the centre of his attention. He was professional and polite, and I cannot understand how anyone would visit Istanbul without a guide like him. You would miss so much without him. Thank you Turkland Tours!

Ephesus. I took day tour from Istanbul . Car picked me up at 6 am for 7 30 flight and from then on everything was handled well from transportation as well as tour. My tour guide was Ms Meral who was very knowledgeable and charming explaining the historical significance of each part of the site . There were 15 people in the tour of all nations and we got on well . Food was fine . We had obligatory stop at carpet factory which was more interesting than I expected as was optional visit to leather factory including fashion show. Dress for very hot weather as well as fair bit of walking .

Amazing Tour. Very very happy with Turkland Tours. They made my trip unforgettable. They literally take care of everything. Airport transfers, drivers, great meals. Not to mention the incredibly knowledgable and professional guides who were assigned to me. Each day can be molded to your needs so that you get to do everything you want. Turkland Tours bend over backwards to ensure that you leave Turkey happy and fulfilled. Ibrahim was friendly and offered a personal touch, checking in regularly to make sure everything was going ok. This company is the real deal. I would highly recommend them. 5 big stars.
Sophisticated!!!. Turkland travel has very professional guides and the best quality of services. We had an amazing holiday with this company. Thanks Ozden and Ibrahim.

Tour of Istanbul. We took a tour of Istanbul with Turkland Tours during our trip in July. Ozden helped organize all the logistics and Esra was our tour guide. The tour was very well done and Esra was very knowledgeable. She did a great job catering to our small children (ages 11 and 6) and making it very enjoyable for them. We would definitely recommend using Turkland!

Despite being a holiday, we saw so much.. Today I did a day tour. Despite many attractions being closed our guide Mehmet ensured we saw lots of interesting things. He was funny, informative and a great guide. Hasan at turkland travel was a great help in organising & booking the tours. I will use them again next time for sure!

This tour was incredibly informative and amazing all round.. Our tour guide allowed us to experience Istanbul in a way that no one else could, we were given incredibly informative and interesting knowledge beyond what I expected. I recommend to anyone going to Istanbul it is an absolute MUST!!!

Thumbs up for Turkland Travel. We were recommended Turkland Travel by our friends. We are well travelled and don't normally rely on a travel guide but we were so glad we took their advice. Ozden and his staff ensured that our brief time in Istanbul was both memorable and action packed. He shared with us not only his local knowledge but his favourite non touristy eating spots...[My favourite being the cheap and cheerful meatball joint on the way back from Gallipoli.]When you visit a city of 17million it can be somewhat overwhelming, what to see, what not to see. Ozden personally guided us to all of the highlights and even checked on us on his day off. I'm not a regular trip advisor feedback writer but if yore lucky enough to be going to Istabanbul you'd be crazy not to look these guys up.

Turkish Delight. Ozden Bazak at Turkland Tours made our trip to Turkey a delight. A colleague at work recommended Ozden. We made contact in the spring to arrange a trip to Turkey in the summer. We are typically the type of travelers who make our own arrangements. This time, however, we put ourselves completely in Ozden's hands. From airport pick-up in Istanbul, to guided tours in the city, Ephesus, and Cappadocia, hotels, restaurants, shopping--even a Hamam recommendation--Ozden took care of absolutely everything for us. Ozden is as knowledgeable and entertaining a tour guide as he is a skillful travel agent. We were treated like part of the family. We will definitely be back and when we return, we'll be calling Turkland Tours to make all our arrangements.

A trusted friend & local expert. My wife & I had used Turkland previously & had a wonderful experience.My 20yo daughter & 5 friends are traveling in Europe & wanted to visit Istanbul. A little uncertain they sought out Turkland who escorted them through the amazing city.As a dad back home it was comforting to know the amazing team at Turkland were in control.

The Highlight of Our Cruise. As I reflect on my Celebrity cruise two years ago this month, I can truly say that Turkland Tours made Turkey the highlight of our ten days in Europe. Every detail was perfect both in Istanbul and in Ephesus. I have repeatedly thanked owner Ozden Bazak but am finally posting a review so that other will know of his genuine hospitality and first rate service. We were treated like visiting family and I look forward to a return visit.

Perfection. I cannot speak highly enough of Turkland. My husband and I visited Istanbul as one of the stops on our honeymoon and the bar was set so high by Turkland that the rest of the trip paled in comparison. Ozden was an absolute delight to work with. I got sick on the plane ride over and had to sit out the tour we had scheduled for later that day. Luckily, our beyond lovely guide Esra stepped in and saved the day. She was able to adjust our schedule so that I did not miss a single thing that I was looking forward to, all while making the most of the time I missed by taking my husband out to see some additional sites. When I started to feel better Ozden even offered to come pick me up so I could join them. You'll notice that most of these reviews state that Turkland's guests leave feeling like family and that could not be more true. We had two different guides over our 3 days and both were wonderful, and we had the pleasure of spending time with Ozden as well. I know we saw more of the non-touristy side of Istanbul than we ever would have had we booked elsewhere and I could not have asked for a better experience than we have. We even recommended Turkland to others as we traveled Europe, knowing we were giving them the advantage of having the best guides (and friends) that there are. We will be going back to Turkey in the future solely because of the experience we had with Turkland, Ozden and Esra.

Turkland Tours - Astonishing Istanbul - How come it took us so long to discover this magical place?. It is my pleasure to comment on our tour guide, Esin from Turkland Tours who escorted us on our full day tour of Istanbul. She was amazing! We really enjoyed our time with her. She was prompt, courteous, informative, knowledgeable & very accommodating. She also spoke fluent Japanese which I do too & we conversed a little in that as well!The tour was a perfect introduction to Istanbul although it was quite overwhelming, there was such a lot to take in & understand. We loved our time in Turkey, though all too brief. We especially loved Istanbul & would recommend your company & Esin particularly at any time.Thank you for providing us with a very special introduction to your magnificent history & wonderful people. We loved it very much & will return.

Turkland Travel- Simply Perfect. What else is there to say other than if you go with any other tour company or tour guide you have made a big mistake! Ozdan, Esra and Turkland travel sure know how to give a one of a kind travel experience. They took our honeymoon and turned it into a magical experience that could not be compared. If you are looking for average, Turkland is not for you- If you are looking for the best turkey experience one could possibly ask for i suggest you put down your guide book and get on google and find Turkland! I guarantee your experience will be nothing short of AMAZING. My wife and I travel often. We recently took a 3 week honeymoon to 6 different countries with istanbul being our first stop. Our experience was perfect and one-of-a-kind that our guides in all other countries could not compare to the level of joy and excitement we had with Turkland.I can assure all readers of this post that i will be back in istanbul to visit my new FAMILY! ( because that is how we felt every step of the way)First class company, first class tour guide and first class experience!

Ozden Basak and Turkland Tours are the best!. I just returned from Istanbul with my twin sister and a girlfriend and cannot speak highly enough of Ozden of Turkland Tours. Before we even arrived Ozden's patience and humour were evident as the three of us travellers went back and forth with Ozden over email to finalise dates and our seemingly ever-changing plans :-).My sister had never been to Turkey and Ozden advised that Cappadocia is a must-do and see. Ozden arranged everything-- our flights from Istanbul and back, tours, a most amazing cave hotel (MDC) and a sunrise hot air balloon experience. We expected to be just 3 of many on a Cappadocia tour but oh, were we wrong! Ozden arranged a private (PRIVATE!) tour with a wonderful tour guide named Mustafa. We spent two days with knowledgeable, sincere, and lovely Mustafa, and two nights basking in the moonlight at the hotel. But its what's not advertised that makes Turkland and Ozden stand out in a saturated market.My sister had fallen ill on the plane on the way to Istanbul from the States. When we arrived, Ozden was immediately prepared to take her to the doctor, and inquired repeatedly about her well-being. We had Ozden's cell phone numbers in case she worsened and were instructed to call day or night. It was my sister's first trip overseas and she felt so safe and well-cared for, as we all did.We were in Istanbul not just to see the most amazing sights, but to do family research as our father was born there. Ozden and his team made calls for us and helped us every step of the way. Ozden even got us an appointment with the Director of Research at the Ottoman Bank Archives! He then accompanied us!!! Ozden's associate Berkay called a cemetery and my Baba's (father's) high school, and offered to accompany us to a church in a neighbourhood by the airport (Yesilkoy). Even now that we are back home Ozden and the good folks of Turkland Tours continue to help, offering to pick up and translate documents, and checking in on my sister.Ozden is a gem and incredibly funny! If I could give 10 stars to Turkland Tours I would. Turkland is our go-to agency and Ozden is our go-to guide.

The true tour guide!. If you have been to Özden's Oriental Hostel and enjoyed it, then Turkland Tours is just as amazing. Spent 10 days in Istanbul with my family and we used his tourist guide agency to explore the vast culture that the city has to offer. Even with all places that Özden and his other lovely guide, Emrecan, showed us, we only scratched the surface. I hope to return soon and continue from where I left off! thanks for the best guide service!

Customized Tour. Ozden Basak was our English speaking tour guide. He did our customized walking tour that enabled us to cover a lot of the main attractions in Turkey in one day. The Seven Seas restaurant he recommended was outstanding, delicious seafood. We also had time to visit a carpet making demonstration. He is fun, good sense of humor and with him miss the long lines at attractions.

Amazing tours!!. I just got back from an amazing trip to Turkey thanks to Ozden and Turkland Tours. Ozden arranged everything before I left home to exactly where I wanted to go on what days. We even had a private tour to Kapadokya and booked us in wonderful cave hotel nestled in the landscape (MVC hotel). Our guide in Kapadokya, Mustafa, was full of information and obviously loved his job. Then in Kusadasi, I got upgraded to a 5 star hotel!! That was a last minute surprise and who doesn't love surprises like that? The tours to Ephesus and Pamukkale/Hieropolis were also small group tours with great guides (Maria was wonderful). Ozden, with his personal touch, made this trip one to never forget!

Wonderful Visit. Ozden is a wealth of information about Istanbul. He is personable and attentive. I highly recommend any visitor to Istanbul to not hesitate to use Turkland. We have used him twice and the experience was great both times

Whirlwind tour of Istanbul. Thanks to Ozden and Turkland Travel , we were able to see all the most important sites of Istanbul on our 2day layover. Everything went smoothly from our transfers to and from the airport to seeing the sites. Ozden took us himself and he has an amazing sense of humor that made the day fascinating and amusing! I even wanted to buy a Turkish rug and he made this process easy and an education. Plus, I felt I was getting the best deal possible.
Holiday. Osin made our trip to Istanbul amazing. She was so full of information. Ibrahim was extremely helpful also. Don't hesitate. Book your trips with Turkland travel agency.

Smooth as silk. These guys at Turkland Travel know there onionsI arranged 2 private tours before I left Australia and they handled all aspects with aplomb. Professional, courteous and efficient. They arranged 2 very different tours for me and both tours were immensely satisfying.The private guide Serhat I had on both days was a complete professional. He knew his stuff and I was particularly impressed with his technology skills. At various times, the trusty Samsung phone was produced and I could see clearly maps, paintings or objects that Serhat was explaining to me. This did not detract from the experience but only enhanced it. I was also taken with the laser pointer which again was another gem.Turkland Travel also arranged the transfers from my hotel to start the tours. The drivers turned up on time, the vehicle was spotless and the driving skills were impeccable. Your journey begins when you are picked up and when you are returned back to your hotel. And then the tour would begin. You are in a bubble from the time you leave until the time you return. That is the way travel should be – smooth as silk.

Ephesus Tour. Ozden is an amazing ambassador for Turkey and its treasures! He arranged a one day tour of Ephesus from our cruise ship in Kusadasi, and it was incredible!! We definitely plan a longer tour of Turkey and will use his services again!!

Istanbul trip. We let Osden plan our Istanbul/Ephesus trip, hotels, transportation, meals and tours. We added Cappadocia and the cruise lines switched our Ephesus stop two days before we left. Ozden handled all the changes in our itinarary without making us feel like we were causing him any trouble. EVERYTHING went smoothly and we absolutely loved everything he planned. We were busy but did have free time to relax or just wander. We would highly recommend using Ozden and his associates!

Excellent, professional, personalized, and reliable tour arrangements. We contacted Turkland Tours based on TripAdvisor reviews and ratings for a one-week tour of Turkey in early April. Ozden (the owner) spent a great deal of (unpaid) time with us in advance (by e-mail) helping plan our trip, pick the best sights, provide advice and guidance, and manage all the details so that we could enjoy our visit to Turkey. He can provide individual, small group, and large group tours depending on your budget, timetable, and how you like to tour. He also arranged flights to Izmir and Kayseri, all airport transportation, and the most fantastic guides in Ephesus and Cappedocia (reviewed separately). Everything was done perfectly, and we had a thoroughly wonderful time. We have worked with tour operators in other countries, and rarely have we found someone who takes such a personal interest in our needs, and made sure that everything was handled professionally and completely. One of our best vacations ever!

Beyond Excellent for Family Trip. A "5" is just not enough! Turkland Tours was there every step of the way - from early planning months before we left to the minute we arrived to even after we left! Ozden customized the trip to meet the needs of our family. (Made the focus perfect for our teenage sons & even accomdated our picky eaters!!)There were some very serious riots while we were in Turkey, Ozden checked-in on us regularly and gave us advice on where to avoid and how to stay safe. (Which was all very foreign to us.)After our 5 days with Ozden, he was part of the family. We can't wait to do another trip with Turkland. They get our family's highest recommendation!!

Turkish Delights. Turkland Tours and Ozden were referred to me by a close friend. And so I will carry on that tradition to many. A small group of us had 2 days touring Istanbul. All pre-arranged and hassle free for us. The first day was with a delightful woman named Ezra who took us to the Spice Bizarre, and an adjacent mosque (very special), up the Bosphorus to Sariyer for a delicious fish lunch, then to the Asian side for a panoramic view of both sides of the city. We ended our day at the Topkapi Palace. Ezra was sweet and attentive to all of our questions. Day 2 was with Ozden, the "mayor of Istanbul". First stop the Blue Mosque. He sat us down, prepped us for our experience, and on we went. Next stop the Cistern and then lunch at the Pudding Shop (bustling and yummy). We had a special need or two and Ozden was quick to make a call to satisfy. This day also included the Hagia Sophia and the new Rug Museum - amazing for rug lovers. Not only was the tour day a delight, the after party at a local restaurant along with rug shopping with the expert topped off the day with delights that followed me home. And, he saved the day when he discovered my friend's flight the next day was out of the Asian airport, not the European airport…she would have missed her flight had he not stepped in. Ozden and his team do what they love and we reeked the benefits. Lucky for me I have new friends in Istanbul. Looking forward to new discoveries with Ozden next time I'm in there.

Turkey is fantastic with turkland travel. There were 7 of us exploring turkey together. We are active, adventurous Canadian 50+ year olds.I spent a lot of time planning our Turkish adventure with the help of Ozden at Turkland travel.Do not hesitate to book with Turkland. Ozden went out of his way to make sure we experienced the best of everything that Turkey had to offer even going out of his way to bring us for the best chicken donair, ice cream,restaurants etc...Anything we wanted to know or ask for was never a problem for him.He was not with us on our trip to Izmir or Cappadoccia but he arranged everything and checked on us many times to make sure all was a okay. We had personal service during our entire time in Turkey and will never forget our many adventures.Cappadoccia is not to be missed. Ozden booked us into the MDC Cave Hotel which was amazing . Right beside the hotel you could hike through the fairly chimneys . Hotels that he booked for us were fantastic, people were very gracious and so helpful. Breakfasts included were great. Not one complaint . We would book with Ozden and Turkland again in a heart beat and hopefully we will cross path's with Ozden again in the future.

A great tour. We had 2 great days out that were organised by Ozden from Turkland Tours, day 1 included the Egypt Bazaar, Ferry up on the Bosphorus, Chora Church and City Walls, and day 2 the Blue Mosque, Hippodrome, Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace & Grand Bazaar. Our guide Murat was very professional and good company, so important when you are spending 2 whole days with the guide. Recommended.

Well organized, informative and responsive. Ozden is extremely well-organized and thoughtful. Ozden was available when we missed a flight and needed the time of our car service rescheduled. All the guides and hotels he selected were superb, knowledgeable and people we would like to have as friends. He was able to work with the preferences of our group and create a spectacular trip.

Ozden the Marvellous. Recently employed Ozden from Turkland, to provide an Istanbul familiarisation. He was simply excellent. Brilliant knowledge/ tickets organised, so no queueing; Could not fault. Would recommend Ozden to anyone who wants the highlights of Turkey, and a personalised perspective.It really made the difference. Thanks again Ozden. From Ross and Anne

Amazing - Loved Every Minute. Our guide Ezren was terrific. We had a short period of time in Istanbul, but we managed to see so many things. Ezren's knowledge of the Old City was incredible - we felt very taken care of. We highly recommend Turkland Tours.Mark

A lovely time!. My husband and I found Ozden, owner of Turkland Tours, to be organized and professional.Our guide, Esra, was terrific for the full 2 days we spent with her. She helped us navigate through the large Easter crowds with a speed and precision we could not possibly have managed ourselves. Her extensive knowledge of Istanbul and it's history proved invaluable to our holiday enjoyment. We also had a great day touring on and around the Bosphorus with Esra.

Exciting, Informative & Great Value. Nothing puts a dampener on your sightseeing like a round-the-block queue. In Istanbul, it’s possible to spend a large part of the day just waiting for entry to some of the more popular attractions. Thankfully, we swept straight to the front of the line with Ozden, who had also organised pre-paid tickets. So no lines for us! Having opted for a private tour, we were able to chop and change the schedule to suit ourselves. This was a handy way to get around the days some attractions were closed. We were also able to make some changes on the fly. That worked especially well for us.Our guide was witty, fun and tremendously knowledgeable. It was a genuine pleasure spending time together. The two days we spent in Istanbul felt more like being shown around by a friend than anything else. Plus, almost everywhere, he pointed out the chance for a unique photo opportunity. Had we tried sightseeing alone, we’d have missed most of those. Thanks to his wealth of knowledge, Ozden ably summarised the story of each new stop, so it wasn’t necessary to wait for a break in the crowd to read all the curatorial notes ourselves. That’s not to say there wasn’t a chance to soak up the atmosphere and immerse ourselves in each new attraction. We had plenty of time to linger and explore whatever we discovered along the way.

Good customer service, but overpriced. We booked a semi-private tour with Ozden for the full-day city tour of IstanbulPositives - Our guide Esra was very informative and friendly. The 3-star review does not reflect her service, but rather the value and structure of the overall experience!! The owner, Ozden, was also very responsive and organized over email, and the hotel pickup was prompt.Negatives - Compared to the other tours we took during our European vacation, we felt that this was grossly overpriced and did not provide much additional value over a standard group tour. The "full day" tour started around 10am and wrapped up by 2:30, including a self-paid lunch. While we were able to skip the lines at each tourist attraction (big plus!), we didn't feel the itinerary included anything special, but instead only the standard attractions that we could have found on our own. Dissapointing, especially given the amount of money we spent.Additionally, the final component of our tour was a bizarre sales pitch in a Turkish carpet showroom. Although the vendors were friendly and did teach us some things about Turkish carpet making, we were then subjected to a sales pitch, something I did not expect on a private tour after having spent several hundred Euros.In summary - Friendly guide, professional company, but you can get better value for your money elsewhere
Lot of fun. Didn't know what to expect, but i'm glad i went. great tour guides too. most definitely going back as soon as i can

Western Black Sea Tour. We had so much fun during our Western Black Sea tour arranged for Istanbul Bar Association. Turkland Tours had personal touch in every detail including bus types, hotel quality and also competence of the guides. We wish to join their cultural tours in the future...
Simply Amazing!!!. I had a short visit to Istanbul, but Özden made it just phenomenal, the best tour guide ever, can't wait to go back to see more :-)
Excellent Experience. We had an excellent experience working with Turkland Tours. Our tour guide Ozden was gracious, extremely well educated and articulate. Very organized, hospitable and engaging.
Great. The guide was great and the half-day bosphorus cruise was amazing. Highly recommended for anyone willing to discover the beauty of Istanbul's bosphorus

Turkland Tours - the best!. Turkland is absolutely the best! We had an incredible visit to Istanbul with and truly gracious, educated and articulate tour guide, Ozden, who took us first on the Byzantine & Ottoman tour and then on the Bosphorus & Two Continents. WOW! Completely organized, hospitable and engaging, I can’t say enough about what a positive and exciting experience we had with Turkland Tours. If you are looking for truly attentive, caring guidance, look no further. Turkland is the best & we will definitely use them again on our next trip to Istanbul! Thank you, Ozden.
Short and Sweet Trip to Istanbul. Highly recommend Turkland Tours for any travel guidance. Excellent service. Very friendly and no-rush.
World class service in Istanbul. I will recommend Ozdan. He work around our tight schedule to make it happen. He gave us World Class Service

Cappadocia and Ephesus private tour. Ozden arranged us to visit Cappadocia and Ephesus. The itinerary was executed flawlessly. The transfers were smooth and the accommodations were superb. I would definitely use them again.

Highly recommended.. Ogden and his team were prompt and professional yet you felt like the service was being provided by a friend. In addition to the usual tourist spots we also were given the opportunity to see local attractions also . I would highly recommend them .

Highly recommended!. I just finished my week long trip in Turkey (Week of December 1st). I signed up for their group tours, but since December is a slow month, each group tour had no more than 5 people. My experience with Turkland was wonderful - it was literally "hassle free". Ozden made sure that my experience was a positive one. He helped me organize the day tours, arranged tickets to/from Cappadocia and even treated me to dinner. I missed the tour van on day 1 because my alarm wasn't set correctly - I thought I'll have to spend my 1st day in Istanbul wandering around all by myself, but a call to Ozden solved the problem. He arranged a Mercedes van just to drive me to the tour group. Ozden is very professional, very friendly and very knowledgeable. He made sure to check in with me to make sure all is well. All and all - Turkland makes sure our experience is their top priority, and I will definitely use Turkand Tours again next time I visit.

Excellent Gallipoli and Troy Tour !. I am pleased to provide a reference for Ozden and his team for organizing an excellent trip to Gallipoli & Tory at very short notice. We wanted to see both Troy and Gallipoli in a day as we were in Turkey only for 4 days, but at the same time we didn't want to miss out on the key aspects of both sites. We saw all the important aspects, particularly from an ANZAC perspective. We visited Brighton Beach, Anzac Cove, Lone Pine, Chunnuk Bair and also visited a Turkish memorial site. Read the moving Mustafa Kemal 1934 speech whic his enshrined on a huge plaque near Anzac Cove. Our guide, Emre, who studied history and tourism at the local university brought to life the Troy half of tour with detailed explaination of the sites. He was also clearly very knowledge about the entire Gallipoli. He also showed the memorials tombs for the Indian soldiers who died in this effort. We most definitely recommend Ozden and his team for their excellent and prompt service (from quick detailing of a plan, costing etc) to the actual trip itself - pickups (very safe driver in Mr Tahir) & the awesome tour guide - ask for Emre! cheers - Indran P

Turkland Tours Istanbul. We booked a private tour with Turkland when we visited istanbul in October. They also arranged our airport transfers. I can't recommend them too highly. Very professional organisation, with luxurious vehicles. Everything right on time and the guide was very knowledgeable and professional.
Highly recommended. We had an amazing experience with this company. The driver was excellent and the tour was fantastic. Highly recommended.

Impeccable service - great day tour. We discovered Turkland Tours via Trip Advisor and made contact by email. My husband is generally skeptical about tours of any sort because he likes to discover things on his own. However with the guidance of Ozden of Turkland Tours, it was clear to us that this would be the company to go with. For the good reasons he pointed out, we opted for a full day semi-private tour of the Old City and Relics. On the morning when we were picked up at our hotel, we were very surprised to find out we were the only couple on this particular walking tour this day! While this was what we personally think of as good fortune, we also believe this is a clear indication of the professional, customer-service focus of this company. Whether or not the tour was full, it went forward as promised. Absolutely no inconvenience or disappointment to the travelers. Wonderful!  Our tour guide was Darya. We have to say that she is excellent. She knows her history, she is very personable and helpful and her English is very good. We felt comfortable with her immediately. Darya had a natural sense about when we were unsure of what to do or how to negotiate for example, and she helped us through this at the various sites such as the Grand Bazaar.  If you are worried about walking, the tour of the Old City and Relics is very manageable - the pace is moderate and the distances are not great between sites. There is time to stop and sit to enjoy the ambiance of, say, the gardens and courtyards of the palace, etcetera. Plenty of time for photos, too.  We highly recommend Turkland Tours. The company is very reliable and conscientious about their business. Ozden's follow up for customer satisfaction and our subsequent conversation proved this. In all of our years of travel, we have not had 1 tour operator ever give us follow-up care! We also thanked our lucky stars that we booked this tour ahead of time. Our tour guide was organized and had all the admission tickets ready for us as needed. We were grateful we did not have to stand in some of those very, very long line ups at the popular tourist sites.

Turkland Travel really made our Trip Special!. Turkland Travel was recommended to me and we were not disappointed at all! Ozden was professional, fair, and very helpful with our planning. His quick emails were awesome & that made me really feel comfortable. Our 2 days of tours with Murat were wonderful. We saw everything in Istanbul and it was a special part of our trip to Europe. Murat was professional, pleasant, informative and we enjoyed being with him.

Turland Tours did a great job!. I contacted Ibrahim from Turkland Travel after reading the wonderful reviews on Tripadvisor. Ibrahim planned 3 perfect days for our group of 3 people in Istanbul. It was a bit challenging as we had to work around the Kurban Bayramı holiday. The day before we started with our guide Fatih Ozturk, Ibrahim came to our hotel and went over all the details. He answered all of our questions and also gave us excellent restaurant recommendations. During our time with Fatih, Ibrahim checked in and made sure things were going as scheduled. Turkland Tours did in incredible job planning our trip. Every detail was taken care of. After our 3rd day of touring, they took us to our ship. Our guide Fatih was wonderful. So attentive and knowledgeable. We had a lot of fun with him.

Stress free tour to Ephesus. Ozden and Turkland Tours organized a fun, stress-free and informative tour of Ephesus, Miletus, Prieme, and Didyma. Service was friendly, professional, and low-pressure. I appreciated Ozden's welcome phone call and his quick email response. Evening at Ephesus Suites hotel was a highlight-comfortable, quiet, and wonderfully local. Will definitely use them during my next trip to Istanbul.

Istanbul came alive for us with these fun and informative guys!. We decided to use a personal guide on our recent stay in Istanbul. We had stayed in other parts of Istanbul on previous visits, but we found Sultanahmet is the true heart of historical Istanbul, and this was shown to us by Ozden and his group at Turkland Tours. They made such a difference to our travel experience. We can't praise them highly enough. Full of information, both serious and quirky, and delivered in such a fun and enjoyable way. They seem to have the knack of pitching their info at the right level for the people they are talking to. Their knowledge isn't limited to the historical sites - all sorts of other helpful info about eating, shopping, getting around you name it - we had a fantastic time in Istanbul, and we have Ozden and his guys to thank for it.

Outstanding Service. We spent a couple of weeks in Turkey at the end of September, early October and had a fantastic time. One of the highlights was a personalised tour of Istanbul with Ozden of Turkland Tours.Ozden made history come alive as he took us to all the great monuments of the city as well as provide a general history of Turkey. He was very attentive to our needs, as well as give us ample time to enjoy the sites (unlike bus tours that invariably give you only 5 minutes at each spot) and was clearly one of the best tour guides we have ever experienced. We were a small party of six who also wanted to experience trying the local cuisine which he was more than happy to show us some of the off the tourist spots to try some of the local foods. We would highly recommend Ozden to anyone wanting a highly informative and relaxing tour of a beautiful city and would certainly use him again when we next visit Turkey.

EXCELLENT Istanbul Guides for familes. Ozden and the team at Turkland Tours made our Istanbul adventure come to life. Ozden, understanding 12 and 10 year old children, created a tour that was engaging and yet fun... allowing the children (and parents) to truly get to know and understand the history and culture of Turkey and the importance of Istanbul historically and in present day. We highly recommend Turkland Tours... centrally located right in the heart of the Old City - steps away from Hagia Sophia!

Outstanding service. My wife and I recently had an unexpectedly short first-time visit to Istanbul. Ozden and his team came highly recommended from a professional colleague and we were not disappointed. As experienced travellers and explorers of different cities we rarely take 'organised guides' however this time we did as we had little time to prepare for our brief time on the ground. Ozden and his team put together a tight, informative program with a well qualified and experienced guide for the two of us. It was flexible, informative and got us places we would have never accessed and did all this with an efficiency we would never have achieved. Additional logistics support was also supplied at short notice with no fuss. I could not have wished for a better experience and look forward to planning a more extensive return visit thought them.

Professional and Informative. On a 1st visit to Istanbul I decided it would be better to be taken round the main sites with an informed guide.Turkland Tours were excellent in every respect, from timely pickup, to express entry for tickets, to lunch and drop off. At the sites and in transit on the bus our guide proved to be informative and clearly know a huge amount about the specific sites and the city in general. I came away much better informed than I might otherwise have been, had I attempted the sites without a guide.I can thoroughly recommend Turkland and will certainly use them again for some other tours when I go back next time!

Informative, Entertaining, and Professional. Visited Istanbul for the first time and had an amazing time getting to know the city and everything it has to offer with the help of Turkland Tours. Ozden from Turkland Tours made our stay quite enjoyable and memorable. Not only is he very professional but quite knowledgable and charismatic. I will recommend Turkland Tours and Ozden to any of my friends who will be visiting in the future and highly recommend them to anyone planning a visit. Keep up the great work!

A great day. Ozden had been highly recommended to us, so we booked our 1st day in Istanbul with him for all the highlights of the Sultanahmet area. We had a GREAT day.He is so knowledgable and good company. At the end of our day he was so helpful with suggestions for things to do & places to go for the rest of our stay.He set the tone for what turned out to be four incredible days in Istanbul.

The best in Istanbul!. I ended up in Istanbul by complete fluke and didn't know the first thing about Turkey. I stumbled into Turkland Travels and told Ozden the story of how I'd ended up in Istanbul and that I had a week to kill before leaving. Without missing a beat, he whipped up a whole itinerary for me that was incredible, exciting, informative and budget friendly. He took care of every single detail from the flights to the hotel/airport transfers, lodging and tours. I went from Istanbul to Cappadokia to Selcuk and back to Istanbul. The tours he booked for me were amazing and informative and amusing and the hotels i was booked in were friendly and clean. While I was in Istanbul I also stayed at his hostel, The Orient and the staff are amazing, the view from the rooftop terrace is breathtaking and it's the cleanest hostel I've EVER stayed in! This accidental trip to Turkey is now one of the best travel experiences I've had in my whole life, and it wouldn't have been possible without Ozden or the staff at Turkland Travels!

Made Our Trip. My wife and I concluded our honeymoon in Istanbul, and would have been lost without Ozden and Turkland Tours. We had another guide planned who called in sick the morning of our tour and directed us to Turkland. Within 10 minutes Ozden had a great guide on her way to our hotel. The guide was extremely knowledgable, and spent two incredible days with us touring the city.Turkland's prices were extremely fair and reasonable. I would not recommend touring Istanbul without a tour guide. If you want to experience Istanbul in the best way possible, use Turkland. Ozden is also very funny. But if you don't think he is, just laugh it will make him feel great.In all seriousness Ozden and Turkland were amazing. Ozden also set up a private van to take my wife and I to a wonderful restaurant for dinner. If you are going to Istanbul, use Turkland11

Like friends!. Several years ago Ozden at Turkland was one of the best guides I'd ever had and I remembered him for my second trip to Istanbul this month. He wasn't able to accompany us because of scheduling problems, but my two companions and I were provided with excellent service for a day trip to Troy. It's a long drive, but the car was amazingly comfortable, and the driver top rate. Turkland arranged for the local guide at Troy who was also wonderful. The archaeological site really came to life for us. I especially appreciated the Turkland office staff working with me in the U.S. before the trip to make sure all our needs would be met. If you want to really have a sense of the intriguing city of Istanbul and nearby sites, Turkland is your best bet!

Professional and Friendly. Prior to arriving in Istanbul made contact with Ibrahim Basyesil of Turkland Tours as my partner and I wanted to visit Troy and the Gallipoli peninsula. Ibrahim was extremely helpful (and patient) as we worked out the best way for us to tour. Initially I thought his quote for a 2 day private tour was a little expensive but after benchmarking with 2 other travel companies found Ibrahim's quote was very competitive and more importantly "all inclusive" with other tour companies appearing cheaper but excluding accommodation or meals etc. The driver, car and individual tour guides they engaged for each of the Troy and Gallipoli tours are extremely knowledgable, passionate and fun - highly recommend.

Best way to see Istanbul. We had a great time in Istanbul and owe a lot of the credit to Ozden and Turkland Tours. Ozden came recommended by a friend and we are happy to share the recommendation. He was so helpful and knowledgable about the sites - made our time that much more enjoyable. Ozden was accommodating and flexible to our requests and a fun and lively host in this exotic city!

Professional and Fun!. What an absolute blast it was being shown around Istanbul by Ozden from Turkland Tours. Both came highly recommended to us by friends and we will do the same by passing on their information to our friends who will be visiting in the future. Not only was Ozden knowledgable and professional, but also kind and funny. We'll be quoting some of his phrases for years to come as we fondly remember our tours with him. I highly recommend Turkland Tours and Ozden and would not go with anyone else.

Highly recommend!. All of our tours to the Blue Mosque, Agia Sofia, Topkapi Palace and our Bosphorus cruise, were enhanced by Neslihan's insights and explanations. She is a good ambassador for Turkey and we enjoyed her company. She even knew which tea for one of us to drink when his stomach was unsettled!The tours were very well organized and paced to our abilities and likes.We recommend her and Turkland Travel to our friends. Thanks,Paul

An amazing tour of the Byzantine City. I have been to Istanbul a few times and always enjoyed the city but this visit was without a doubt the best, mostly thanks to Turkland Tours. We arranged to have a historical tour of the ancient Byzantine city. Mr. Ozden Basak arranged for us to spend the day with Mr Ferudun Ozgumus, a University Professor of Byzantine History. Our tour ranged from the ruins of original Emperor's Palace to the Hippodrome and on to the Chora Church, the Blachernae Palace, the Yedi Kule, the Theodosian walls, the Bouchelon Palace, the seawalls, the Fatih Mosque and the seat of the Istanbul Patriarch. There was a lot more. Turkland Tours gave us so much more than we ever imagined. Ozden was very attentive to our needs and quick to respond. We have used many tour guides all over the world. Turkland Tours is definitely one of the best..

Three capitals in Turkey. My wife and I have just had a wonderful trip to Turkey. We contacted the Kalinka Travel Agency in Norway and told them we wanted to visit the present capital Ankara, the former capital Istanbul and the Hittite capital (3500 years ago) Hattusas, and in cooperation with Turkland Travel they organized a very interesting schedule for us. In Istanbul we were met by Özden, who showed us the Chora church and the Hagia Sophia, in Ankara the guide Füsun took us to the Citadel, the Muzeum of Anatolian Culture and the mausoleum of Atatürk. And in Bogazkale hotel manager Deniz took us around Hattusas, the wonderful mountain reliefs in Yazilikaya and Alacahöyük. All the three of our guides were very knowledgable and friendly. This was the first time Turkland Travels organized a trip to Bogazkale, a small village a couple of hours east of Ankara, were the impressive ruins of the Hittite capital Hattusas are situated, so Özden kept an eye on us, calling us to check that everything was OK. So this seems to be Turkland Travels in a nutshell: High competance and friendly care. We came back home with lots of good memories from our stay in Turkey, and I can warmly recommend the Kalinka (in Norway) and the Turkland travel agencies.

Wonderful Ephesus Tour!. My wife and I had the great opportunity of using Turkland Tours for a Ephesus day tour earlier this week. Ibrahim set everything up for us and made it such a amazing and smooth experience! All shuttles to and from the airport were always there waiting for us and we never had to question where to go. The price was very reasonable and well worth it! The tour guide at Ephesus was also awesome and gave us loads of information, keeping it interested and fun. I highly recommend going on a tour with Turkland Tours if you are visiting Turkey! Thanks Ibrahim for all your help! :D

Before travelling to Turkey contact Turkland!. We were introduced to Ibrahim who works across from where we stayed in Istanbul. He is super nice, very knowledgable and was extremely helpful in helping us book a trip to Ephesus and arrange early morning shuttles to the airport. I only wish we knew of Turkland before we travelled to Turkey since he was able to tell us the best times to travel to avoid traffic and hidden gems to see :DWe've found a new friend and one who's made our trip very memorable, I highly recommend booking excursions through Turkland!

Turkland Travel. ozden from Turkland Travel organised our trip to Turkey via the internet. The transport was always there( even waiting nearly 3 hours for us to get through custums at Istanbul) or they were on time for the pickups. The hotel in Istanbul was in a perfect postition. The hot air balloon was the best run activity I have been on. All the day trips we went on the guides were English speaking and were very knowledgable of the area. Ozden even organised one of his people to take me to an English speaking Dr when I needed one. Excellant job Turkland Travel. Dianne Elliott Sydney

These guys are amazing!. This was not our first experience with Turkland, nor the last. Ozden and his staff know all there is to know about this historic city. I am always impressed over their level of knowledge and hospitality. I definately reccomend this company if you are going to Istanbul or Turkey in general. I trust them to take care of all of my Travel arangements in Turkey
Shakir was phenomenal. So impressed with how they put this together so quickly and got everyone where they needed to go. It couldn't have gone much better. Such a great idea and so well to my budget.

A great day in Istanbul. We spent an amazing 10 days in Greece and Turkey. Istanbul was our last stop and we had been referred to Ozden by friends from home. We were not disappointed! Ozden took us on a tour of all the major sights in Istanbul. He was there to meet us just wehn he said he would be, and the day progressed very well. Ozden knows the city inside out. He engaged my teenagers (not always easy) and because he himself is well-travelled and sophisticated, he was quite interesting to talk to. We made all the plans via email in advance, paid by credit card in advance, so the day was simple and easy. Ozden was very responsive before and after, and I recommend him to anyone planning a trip to Istanbul. He is fully prepared to plan much more than we had time for.

Thank You Turkland. Wow! I just got back from an amazing trip to Turkey and I have Turkland to thank for it. We worked with Ozden and Ibrahim for our whole trip, which we didn't plan on up front, but they just started picking out the most impressive stuff to do in the best places and by the end of our planning we were fully putting it in their hands. They took care of everything. We had pick ups from airports, drop offs at tours and everything in-between. I felt like we had some of the best guides throughout all of our locations and was happy about some of the things they directed us away from like Troy. We got similar feedback talking to fellow travelers along our way. If you can even give Turkland an idea of what you want, they will deliver.I highly recommend the Hot Air Balloon above Cappdocia. Totally worth the cost. I would recommend doing Pammukkale in a day trip and not overnight. Totally worth seeing, but not much else to do their. We loved Oludeniz and if we did it again would have stayed their longer. Istanbul is a super cool city and in 3 days we just barely scratched the surface. We didn't go into the eastern part of the country, which based on the time we had, I am happy about that decision.I hope I can find groups like Turkland to help plan my vacations in the future!

Doesn't get better!. I was coming to Istanbul and Turkey for 2 weeks after my wedding. I knew we wanted to do a lot and see a lot, but also enjoy and relax, while on my honeymoon. I contacted a few travel groups including Turkland to see what kind of service and response I got back. Not only did Ozden and Turkland respond first, but they also responded the best. I felt like they genuinly wanted me to have a great time and took the time to ask a lot of questions on what we were looking for in Istanbul.After a few back and forth emails about what tours we wanted to do in Istanbul and the trip at large. I was so comfortable with the team at Turkland and so busy planning a wedding, that they ended up planning and booking our entire trip. This is something, I have never done before and once I got on the plane after the wedding, I was nervous on what we would get.2 weeks later, I realize those nerves were a waste of time. We got to see so much in 2 weeks, wasted very little time on things not worth doing and had the most genuine and knowledgable guides throughout. From Cappadocia to Antalya, Pammakule and Istanbul, we were blown away and also got plenty of time to relax. Multiple times we were on tours in places with multiple tours going on and every time, I felt like we had the best guide and would have dredded being on some of the mass guide trips. We even had a private guide in Instanbul, who in the afternoon, ask us what we want to do, took us off the beaten path, took us for fish sandwiches and humored me, while I asked a lot of politics questions, while sipping Turkish Tea along the Bosphorus for an hour. If I could give 6 stars I would.My advice to you, is have Turkland plan your whole trip or at least run your itinerary by them. They probably have better deals, places and connections in every place and it isn't more expensive.

Great service and great people. We just got back from Turkey and had a wonderful time. I chose Turkland Tours based on the other reviews in Trip Advisor and those excellent reviews were right on the money. I worked directly with Ibrahim to arrange all of the tours--Bosporus River Dinner Cruise, North and South Cappadocia, Ephesus, Pamukkale, Troy, and a walking tour that consisted of the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, and Topkapi palace. I had already booked our flight to Turkey and our hotels in Istanbul but Ibrahim made all of the hotel, flight, and transfer service arrangements within Turkey. It was all hassle-free and worry-free. We were met by a friendly, helpful person at each airport we flew to, beginning with a pickup by Ozden at Ataturk Airport. The next day we were met at the hotel by Farok who walked us to the Grand Bazaar on his own time and wouldn't take any tip from me. All-in-all, I felt like I was being shown around Istanbul by a group of long-time friends who really cared that our stay in Turkey was nothing but the best.

Amazing tour guide and fell in love with Istanbul!. I just wanted to say a huge thank you to Turkland Tours for organising our 2 day guide in Istanbul when we were there almost 3 weeks ago. Senem Okan Pastoressa took care of us for 2 whole days and she was amazing. Her knowledge, advice, wonderful professional manner were so welcome, however her friendship she showed us was what I wanted to thank her for. She just brought Istanbul to life for us, allowing us to ask as many questions we wanted, to move at our own pace (my mother, myself & daughter-three generations of women travelling together!) and her stories and the way she explained the history to us was fantastic. The timings were perfect, the transportation amazing (always just a moment away even when it was busy at certain places) the lunch stops we had just yummy and we were able to set our own pace at times which you cannot do on these huge tours with many people. Priority entry to most places meant you do not have to stand in the long lines of tourists too....a bonus when is is very hot in the sun! Senem went well over what she had to by offering her phone number to us in case of emergency during our 3 weeks in Turkey and on our return for our final few days back in Istanbul met up with us for drinks and dinner. We enjoyed her company so much.She made us all fall in love with Istanbul....I will return one day I know and just hope she is there to again show us around.

Very professional experience. Ozden met us in Ephesus and provided a terrific tour of the ruins and whole area. Then we met him again in Istanbul for 2 days seeing all the historic and religious sites. We also did a very long day drive 200 miles to Gallipoli. Ozden is a friendly, knowledgeable guy and one of the best guides we have ever met.

BEST TOUR GUIDE IN TURKEY. If you really want to have a Turkish experience while visiting Turkey, I highly recommend Ozden Basak of Turkland Tours. Ozen first met us in Kusadasi to guide us through Ephesus. He also directed us to the best sights and best shopping experiences.Ozden then met us in Istanbul, (his home base) and guided us over 5 days to the most interesting and exciting spots in all of the city. We got the opportunitiy to eat at outstanding, affordable restaurants and see amazing things. Ozden's English is perfect and he is very knowledgeable about the culture and history. He took us to restaurants and sights not usually on the "tourist circuit." My husband and I have been to Turkey but seeing Turkey through Ozden's eyes was so much better than if we had tried to see the city on our own. Vicki Z from Rancho Santa Fe, CA. USA

Smooth sailing. We chose Turkland Tours based on the positive reviews written on tripadvisor. Turkland Tours arranged for us to be picked up at the airport on our arrival in Istanbul, taken on a 3-4 hour "lay of the land" tour of Istanbul (We had previously seen the major sights) and then dropped off at the cruise terminal to begin our cruise. Everything couldn't have gone smoother. It was a very positive experience and we would definitely recommend Ibrahim and Turkland Tours to others travelling to Turkey.

Perfect day. I was introduced by a friend via email to Ozden Basak and Turkland travel. We were in Istanbul for 2 nights with only 1 day available for seeing the sights. Our daughter and her 2 friends (all 18 year olds) were with us and this was their first trip. My husband and I had been before so this was really about taking the girls around. Ozden and I planned the day on email. He himself was busy so he arranged for Derya Artan to take us around - who was truly fantastic. Really great with the girls giving them enough but not too much information. She took us to Topkapi, Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Hippodrome and the Grand Bazaar. She seemed to know everyone and everything. No standing in long lines anywhere. And interestingly for such a packed day, we never felt rushed. Truly a fabulous day - perfectly done. Thank you Turkland, Ozden and Derya!

Exceptional Service. I traveled solo to Istanbul in April 2013.  By email, I’d easily made arrangements with Ozden for two days of private tours with his good friend, Emrecan.  She met me at my hotel the first day at the arranged time and we went first to the Hippodrome, then to the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia.  Emrecan is exceptionally knowledgeable about Istanbul and I enjoyed talking with her. My private tour was well worth the money.  I found out next that Ozden and Emrecan are much more than tour guides.  I twisted my foot and could barely walk.  Emrecan took me to a pharmacy for an ace bandage and then back to my hotel.  She and Ozden both telephoned me that afternoon to see how I was doing.  The next day, Ozden drove me to the hospital emergency room, staying with me and interpreting while my foot was x-rayed and the doctor told me it was broken. He then drove me to a pharmacy to have my prescription filled and buy a cane.  His great sense of humor helped cheer me up and both Ozden and Emrecan stayed in touch over the next couple days.  Emrecan also made the arrangements for me to get wheelchair assistance at Ataturk Airport when I left.  Without them, alone in Istanbul with a broken foot would have been very lonely and difficult.  With them, I had two friends in Istanbul who cared for me.  I hope to soon go back to Istanbul to see them and finish my tour. I highly recommend Turkland Travel.

Private Guided Tour of Istanbul. When I initially contacted Ibrahim from Turkland Tours to investigate our using their services, his prompt responses gave me confidence that we were in good hands. However, when you're spending a lot of money and you're on a once in a lifetime trip you still have high expectations. On the day of our tour, our guide, Murat Aksu, was waiting for us in our hotel lobby 15 minutes earlier than scheduled Murat's expertise on all the sights we visited was outstanding, but what really enhanced the experience was his willingness to talk to us about day to day life in Istanbul. His English was flawless and we really felt we were spending the day with a friend. That same evening, Ibrahim called us from the hospital (where his dad had just had surgery) to make sure that we had enjoyed our day. What more can you say!!!!

a very good Itinerary organised by the tavelagent, Turkland.. We were three people( age 49, 74,76 )wanted to spend 1 week in Turkey,at the end of May.We knew we wanted to see Istanbul and Cappadocia.I was recommended from my turkish friend to contact Turklands to organize the trip, which I did.Ibrahim did a excellent job.He organized a very interesting itinerary,covering most key spots of Istanbul,Cappadocia and Ephesus.The Itinerary included 2 domestic flights with pick up and return to hotel and airport plus very good guides during our tour.Tickets were well obtained so that we did not need to que and always had a lovely turkish lunch included.He chose quaint and peaceful hotels more like secret spots.I will defnitely use turklands again because everything was organised and thought out well .

Best vacation ever: loved Turkey and Turkland Travel!. This was a family vacation with our 2 twenty-something boys, and our first visit toTurkey. Ozden Basak and Turkland Travel were recommended to us by our hotel, The Empress Zoe. Ozden and I exchanged a few easy emails before the trip to arrange dates and itinerary. We opted for 2 days of private tours with Ozden in Istanbul and he arranged further private tours for us at Ephesus and environs, plus transfer to Bodrum. We would never have seen or learned so much if we did not have Ozden guiding our way. We appreciated how Ozden provided an introduction to each site and then let us explore at our own pace. With Ozden's know-how we were able to avoid long lines and crunch times at the sites, and he even managed to put together a schedule that was mindful of our jet lag. Lunches were delicious! Ozden literally knows all the angles, as he made sure to get just the right photo shots of the family. Since it was a private tour, Ozden was able to adjust to our requests as they came up. We added an unplanned stop at the Süleymaniye Mosque, and at a handicraft center. Ozden also responded to a last minute request for a day gulet cruise out of Bodrum, which was arranged perfectly and even with a surprise birthday cake for my husband. After we left Istanbul Ozden called to check that everything was going well at Ephesus, and then again while we were on the gulet. It feels like Ozden is now part of the family, and certainly a cherished part of our memories from Turkey. Teşekkürler.

Turkland is excellent. We toured two days with Ibrahim and Mehmet and it truly is the best way to see Istanbul. The service included pick up and return to the airport. Tours of the Blue Mosque Topkapi palace the Grand Bazaar. All tickets were already obtained, we benefitted from the local knowledge and friendship with people on the street.We avoided several long lines due to being with them. Mehmet was always on time and well informed. Lunch was included with the tour at the great restaurant the meat house right across from Turkland. Turkland is located next door to the fantastic hotel Biz Cevair. The only way to see Sultanmet Square.

The great Turkey with ancient history and culture. We six of us wanted to visit Turkey and wanted to ensure we cover most of the key spots. Using Google and Trip advisory I came up with the contact of Mr. Cenan of Medhills Travel. All feedback about Cenan were great hence I took a chance to work with Cenan to provide me with an itinerary with all key spots with our dates. The hotel selections were great. Six persons consisted of two coming from London, one from India, two from NY State and one from California. Hence there was a logistic of various pick up time of the arrivals and departure. We all were very impressed with the professional planning of the trip and flawless execution. We were in Turkey from May 14 th thru May 24, 2013. We toured Cappdocia, Izmir, Ephesus and Pamukkale.We started our tour to early and got to see the Blue Mosque in the morning followed by lunch. Lunch place was reasonably good for we vegetarians. After lunch we saw Hagia Sophie. My favorite sight in Hagia Sophia but this was tied for second place the Blue Mosque. Both of these attractions are very well covered by other tourists and I agree with what I have read about it in Trip Advisory site.We had planned two free days in Istanbul for our own planning. We used one day to take a day trip on the Bosphorous cruise. This was well worth it in terms of the cost of 25TL and gorgeous views of various historical buildings on both sides of the river. After the trip we walked thru Spice Market on our way to the hotel. We enjoyed the spice market but I was surprised at the prices of pistachio and the variations of the prices from 35 TL to 95 TL per kilo. I am not sure as to why such difference and whether it was tourist trap. Even saffron was very expensive compared to saffron from Spain available in USA.We used one day to visit Asian side of Istanbul. That was an experience too. One can see the difference in the environment.Money exchange: The currency exchanges near Grand Bazaar were offering the best rates and were not charging commission.

The best way to know Istanbul!. We took a private walking tour that took us all day in Istanbul. It was great! We not only saw the most beautiful places without having to deal with long lines but learned a great deal about those places and the turkish culture and history in a very easy going manner. Wish I would remember our guide's name because he was superb! We had great lunch which was also included in our tour. Definitely this is the way to get to know the city! Highly recommended!

Turkland Travel is THE best!. My wife, Jean Ann French, and I have traveled all over the world. The best service we have received anywhere, by far, is from Turkland Travel in Istanbul. Every detail of our recent trip to Turkey was completely worry free, including transportation to/from the airports; our guides were always on time and very helpful and informative; and the tours selected were incredible. We even made several last minute changes to a couple of our planned tours and the guides were very receptive and enthusiastic for the changes. I highly, HIGHLY recommend Turkland Travel. Turkey is a MUST on your bucket list. The country is steeped with history and world class natural attractions such as Cappadocia and Pamukkale. You can totally and completely trust Turkland Travel to get you the best deals and provide superior, worry free service to maximize your Turkish adventure and travel.

Once in a Lifetime Trip to Turkey!. My husband and I had the best trip ever this May when we returned to Istanbul for a proper tour of the country beyond Istanbul. One of the best parts of the trip was visiting our friend, Ozden Basak of Turkland Travel. He spent over a month helping me plan the most efficient method of seeing some of the greatest sights in Turkey.Ozden arranged for a visit to a leather factory and showroom, Best Leather, which was a very successful shopping trip. Our tour guide, Emrecan Kurt, was a darling and took us to the Spice Market, a ferry on the Bosphorus, for lunch at a fishing village, the Chora Museum, and the Basilica Cistern. She was quite knowledge with excellent English. We enjoyed her very much.Ozden walked us to the Grand Bazaar and handed us off to Murat for a shopping tour with only 'friends' of Ozden and Murat. To go in alone is far too overwhelming with over 3,000 shops! Murat's assistance was most appreciated.We left Istanbul to visit Cappadocia, which was absolutely spectacular! Then we stayed in Kusadasi for four nights to enjoy day trips, with the most notable being Pamukkale. I'll review the other sights and hotels separately, but mention all of these arrangements because of the work that Ozden did to make our trip SO perfect.We returned to Istanbul for one more night in the beautiful Sultanahmet Sarayi Hotel (Palace), which I have already reviewed on Tripadvisor. Our last night was with Ozden and Onur on the roof top of the Orient Hostel and I'll write a separate review for it.All of our in-country transportation and transfers were arranged by Turkland Travel and our trip was absolutely perfect! Thank you, Ozden, you were a wonderful host as always!

Fabulous tour of Turkey!. Turkland Tours did in incredible job planning our trip through Turkey. Every detail was taken care of; shuttles to and from hotels and airports and our small group tours were excellent. A private tour in Istanbul was perfect for us. Our hotels in Cappadocia, Kasudasi, Istanbul, and the Cave Art Hotel in Mustafapasa, were all wonderful.We highly recommend Turkland tours to plan your dream vacation to Turkey.

Walking tour of old city istanbul etc.. We were shown around all the fabulous site within the old city walls by the engaging and knowledgeable Esra from Turkland Tours. The intricately decorated Blue Mosque, the ancient underground Roman Cistern, the Hippodrome, Topkapi Palace, St Sophia and the Grand Bazaar. Esra was very generous with her time and answered any questions we had about Turkey and Istanbul including suggesting good places to eat, where locals would go to buy their carpets etc.Turkland tours also arranged a day exploring the spice markets, cruise down the Bospherous and visit to the grand palace in Asia Minor. They were always on time and their guides were knowledgeable polite and spoke good English.

The most helpful travel agent I've ever met!. We were recommended to Turkland by someone a our hostel. We met Özden, the owner, who was extremely friendly and helpful to us. We told him where we wanted to go and he created a tour especially for us. He went the extra mile by showing walking us to the spice bazaar, buying our tickets to the Hagia Sophia so we didn't have I wait in the cue, and provided ongoing help for the rest of our trip. He is more than a travel agent now, he is a friend!

Tantalizing Turkey. We dealt with Ibrahim Basyesil from the company. He was very prompt with his communication and made excellent suggestions with the choice of tours. We enjoyed both Cappadocia & Ephesus. A couple from our group travelled to Gullipolli & Troy. Throughout vehicles in good condition was provided for ground transport. The guides spoke good English and were knowledgeable. The cave hotel in Cappadocia was very good.

Terrific guide. Our group of 6 adults hired Ozden Basak of Turkland Tours for a one-day tour of Istanbul and could not be happier with the choice. Ozden's extensive knowledge and obvious love of the city, his charming sense of humor, his command of english, and his desire to please us were evident. He picked us up, took us to the Grand Bazaar, the catacombs, Hagia Sofia, Blue Mosque, and Topkapi Palace with stops for coffee and lunch. He knew which sites to visit when, so we did not have to wait in endless lines. He told us how to avoid unwanted salesmen. At the end of the tour, he brought us to his rug and ceramic shop which I had not anticipated. One couple of our group had planned on buying a rug, and was pleased with the selection and price (after obligatory negotiation and 60% drop in price). The rest of us did not and were able to just say no.

Amazing Ephesus. We booked a private tour of Ephesus with Ozden, owner of Tur,kland Travel. It was spectacular. He met us in Izmir at the Cruise terminal and we immediately struck out in a private van for Ephesus. Ozden was bar none the best! His personnality, enthusiam, customer service professionalism was outstanding. The knowledge of the area, Ephesus, and history he brought was awesome and made this the most memorable stop on our trip. It was truely a VIP experience. Within minutes we felt like we had known him for years. He was very flexible and changed our route to accomodate a side trip to the House of the Virgin Mary. I would highly recommend Turkland Travel, first class and professional. Turkland is a must if visiting Turkey!

THE BEST TOUR COMPANY in Turkey!. My niece and I booked 2 days with Ozden, owner of Turkland Travel and we had a stellar time both days. Ozden met us first in Ephesus and his knowledge of the entire area made for a great day--we felt like we didn't miss anything. We then had a day in Istanbul and we hit all the major sights which are incredible and made time to fit in a bit of shopping also. Ozden knows all the non tourist traps and guided us beautifully,while we had a great time. His professionalism and fun personality made great experiences for us and we hope to see him again!We highly recommend this company!

The WOW Factor. I've been coming in and out of Istanbul for more than twenty years--mainly on business, so one really doesn't get to know the city. I have always considered it such an incredibly fascinating and beautiful place, despite not really having the time to see much of the historical part. Until I was introduced to Ozden at Turkland. I was impressed with his enthusiasm, friendliness--and his historical knowledge goes without saying. Because of him, my husband and I decided to take our Christmas vacation there with our two college-aged sons. Ozden laid out a plan for us and we literally hit the ground running! For ten glorious days, we visited the historical sites, went to some of the most fabulous restaurants we've ever been to, and were shown how to navigate around the city on our own, when we felt like it. Our visit to Istanbul was so positive, it encouraged one of our sons to study Turkish. Ozden and his team made us feel like we were VIPs as well as part of the community. Amazing! We are all planning another trip there during the summer because our trip was so fun and interesting--all thanks to Ozden and his team. Their professionalism is to be noted--as well as their genuine interest in making our trip to their magnificent city a memorable one. My husband and I have since been back to Istanbul three different times since our vacation for business and have looked up Turkland to revisit some of the restaurants they'd recommended during our vacation. Highly, highly recommended!! We will continue to recommend our friends/businesses to Ozden for their journeys to Istanbul.

Ease your way in Istanbul. Turkland Tours were amazing to us. Picked us up on time, took us to all the attractions we defined together, explained everything in detail and knew the answer to almost any question you asked about the experiences themselves. The team really helped us make our trip special and explain every detail we needed to be aware of. They didn't limit us to the amount of time but actually what we wanted to cover and how long we wanted to stay in each place. They had more stories to share than we had capacity to keep all the information. It was easy and simple. Extremely nice people and most of all, completely transparent, honest and organized! Everythig you want in a tour guide team in a foreign country!!!

Istanbul, Turkey. We so appreciate Ozden's arranging a guide for us at the last minute. We got a wonderful review of his services from a neighbor just as we were leaving for Istanbul. He was able to reach out to a guide he trusted and arrange for two days in Istanbul visiting the most important sites. I would recommend his company for its professionalism, knowledge and convenient office in the city center.

Simply amazing!. A special thanks to Ozden our tour guide for making our Turkey experience extra special. Ozden was so helpful, everything was very smooth, from our airport transfers, hotels to day tours! Everything was perfect! We were very spoilt.. Very friendly service and highly recommended :)

Topkapi Palace. Ozden gave a great tour of Topkapi Palace. It was very informative and engaging at the same time. The historical perspective Ozden offered helped us understand the various rooms of the palace, which were beautiful! Ozden is very knowledgeable, and I would not hesitate to recommend him as a tour guide for anyone traveling to Istanbul.

The Best. Ozden was the tour guide for me and my four girl friends during our spring break trip to Istanbul. Ozden took us to Topkapi Palace, the Blue Mosque, the Hagia Sofia, and the Grand Bazaar during our day with him. Ozden was very knowledgable and had great recommendations. He made us feel as though we really had friends in Istanbul. We even ran into him on our boat cruise up the Bosphorus later on during the week. I would recommend a tour from Ozden, or anyone at Turkland Tours, for their trip to Istanbul.

Great Travel agency, they give a wonderful service. Thanks to Ibrahim and Ozden for helping us with the arrangements of our trip to Istanbul and Cappadocia! We had a wonderful time in both places. Ibrahim did an amazing job making all the Hotels arrangements, the tours and the transports from and to the airport. He also gave us very helpful tips about things to do and not to do during our stay in the city.We had an amazing visit to the Spice Bazaar and after that a trip through the Bosphorus with Oz He also took us for lunch to a small fishermen village restaurant. The food was delicious and we liked to visit other places not visited by most of the tourists.We usually like to make our own arrangements when we travel because we have had some bad experiences with tours arranged by travel agencies, but this time everything went perfect and I think that was because this guys really know their job.Thanks Oz and Ibrahim, you made our trip to Istanbul and Cappadocia unforgettable!!

Great tour of Topkapi!. Thank you to Ozden, who arranged a great tour of Topkapi Palace for two! Knowledgable, friendly, charming and not afraid to leave regular talking points behind and engage in great conversation while seeing the sites. Highly recommended! Thank you again, Mr. Ozden!

Great job of arranging a complicated visit. Ibrahim at Turkland arranged a tight 3 day tour through Cappodocia and Ephesus for my family. I was skeptical that we could do it all, but he encouraged us and he was right (although think about finding a restful day or two afterwards to recuperate). Everything was arranged perfectly, from the early morning pick-up in Istanbul through the final return to the airport in Izmir. He chose great hotels and good group tours for us. He also checked in with us by email throughout the tour, and I knew I could reach him at any time if needed Also got to meet Ozden, the owner, who is very friendly and helpful. Ozden arranged a last minute guide for an intro to Istanbul - the guide was excellent. I recommend Turkland if you are thinking about a vacation in Turkey.

Amazing trip, wonderful service. Me and my family had a fantastic trip last year in Istanbul, thanks a million to Ozden:)Very friendly service is just one of the reasons to say why it was great. We visited Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Grand Bazaar ( great shopping no way to skip that part), all must see places in Istanbul with a professional guidance of Oz. Five star quality for airport transfer, very informative and enjoyable guiding no one would miss it I reckon, very good location and great logistic skills and unforgettable memories with highlights of Turkey. Oz, you must be proud of Turkland, keep it up what exactly you have and offer. I’ ll visit Turkey again, this time Ephesus, Pamukkale and of course once again greatest city in all around the world Istanbul. Thanks again and hoping to catch you soon..

As always best service.. I used Turkland travel before and keep recommending them to my family and friends and so far have always positive things said about them. It was no different this time when they helped us with airport transfer (we had 9 big suitcases with us so normally it would have needed to be two taxis) in air conditioned Mercedes vans with friendly professional drivers. I had friends visiting from US. They all had different arrival dates, different times of stay and of course different agendas from doing an Istanbul tour to doing the historical sites or Grand Bazaar to taking a trip to Ephesus to asking for a scuba diving experience close to Istanbul. All it took me to e mail Ozden and he took care of the rest. And actually he was the one to accompany a friend and his son to diving. I have recommended him again to two more friends and am sure all they will say is going to be excellent. Thanks Ozden. And yes we need airport transport this June too. Please make it round trip. :-)
excellent service. i recently visited Istanbul with mt fiance for our honeymoon . It was amazing trip , we had so much thanks to Ozden and his crew. They provided gr

Wonderful hospitality. Turkland Travel was invaluable during my first trip to Turkey with a few friends. It seems like everyone in the country knows Ozden, who we met through a connection in the U.S. That proved to be comforting and useful as we traveled the country and Istanbul itself. All the typical logistics that can cause a headache when you first arrive in a country (airport transfer, lodging, travel arrangements within the country) were coordinated easily through Turkland. Someone was waiting for us at the airport and called us as we arrived at our hostel. Turkland's team also manages a few different properties throughout the city, so you can enjoy different neighborhoods through them.
