A great way to see and enjoy Istanbul. We had a day-off to get to know Istanbul. A friend organised a day-tour around town so we met Sinan who helped us discover the best sights, sounds and scents of this great world city.We'd seriously reccommend him to everyone planning to visit Istambul. You'll be surprised!

A perfect day in Istanbul. We spent the weekend of 7/8 June in Istanbul. It was our first trip to that fascinating city and hence we decided to book a day tour with a private guide. Gladly, we had the chance to have Sinan Sokmen's father, Tolon Sokmen, who has spent 7 years of studies in Austria and thus was fluent in German, as our guide. He took us on a great tour through historic Istanbul with lots of authentic stories around the Turkish culture, society and history. We were overwhelmed by so many impressions and can fully recommand this tour studio to any interested visitor. It is much easier and more fruitful to discover a new city like this.

Highly recommended for a one-stop shop memorable experience!. Unique itinerary, flexibility and skill combined at Istanbul Tour Studio to ensure an unforgettable experience in Istanbul, Turkey! Highly recommended to all friends planning a trip to this part of the world...

A sailing day out to the Princes islands from Istanbul. Sinan kindly arranged a sailing trip aboard a Benneteau racing yacht to visit the islands for a walk and waterside luncheon.Despite an unfavourable start to the day with a storm and lightning - Sinan patiently waited for us until the sun came out and then we made a very pleasant passage across the bay. All worked out perfectly including a surprise visit to a famous local authors house overlooking the harbour!Many thanks to Sinan and Istanbul Tour Studio-day Tours for making my first visit to see Istanbul and my daughter Rhiannon in her adopted city so memorable.

Unique day out in Istanbul. A friend and I were in Istanbul for 5 days and after checking off the mandatory tourist sites, decided to try something different for the afternoon and signed up for the Street Art Tour. It was one of our favorite experiences from the whole trip! Over the course of our 3 hour tour we walked around Karakoy and Taksim neighborhoods, discovered some streets and areas we never would have come across on our own, and more importantly got a really great insight into current culture and politics in Istanbul. We were in the country during a time of some unrest (there were protests regarding the accident at the mine in Soma) and it was amazing to see the street art we saw reflect that in almost real time. Our guide, Sinan, made the tour both extremely insightful and interesting, but also very low key and personal. We felt like we were being taken around by a good friend rather than following a stiff tour around a city. Can't recommend it enough - great way to see a very different side of the city!

Interesting discovery of the less known tourist spots.. The guide speak a very good french and was very talkative. Valuable and detailed knowledge of the visited sites. A very good experience to be recommended.

Street art tour and a unique view of Istanbul. A friend and I spent 4 days in Istanbul, and our afternoon Street Art tour with Sinan, the Founder of Istanbul Tour Studio, proved to be the highlight of our trip, as it gave us a unique perspective of the cityscape. During our 3-hour walk around the Karakoy and Taksim neighborhoods, Sinan shared fascinating insights regarding how street art reflected political, economic, and social movements. Sinan's translations and interpretations of the artwork deepened our understandings of contemporary Turkish society. Sinan's personal involvement with Vote and Beyond, an Istanbul-based civil organization, was also particularly interesting. Sinan was warm and hospitable, also introducing us to his colleague, Ermil, an expert in Istanbul's street art. I would highly recommend this tour to anyone who visits the city and is interested in an experience off the beaten tourist track!

Recommended tour guide. We were given a very informative guide of Topkati Palace by a very trustworthy Sinanthropus. He impressed us with his knowledge, excellent English and friendliness. We would highly recommend Sinan and his company for tours in Istanbul.
Brilliant. Sinan gave is an excellent tour of Topkapi Palace. He has good knowledge of Ottoman history. I can highly recommend Siman and Tour Studio.

Blue mosque. Sinan guided us around the Blue Mosque for an extremely informative review of the place. He was a well mannered guide possessing great English language skills as well as others!.We recommend a tour with him for any traveller

Excellent guide. Excellent guide, knowledgeable, intelligent, a wealth of knowledge, friendly and engaging. Easy to talk to and speaks excellent English. Thanks for making our introduction to Istanbul a good one Sinan!

excellence. Sinan is very knowledgeable and experienced tour guide despite his relatively young age(he is only in his late 20s) and very creative as well as comprehensive about planning and organizing tours. He has lot of energy and creates tailor made tours perfect your interests and goals.He knows the right local places that you don't feel like you are a just tourist visiting Istanbul but at the same time he makes sure that you don't miss any of the beauties and wonders of the magnificent city Istanbul. I have attended few tours in Istanbul and got lot of feedback from other friends who visited with other guides or by themselves. This city is a difficult one. There is so much traffic, so many tourist traps and complicated roads but the greatest history, museums, attractions, shopping and many disguised wonders. Having the right tour guide like Sinan makes a huge difference getting the most out of the city. It definitely worths it. I recommend to everyone

Enjoying Istanbul. My family and me, we got a really interesting experience at Istanbul with these guys from the tour. I can say that it was authentic and unique, seeing Istanbul´s history and culture, but also its food and lifestyle.It´s really recommendable!Enjoy the city!

Athens Half Day Tour. Amazing service. Very punctual pick up at the hotel in the morning. 9 of us on a tour with an outstanding tour guide, Thanos and driver Niko. Thanos is very knowledgable and every where we went, everyone seemed to know him. The tour of the Acropolis and the surrounding area was very interesting. We have used TSC prior to this in Eygpt, Istanbul and now Greece. Will keep going back to them for all of our tour needs while in the countries they serve. Thanks Okan and Hasan for being so dedicated to your service.

Everything planned worked like clockwork. Some weeks before planned departure from Australia our destination point was changed from Istanbul to Athens. Okan at TSC Travel quickly worked with us to prepare a new itinerary for Athens and Crete. Everything worked like clockwork: flights, transfers, accommodation and tour guides. We could not have been happier with the service we received and the wonderful time we had in Greece. Thank you, Okan.

Organisation was spot on for a wonderful tour of Turkey!. Wow! I wouldn't have missed this tour of Turkey for anything. I am an older woman travelling solo and have had the most wonderful time. I decided to deal directly with a travel agent based in Turkey and chose TSC based on the positive reviews it has over a long period of time from Trip Advisor members. I am so glad I did. From my very first email asking for tour options I dealt personally with Melek Ada who organised my travel from start to finish. On my request she added a side trip to Gallipoli before an extension to Jordan. It was also very comforting to seek her first-hand advice during the recent political unrest in Ankara and Istanbul. Melek's professional approach extended to a late adjustment to my tour which was handled seamlessly, giving me an even better tour for no extra charge. Organisation for tours, transfers, flights, and hotels was first class and I have enjoyed such a wonderful trip, including Istanbul, Capadoccia where I had the most amazing hot-air balloon trip, Ephesus, Pamukkale, Troy and Gallipoli. Fabulous from start to finish and would love to go again to see Capadoccia in winter. I have found the Turkish people welcoming and helpful, even though I speak no Turkish. Highly recommended!

Turkey-Greece tailored tour.. Thank you Okan at TSC Travel- for preparing such a wonderful holiday in Turkey and Greece for Kylee and I. I has a spectacular time and thoroughly enjoyed myself. You did an excellent job taking care of our itinerary and hotels. The people who met us were really friendly and insightful.Best wishes,Peta Estens

Well Organized -- Evrything I asked for. I went solo on a 13 day trip to Athens and the Greek Islands. I based my itinerary on what I saw on some of the travel sites. It was not exactly the same as any of the ones I saw. TSC Travel (Okan Kutllu was my contact there) organized everything, precisely as I has requested. They sent me all the vouchers that I would need - and also provided a second copy for me on my arrival at the first hotel on my trip. At each stop I was met by a contact person and taken to the hotel. A tour agent gave me an orientation to that place, never pushing a particular product, but always adjusting their advice to me to my preferences and style. At each of 3 places I asked for some adjustment, either to arrange a tour or to change a pik up time. they always accommodated me without any problem at all. I would certainly use TSC Travel again for a trip to Greece.

Trip of a Lifetime! TSC Great Service and Amazing Staff.. We just came back from a trip to Turkey and Egypt with TSC. It was an amazing experience to travel with our kids 10 & 12 to these beautiful countries. We met good and welcoming people, excellent food and unique cultural landmarks. The guides are very professional, savvy and great fun to be around. Drivers also very polite and believe me in Cairo that is not an easy task.Okan Kutlu worked with us during our planning process and accommodated our requests patiently. He is a true professional! Our guides were great, they are truly passionate about their culture. Nice and smiling Filiz in Izmir & Ephesus. Mensure in Capadoccia was lovely, and great with kids. Mustafa in Istanbul, was very knowledgeable and with great humor took us to great places and unique pic spots. Last but not least, truly master of knowledge Mohammed in Egypt. It was as if we traveled in a time machine thousands of years back in time while we listened to his stories. We traveled during Ramadan and that became a bonus as we learned first hand from this unique culture. This is what traveling is about: opening our minds and learning different cultures. Grateful to share this experience with our kids. Thank you TSC.Truly recommend this trip to any family. Well organized and safe. Go now! No crowds

The best ever experience. We have just returned from a 20 day tour of Turkey and could not fault anything with TSC travel. We dealt with Melek Ada from the start. Melek was very prompt with her replies via email and organised the whole trip and regularly changed things to suit our needs without a worry. From airport transfers to pick ups for tours, guides, internal flights, transport, accommodation and gulet cruise were perfect in every way. We felt very safe the whole time in Turkey and have no hesitation in recommending a holiday in Turkey and TSC. Turkey and it's beautiful people need tourist so give it a go. Paul& Kay Lake Macquarie Australia

New Year With Nile River Cruise.... When my husband and I picked Egypt as our destination to start the New Year, everybody told us that it was insane! !!Traveling there with so much turmoil in the region, especially after the Russian airplane crash, according to travel advisory, was a huge risk that nobody in the right mind should take. We even feared that we would not find a flight from London, after spending Christmas there. But we did! And we had an awesome time! !!:)))At first it was just my husband and I traveling from New Jersey. I found TSC travel after a long online research. Ms. Melek was a great travel expert and answered, patiently, all the questions that I had. So the land package with internal flights were booked. Then, my daughter who resides in Abu Dhabi, said she would join us; and then get friend who resides in New York City also decided to join us! Ms Melek was so patient, understanding, and accommodating, that she deserves a crown, really. When the arrangements were completed, were so excited and could not wait. I don't want to bother you with all the details, but from the moment of our arrival at Cairo, transfers to Giza and Cairo hotels, until our departure, the trip was top notch. The drivers, the egyptologists and the sites were incredible! Their pride at sharing with us their heritage and their history. Such humble people...the fact that they appreciated our visit even more, during a time when most travelers are afraid to go. The feeling of helping the economy while having such a wonderful time, is really hard to describe. The pyramids were more than what we have seen in history books and movies.Please go see the amazing catacombs in Alexandria. A Nile river cruise can't be missed. So you can visit the temples along the river banks. The dam in Aswan, the colossus of Menon, the God Sobek in Kom Ombo. And a hot air balloon in Luxor.Finally, the Cairo museum, which, will be final piece to bring the puzzle together. A must!I have to share with you, that years ago, I used to be travel consultant with a world renowned travel company. I knew what I wanted, and how I wanted it. TSC travel and their great staff, delivered 110% of the time. Thank you Ms. Melek! :)So, don't be afraid. Go to Egypt! Go with TSC and you will be protected, informed and most importantly, you will have memories to last you the rest of your lives!!!Sincerely, Elizabeth and Howard

The best organized tour we have ever had!!!. We spent an incredibly active week in Turkey organized by TSC Travel, and everything went perfectly. We are so grateful and appreciative. We had the best tour guides. They planned our days flexibly to get all the major attractions in and also leisurely enjoy restaurants and some free time. They even took us to special places that we requested--even some shopping places. We also flew to Cappadocia and had a balloon ride. All of our transportation including pickups and transfers went flawlessly. I lost my cell phone on one of the flights, and the TSC driver contacted the airline, and found it and had it delivered to our hotel!! The level of care and overall quality (and value) were absolutely the best. I highly, highly recommend them.

Tour the remnants of the 7 Churches in Asia Minor mentioned in the Book of Revelation. Mrs (Phyliss) Teleri and assigned driver provided thorough visit to available and related archelogical sites. Our expectations were exceeded by Phyliss' professionalism, and excellent grasp of the related Historical, Archeological, as well as the Biblical text on the subject. She and her assigned driver went beyond to meet the needs of my family, to make the trip informative, enjoyable, comfortable, safe, and even afforded to visit shops for local products that are of interest to us.

Customized Cappadocia/Pamukkale Trip. Okan responded immediately to my query for a very short trip, hitting the highlights to these two natural wonders and he did so with great speed and was on top of the entire itinerary from day one. We stayed at an excellent cave hotel (Dere Suites) and our guides were friendly and accommodating. We did not have to worry about safety or anything the entire trip. Thank you, Okan. I would definitely go with you again on our next travel to Turkey.

2 day Troy/Gallipoli ex Istanbul. This was a fabulous 2 daysThe Crowded House people were brilliantTroy was fantastic (don't believe what you hear)We had to be on the beach at a certain time at Anzac as it was exactly 100 years after my great-uncle had been killed there - we were dropped over there for the morning no problems and had the place to ourselves which was perfectThe Gallipoli tour in the afternoon was also top shelf - the guide was great and we swapped a few photos and letters after we got home so he could share our story with others.All transport and all meals were also more than adequate.I'd only suggest that if you go take the two day tour on the 1st and on a 3rd day, and stay 2 nights in Canakkale (the overnight bit is at your cost anyway). Then you can take a day to look around Canakkale which was a really nice place and we've heard since is well worth the visit....

Amazing10-day Western Turkey Tour. My husband, 2 adult childre, and I took a 10-day Turkey Specialist Tour through TSC Travel December 19-29, 2016. While I was initially skeptical about booking an extensive tour online with an Istanbul travel agency, I'm very glad we did. Okan Kutlu was so helpful during the booking process -- even going so far as to call me from Istanbul to help me make some customization decisions. When my daughter lost her passport in the airport at the beginning of our trip, our tour guide, Mustafa Ozdemir, spent several hours of his personal time at the airport with my daughter and husband locating and questioning numerous airport and police officials and was able to find her passport -- something we would not have been able to do on our own, since very few of the officials spoke English. In addition to saving the day (and much of the trip) by finding the lost passport, Mustaf expertly guided us through a wonderful tour of Istanbul, Ankara, Capadoccia, Konya, Heiropolis, Ephesus, Troy, and Gallipoli (and other wonderful attractions along the way). We would not have fully appreciated all that we saw without his assistance. The tour package included many meals and tourist class hotels. With the exception of Le Bleu in Kusadasi (a wonderful hotel with a balcony view of sunset over the Aegean), the hotels themselves were older and showing their age. however, the staff at those hotels more than made up for the lack of fancy accommodations. We particularly appreciated the staff at the Ferman Sultan in Istanbul and also the staff at the Grand Anzac in Cannukkale, who made breakfast an hour early to accommodate our schedule. However, you might consider some hotel upgrades if more plush accommodations are important to you. We also want to make note of the 2 very professional, skilled, and safe van drivers TSC Travel provided -- one for our 3 airport transfers in Instanbul, and the other who picked us up in Ankara and spent a week week driving us around the Turkish countryside and back to Istanbul. I highly recommend TSC Travel to anyone planning a trip to Turkey.

great weekend - thanks to TSC. i landed right on time at Istanbul's Ataturk airport. My TSC driver was waiting there to whisk me off to the city. I was out of the airport in no-time and we drive to my hotel. The room was ready - beautiful room on the 23rd floor with a view of the Bosphurus. Marriott Sisli was definitely a great choice that TSC made for me. Great front desk staff, large rooms, I had explained to Okan of TSC exactly what I wanted out of my short time in Istanbul, and he made it happen. The dinner TSC organized for me was spectacular. We went to the 365 restaurant. Delicious cutting edge Turkish recipes in a 21st century presentation. I was advised where to walk around, what bars, shops, malls I would enjoy. Perfectly arranged weekend.

4 Days in Istanbul. I booked my Istanbul guided tour with TSC Travel based on the reviews I read online...I wasn't disappointed. We went to Istanbul on the 1st week of Dec. 2015. Everything was very organized, from Airport transfers to hotel stays to daily guided tours. We stayed at a beautiful hotel steps away from Basilica Cistern, Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque. Mustafa was a wonderful guide and very caring (he didn't want us to get lost in the Grand Bazaar). Visited the Spice Market and couldn't be happier with the purchase we made. The Turkish Delight was a big hit when we got home. Okan organized our trip to every detail and everything went accordingly. Can't wait to go back and do the rest of Turkey. I will definitely contact TSC Travel.

Amazing Five-Day Trip in Central and Western Turkey. My family and I went on an amazing trip throughout Turkey that I would highly recommend to everyone!We started our five day trip by flying into Kayseri where our driver and our excellent and knowledgable guide Koray Yasa was waiting for us. From Kayseri, we drove to Cappadocia, where we spent the next day studying its unique beautiful landscape, bargaining for the best deals with local artisans, experiencing turkish dancing first-hand and discovering the caves rock formations that ancient Christians had made their homes during times of persecution.The next day was just as interesting as we travelled to Konya to learn about the poet Rumi and Sufism, a religious movement within Islam.Following our exploration of Islamic culture on Tuesday, it felt as if we went back in time on Wednesday, Thursday and Friday because of how many Hellenistic cities we were able to discover as we travelled to Turkey's west coast. Our stop in Pamukkale contained the ruins of an ancient health spa, where weary travelers from all over the ancient world tried to get better. Similarly, our stop in Ephesus revealed a massive ancient city, where 500,000 ancient people lived at a time. Finally, our stop in Pergamon on Friday showed a unique ancient on a magnificent hill that overlooked the countryside.This is just a taste of what we experienced in Turkey and this review does not fully capture all the great experiences and meals we had. What I will say in closing was that our tour guide Koray Yasa was excellent. His knowledge of the archeology greatly improved our experience and his kindness made him someone we were happy to have around.I cannot recommend this trip more to anyone who is looking for a true adventure that they will never forget.
Ebu was amazing!. We did a great one day tour with Ebu, he was so kind and helpful and the tour was very interesting. It made our site seeing so much richer. We Hope to see you again Ebu!

3 wonderful days on Cappadocia. My wife and I added a 3 day Cappadocia tour with TSC Travel following our Gallipoli Tour in August. Initially, our travel agent had us booked on a different tour but following some internet investigations I decided to "take a chance" with TSC Travel. They were much cheaper than the original travel co. and our agent had no previous dealings with TSC so we were a little apprehensive to start with.We were staying in Istanbul the night before and received a "welcome" pack from TSC delivered to our hotel room. In the pack was some relevant itinerary information etc. some cute souvenirs and some local sweets. The following morning we were picked up from our hotel and driven to the airport for the 1 hour early morning flight to Kayseri. Upon arrival at Kayseri Airport we were met by our transfer driver and then journeyed the 1 hour to Goreme', here we were met by our tour guide for the next 2 days. The whole tour was faultless. Our guide was thoroughly knowledgeable on everything and place we saw. She was simply wonderful. The transport was excellent, the Driver was waiting for us when needed. The inclusive meals were great. The itinerary was very comprehensive and complete. We had a wonderful visit to Cappadocia, made very special by the TSC Travel people.The only complaint I could possibly make was the transfer back to Kayseri was not pleasant. The driver seemed to be having a bad day and was driving a bit more radically than is the norm in Turkey.

Great tour guide Mustafa Ozdemir. Just completed a 9 day tour of Turkey, liked the small group. Great driver, felt safe. Tour guide Mustafa Ozdemir was good company, very professional and explained things well. Everything on time with good accommodation and great meals - Gluten Free options were much appreciated. Would recommend this tour.

Fantastic tour to Cappadocia,Pamukale, Hierapolis and other with Koray from TSC. My husband and I booked an 8 day tour to Istambul ,Cappadocia,Hierapolis Afrodisia. It was fantastic,the tour guide Koray was great.We recommend this company to everybody,they are very proffesional,nice and look after the tourist in everyway.

Very good tour guides,very reliable company. We are doing are trip to Turkey with TSC,they are very proffesionals and reliable.
We had a wonderful time in Istambul,felt safe and enjoyed it every moment.I recommend to contact Okan,from that agency.

Wonderful, Efficient & Magnificent Tours!!. I have just completed a 25 day tour of Turkey & Greece, all of which was organised by TSC Tours! I'm the type of person that likes to research and ask questions but Mrs Melek Alda was patient and organised the perfect tour for me! Every transfer was on time and every tour guide was professional, informative & friendly. Melek always returned my emails quickly and answered every question, no request was too hard & she exceeded my expectations ! If you are going to Turkey TSC Travel is a MUST... ! I'll be using them again!

Great value, great tour guides and great service. We have traveled a lot all over the world by ourselves but this was the first "tour" we have ever taken. We booked a 9-day tour with TSC. From the beginning Okan was very responsive and helpful in planning our trip. We really wanted a small group, not too much road traveling, clean hotels, etc., and he made sure we had all our needs taken care of. Our trip included Istanbul, Cappadocia, Konya, Pamukkale, Aphrodisias, Kusadasi, Ephesus, Pergamon, Troy, Canakkale and Gallipoli. All was very interesting although Konya is a very important historical site for the Turkish people was the least interesting in regards to things to see. Troy is one of those places you feel you must see but the horse there is a replica and there is still some controversy as to whether this place is the actual city of Troy or just another ancient city. We had Mustafa for the majority of our tour and he was very knowledgeable on the history and culture of Turkey as well as a lot of fun. Ebu was our guide for Istanbul - a professor of art history, he was an encyclopedia of information related to Turkish history. Both were very responsive to our daily needs and we would highly recommend them. The hotels TSC booked were adequate - some better than others. Many of the meals provided were buffets and were also adequate. I'll review the locations, hotels and some of the restaurants in separate reviews.

All tours were done as scheduled, hotels were fab, but nobody told me I had to pay daily visit to shops. TSC Travel is a good option for your tour in Turkey. I did a 5day tour including Capadocia, Pamukhale and Ephesus and everything went according to schedule: daily transfers, hotel checkins, daily tourist guides, all internal flights. And this is quite important. Having said that my experience was a bit disappointing. Everyday guide tours will take to your tour and...they will basically force you to pay a visit to a leather factory shop, or a silk shop or any other place where they can make more Money using your time. I felt I was being used. Imagine that everyday I woke up around 4am to catch a flight and by mid afternoon after my tour I would like to enjoy my time at my hotel, but we lost 30min in a local shop that was not scheduled anywhere. Sorry TSC, but you must be more transparent here and tell customers in advance. This sucks! Quality of restaurants in everyday tour were poor. Big buffets with good variety and poor quality. No sign of a homemade turkey cuisine or something memorable. I was expecting more. Finally, Mustapha was our best guide in the week. Very attentive, good sense of humour.
Tsc Travel agency Turkey. Never have been in Turkey beforeGreat agency, great people.Thank you so much Mustafa Ozdemir and Esref Koksal!!!!Highly recommended!

TSC Excellent service. From the start of our booking with TSC , Okan have provided us with the excellent services that made you felt confident of having their company to arrange for your stay in Turkey and Greek islands and to assist you thru'out your stays. We have encounters many problems long the way before our journey but he assure us that everything gonna be smooth. His advices and suggestion is really helpful.Many thanks to our tour leader Mr Koray for being patience and enduring thru'out our journey . Such a dedicated guide and a brother to our group. We definitely will return and ask for you to be our tour guide again Also not forgetting our driver, Mr Asdev, whom have made our journey safe and fun by his professional driving.Again a compliment to TSC for choosing beautiful hotels for our stays in Turkey we wish we can spend longer time at the hotels and off course the excellent choice of food for our lunch and dinner were superb. We all brings back weight home Many thanks to all the TSC group and we sure will come back and we will definitely recommend TSC to our friends

An excellent experience in Cappadoccia. We signed up for a 3 day/2 night tour of Cappadocia with TSC Travel based on other TripAdvisor reviews. Booking the trip was easy and straightforward and pleasant. The staff (Okan) were very responsive and made everything smooth. The trip to Cappadoccia from Istanbul was handled very well and went like clockwork.The experience in Cappadoccia was amazing. The guide on the first day, Alp, was incredible and provided a huge amount of information on life in the area area since the Hittite empire into the foundation of Christianity through the present day. He had a very completely knowledge of the history and geology of the region. The Fairy Chimneys, cave dwellings and the Open Air Museum were very fascinating. On the next day, the trek through the Rose Valley, with Safaida (spelling?) was great, next time around I'll have to hike more, it was beautiful. Also her knowledge of the history and thorough, particularly with respect to the archaeology of the underground cities. Cappadoccia is a wonderful area, and I would recommend anyone visit. I would also recommend TSC Travel. If we're back in the area, I'll book tours with them.My one and only gripe was with the pickup on the trip back to Istanbul. If it were up to me I would have arranged the pick up an hour earlier (even though the hotel manager waved it off and said we'd be fine). We ended up in Kayseri airport with about a hour before the flight was to take off. As it turned out, the flight was delayed and the huge line moved quickly enough to make the flight. I tend to like to leave plenty of time before flights.

Trip of a lifetime. Our tour to Ephesus, Pergamum, and Pamukkale was a dream come true. Corey (sp?) and Phyllis were excellent and knowledgeable guides and since there were only 3 of us in the group it was very personalized. They showed us things we would never have found with the guidebooks.
Capadocia. Trip was very good. Hotels were good, but could have been better. Capadocia is a place that nobody should miss. TSC travel was very good and provided very good service.
Beautiful Istanbul. Amazing city. The transportation, the hotel accommodation and the tours were amazing. Great service!

Day tour of Pyramids and Nile Cruise. We had a fantastic tour of the Pyramids and a dinner cruise on the Nile. I booked the tours and handled everything with Melek Ada through the internet. We were picked up on time at our hotel in an air conditioned van, had an english speaking guide and the price included all tickets and lunch at a nice restaurant. The guide was extremely knowledgeable and provided most of her narrative in the air-conditioned comfort of the van then provided a short walking tour of the site. She also took us to some great spots to take pictures. I highly recommend TSC as a professional and trustworthy travel company. And the price was very reasonable.
Turkey Biblical Tour. Fantastic history, spectacular views and pleasant people !!! Kind, knowledgeable, and very professional guides. TSC can be trusted to provide a great tour.

No complaints. Everything they organised for us was terrific. Timing was spot on. All tour guides were very informative and knew their product. At times tended to be descriptive for us, but others like this information. Probably better to get more information than less.

TSC is the best! Wonderful arrangements and a great Guide. Our trip to Cappadocia was awesome.. From the start, Okan was extremely quick and professional. We wanted a private tour for our 3 days in Cappadocia, and he handled all our transportation, air travel and guide requirements. Every email was responded to quickly and competently. The cars he arranged were excellent and the airport transfers were ontime. A special mention for Mr. Ali who transferred us from the airport in Istanbul (SAW) to our hotel on our return from Cappadocia. An outstanding person and very professional driver. Our Guide, Ms.Mensure, was superb. She shared as much as we could absorb in competent English, and was always responsive to our needs, assessing our interests very well. She rearranged our schedule to suit our energy levels and suggested alternatives. She was always upbeat and professional and was like a dear friend at the end of our third day. Please ask for her, if you can.I would strongly recommend TSC and have no hesitation in endorsing their tours. They have emergency telephone numbers in the event you need to contact them in an emergency.

Gallipoli & Troy. Fantastic two day tour. Everything we expected and more such as to our surprise, breakfast and lunch were included on the drive from Istanbul and dinner included in the overnight hotel stay. (Not mentioned in the TSC Itinerary)The guides were excellent & the tour was great value.

Family holiday to Cappadocia, Pamukkale, Bursa and Istanbul 12-22 August 2015. We were a family group of 10 adults (ages 30-68 yrs) and 1 five year old child using TSC for the first time. We had a wonderful time touring the above places and were well taken of by our guide Mustafa Ozdemir who became a part of the family by the end of the tour. He was very friendly, caring, fun and knowledgeable. Our driver, Esref Koksal too was very helpful and took us from place to place safely and it was sad when we had to say goodbye to him in Istanbul. Our hotels were very satisfactory and rest assured we will be using TSC again should we come back to this beautiful country.

Enjoyable guides that allowed us to make Wonderful Memories!. We are very grateful to have friends who invited us to plan our visit in Turkey with them. Okan was very responsive to our requests to what we had desired to see. He recommended a great and pleasurable hotel with a great staff for our stay in Istanbul.  Due to time constraints, we had only 2 days, one day at Kusadasi and Ephesus and one day in Istanbul however with our great guides they made them incredible.   Phylliss met us at the Kusadasi Port, and we began our day. She greeted us with a gentle smile and is very enjoyable to talk with. We quickly learned she is very knowledgeable and always allowed us to take our time and just to enjoy the view, .  The traditional lunch that was included in the plans was awesome, It gave us a true taste of Turkish flavor. At each of the areas we visited with her, everyone was so friendly and made you feel like you were just part of the family. Her timing made the entire day very pleasurable! Istanbul, is simply amazing and i hope that you get the chance to experience it with the same guide we had.  Moustapha was simply AWESOME!. Because of the need to make some "Real-Time" adjustments( which were out of our control) , to our travel schedule he was able to handle the requests we had and make changes as we were enjoying the sights, always making sure he was present for any questions.  We never felt rushed, and allowing us a very relaxing ride to enjoy the Bosphorus Boat tour without worry. At all of the sites, we explored he would explain to us about the area, and what we wanted to make sure we saw, even taking us up to certain spots, to make sure you see a certain view of an area. He always gave us time to explore on our own as we visited sites, and always gave us time to ask specific questions while touring about the area we were in. Again, at the right time, Lunch was provided and this gave us another wonderful experience of the Turkish food, and enjoying the flavors and still having time to relax. Moustapha covered a lot of of area in our time with him, and we will have fond memories of our visit in Istanbul because of his efforts.  TSC is a truly a complete agency, Okan had arranged our transfer from the hotel, I was a little worried since it was a very early pick-up, Moustapha again called and followed up and confirmed the transfer. The driver was very friendly and got us to the Airport very quick in time for us to enjoy breakfast before our flight. Words are not enough to express our appreciation for the services that TSC provided to us for our time in Turkey. I have let friends, colleagues and family knowif they plan to travel to Turkey that I have the information for the agency and team tomake their adventures very memorable!

The Best Tour Plans & Guides EVER!!!. We spent three incredible days (one day at Ephesus and surrounding area and two days in Istanbul) with TSC guides. Okan was wonderfully responsive in all our pre-planning. He answered emails almost as fast we we wrote them and was very patient with our many questions. The day at Ephesus could not have been better with our very knowledgeable, extremely friendly, and just-a-great-person guide, Phylliss. In Istanbul, we covered in 2 days what I imagine most people do in 4-5 days, and we never felt rushed. Our guide Moustapha did everything he could to maximize the experience for us, and he made real-time adjustments to meet our needs and desires to see as much as we could. We loved meeting both of them (as well as getting to know Okan and Hasan, the owners of the travel agency). I cannot recommend highly enough this service and will let all my friends know who travel to Turkey, Israel, etc. to contact Okan and plan the vacation of a lifetime!!

En route Turkiye. It was our first long distance travel for leisure..and it was amazing. We were fortunate that we decided to go to Turkey this summer...the climate was good..days were longer. We were travelling from Qatar with a group of 10 including an infant. Tsc travels were the agency who took care of us throughout the trip. The guides were great. Erdem, Burcu and Mensure were our guides and they were really nice. I would totally reccommend tsc travels as they are really cooperative and friendly. Mr Salim is someone we are so greatful for his service. When we were going to return to qatar, from istanbul ataturk airport, my aunt lost her hand bag which itself is 1500 qatar riyals. We only noticed the bag was missing when the flight was about to leave...so we couldn't do much to find the bag. We contacted Mr Salim, our tour coordinator in turkey to inform abt this. And this man a day later comes with the happy news..that he found the bag. Thats the service we all look forward to from a travels right? Hats off to yu Salem. About the trip. We loved it, so much to see. Great place for photography lovers. Spend more time in Istanbul...so much to explore. Have fun :)

Made life easy. I used TSC Travel for my recent trip to Turkey. I was planning to meet friends later on my trip and I wanted travel a bit before I met up with them. Okan and the team at TSC couldn't have been more helpful in arranging the trip dates and alterations to the regular tour to accommodate me. They were happy with last minute changes - nothing seemed too hard. Everything went smoothly. I was having a day on my own in Istanbul, and Okan even rang to make sure I took care as there were some political demonstrations happening that day. I was travelling on my own and it was nice to think that someone was looking out for me. The pickups were all on time, the tour leaders and drivers were knowledgeable and interesting. I don't know the names of all the tour leaders or drivers, but a special thanks to Koray for guiding me through Ephesus and to Esref my driver for getting me to the bus stop in Aydin in plenty of time. If you are travelling to Turkey and want to book a tour then I would highly recommend using TSC.

Turkey Travels. Ours was an 11 day, comprehensive trip throughout the western half of Turkey, from Istanbul to Ankara, Cappadocia, Konya, Permukkale, Kusadasi, Bergama, Canakkale, and back to Istanbul. We saw all of the important sites along the way. Guides were all knowledgable, friendly, and tailored the trip to the participants. Buses were all air-conditioned and very comfortable. We had free time to do some exploring and relaxing, and were given good suggestions by the guides on how to spend this time. The trip was extremely affordable, and covered all expenses except for a few meals. I was traveling with my young adult son, and the trip met all of our needs. I would HIGHLY recommend this tour company for anybody visiting Turkey!!

Good experience, great people. Very pleased with most of the aspects of the tours. Not completely satisfied with the choice of hotels; they were more 3.5 stars than 4-5 stars. Avoid Turkey, most of the people are ignorant & not willing to help at all. Tour guides were very down to earth people except the one in Cappadocia; she had an attitude & was a bit too personal with her questions. Would recommend to first time tourists..

Terrific custom tour agency. This was our first trip to Turkey, and I inquired by email with several agencies on line about just gullet sail-boat cruises, as well as TSC since it was reviewed on TripAdvisor. TSC replied the next day, and the same associate worked with me in planning the cruise and then customizing an additional week around it. I had specific sites and cities I wanted to visit, and they came up with a custom itinerary, with a comprehensive price including airport transfers, three flights, three hotels, plus the week cruise. It took dozens to emails, but just one phone call, and a leap of faith. But now I can recommend them without hesitation! The hotels were great boutique hotels. The four day tours turned out to be pretty private affairs in luxury vans, with friendly, knowledgable, professional tour guides. The only glitch was that two of the hotel to airport transfers were pretty late (45 min and 60 min) since they were picking up from several hotels. But calling their 24 hr help-line got us information about the drivers, and we did make it to the airport in enough time. Pegasus Air also lost a suitcase in transit, but thanks to TSC we had a driver waiting at the airport, and made it to our private tour of Ephesus; the suitcase was awaiting us at the hotel when we checked in at the end of the day. We spent another ten days in Istanbul on our own, and that worked out fine. But it was GREAT to have TSC organize all the other days. We managed to efficiently and comfortably squeeze in many wonderful experiences in Turkey thanks to them. I think it might have even been more economical than if we had tried to purchase all the hotels, airfares, taxi rides, and group tours on our own. Thanks a million TSC!

Excellent ! Day tour of Istanbul !. We'd booked this tour from Australia some time back and you never know what to expect. Istanbul is a magic city and better than many we've seen.We (3) were picked up promptly by Summit (apologies for spelling) from our hotel (Conrad Hilton in Besiktas) and taken to a central point where two other young american girls joined us. It was meant to be a small tour so us 3 and 2 made 5 - a good number. Our male guide was excellent. He knew it all but didn't bombard us with facts as some do. He just gave us enough then allowed questions. We went to all of the highlights - no queues, no fees, no fuss. On another similar tour some time back we'd paid quite a bit then been asked to pay the entrance fees. He got us in quick - around the queues - and always pointed out bathrooms and drinks if we needed them. He took us to a marvelous restaurant for lunch. Top food. Top beer. As it was Ramadan it was quite empty. The highlight of the tour was going to the Roman Cisterns - something we really wanted to do. Awesome. We spent some time there. We also saw all the Museums, palaces, markets, churches etc. BUT - and its a big BUT - we walked to them all. It was so easy. Anne is not a great walker but she loved it. Everything is so close. And this was part of the tour - down back streets - into little alleys - around markets. so exciting and fun. Tim - our son loved it.I'd highly recommend them. We were dropped back to the Conrad without any mention of tips - as some do - with their veiled messages and boxes. But we did tip as it had been a wonderful day. Thanks to all involved. Well worth the money and time. Highly recommended. Happy to answer questions. Special thanks to Okan and Summit (apologies for spelling).
Visit to Turkey in general. The day tours were very well organized. The guide was very knowledgeble and with a good sense of humor. Very friendly also.

My Turkey trip. Good 3 star hotels, excellent tour guides, very knowledgeable, respectful and friendly. Koray accompanied us for 6 days and was always ready to help, listen and attend to our needs. Thanks!!!!

Wonderful trip to Turkey and Greece. Overall, my adult daughter and I were very pleased with the tour and the company. Okan is very patient and answered all my questions regarding traveling alone or with a family member. I was unsure about the financial aspects of the final payment being in cash but I trusted Okan and it was fine. I really liked all the places that they picked to visit in Turkey. I was happy with the hotels in Istanbul (although it changed when we arrived) and in Kudasasi. All the transports were timely and so were the tour guides. We were pleasantly surprised to receive a welcome gift bag. We liked that the hotel was a close walk to the historical area of Istanbul and an easy walk to the town center of Kusadaki. We were happy with the hotels and all the meals that were included in the tour. The tour guides were knowledgeable of the history, the sites and the cultures. They all spoke excellent English and are personable. I am probably not spelling the names correctly but each day in Turkey we had a different guide, Samet, Iilicu, Boorjah, Felicity. They were all wonderful. I liked that the tour company is flexible. One day there was a half day tour and we were unable to go in the morning so they arranged for us to go in the afternoon. One of the sites was closed on a Monday so they provided us tickets to attend the next day. We were promptly met in Athens and liked the hotel there on our first and last night in Athens. The second day we needed to walk with our suitcases (the hotel stored luggage that we did not need) to another site to meet up with our 4 day Greek tour with GO tours. We had a wonderful bus driver, "George" and tour guide Melista (spelling?). Her English is excellent, her historical knowledge and Greek mythology knowledge is impressive. George is an amazing bus driver. He drove 900 miles and fixed the air conditioning of the bus on the way back to Athens. We saw amazing sites during those 4 days. My only negative is some of the hotels that we stayed at, especially in Delphi. My previous experience has been everyone on the tour stays at the same hotel but I guess I booked tourist class vs first class and it was worse than Motel 6 in the US. Fortunately, it was for only 1 night at each stop and our fellow travelers were lovely. Back in Athens we did the 1/2 day city trip which was amazing since we also got to see the Changing of the Guards at the tomb of the unknown soldier. The tour company is also flexible to arrange a ride to the ferry vs airport. I would rec

The perfect tour of Western Turkey !!! 10/10. I wanted to do a tour of Turkey starting in Istanbul, and ending up in Kusadasi, so I could cross over into Samos, Greece from there.I could not have picked a better tour, even if I had organised it myself.Guides Koray and Filiz, and the tour driver were exceptional - friendly, knowledgeable and great hosts.Gallipoli, Troy, Pergamon and Ephesus were all amazing.Many thanks to Okan of TSC Tours for his help and communication in setting it up for us.

Excellent Tours in Cappadocia. We booked the 2 Day "Cappadocia Explorer Tour" and then decided to add on a 3rd, day-long tour rather than simply head back to Istanbul on our 3rd morning. The actual tours provided by TSC were outstanding. Both guides we had (Mansura for our 2 day tour and Recep for our 3rd day) were friendly, personable, very knowledgeable about the attractions and the area in general, and well-organized. The tours did a good job of avoiding the worst crowds and attractions that appeared to be "tourist traps" and left us feeling that we had seen a good portion of a vast and fascinating region. The crafts demonstrations all were very interesting and offered high-quality merchandise. Unlike some of the other companies whose reviews I read, these were a small (and in my mind appropriate) part of our tour as opposed to being a focal point. The included lunches ranged from acceptable to very good, and our lunch on the 2nd day was a very nice overview of Turkish cuisine. Our groups were kept small (4 total people for the 1st 2 days, 8 for the 3rd) and this allowed us to enjoy the experience. My only complaint is that the time between transit to and from Istanbul and the tours is very tight. Our flight from Istanbul was delayed by an hour, and had our entire tour not been on it, we would have missed part of our itinerary in Cappadocia. On our way back, the shuttle was late leaving for Kayseri airport, went to several pick-ups who weren't there, and stopped for gas with a van full of people who were very close to missing their flights. We did make our flight, but did so by clearing security at the posted boarding time. Another delay made it a moot point, but it made for a less than relaxing end to an outstanding tour. However, despite the transit issues, I feel TSC is worth traveling with and its tours were superior to those that we saw going on around us. I was very happy with our Cappadocia tour and I would recommend TSC's packages to anyone who wants a comprehensive look at this vast and beautiful region.

Turkey Highlights . We had a six-day Turkey tour in May with Mustafa our friendly knowledgable guide and Esref our trusty driver. Our group was small (seven) and very friendly. The hotels (especially Heybe Hotel in Goreme and Sentido Suites in Kusadasi) were excellent and the meals were delicious and plentiful. Our bus was very comfortable and the itinerary included all the highlights we hoped for. Mustafa inspired us with his passion and insights into the rich cultural and political history of his country. There were numerous 'wow' moments including Cappadocia and the ancient cave churches, Rumi's tomb in Konye and the ancient ruins of Ephesus and Aphrodisia. There were a number of shopping 'opportunities', leather factories, carpet factories, potteries where we were treated to demonstrations of silk spinning, carpet weaving and clay wheel work. These were highly informative and entertaining, however on occasions the salesmanship afterwards took up rather too much of our limited tour time. A lasting impression is of the great camaraderie that developed throughout the tour, led by Mustafa with his infectious cheeky sense of fun and great energy. We would highly recommend this tour.

Inredibly wonderful 10 days touring in Turkey with TSC. Our trip to Turkey was amazing thanks to TSC Travel and Okan. When we began to plan the trip I had read reviews about TSC that were so positive I contacted them. We suggested sites and Okan immediately sent possible itineraries. He even gave us a telephone call to answer some of our questions. We settled on a 10 day tour with a 7 day group and several days in Istanbul at the end. We had some trepidation about traveling with a group because we had never done so, always travelling on our own. But we need not have worried. When we met the other two couples on the tour it was like meeting old friends. We immediately bonded. And with the addition of our WONDERFUL guide Koray Yasa, the trip was great fun and all we could have wanted.Koray was very knowledgeable about all the sites and he made history come alive. . He also patiently answered our constant questions. He was positive, fun, and accommodating, and each day was another great adventure. Whatever our needs, such as changing the order on our itinerary, or help finding a camera shop when our camera died, or finding the nearest rest stop, he'd make it happen. And our driver Suayip was very competent and made us feel safe in the spotless van. Our hotels were lovely, the beds very comfortable, and the breakfast spreads delicious. Our 7 day tour ended and we spent another 5 days in Istanbul at a great hotel in the heart of the old city where we could walk to many major sites. Okan arranged for the hotel and two days of touring Istanbul with a lovely and knowledgeable young woman . He also neatly arranged all the transport to and from the airports. It was a trip of lifetime thanks to Okan and his team. I would recommend TSC Travel to anyone who wanted to visit Turkey.

History and beauty - just wonderful. From my collection at Ankara airport on 5/7/15 to my drop off at Kusadisi I enjoyed the most wonderful experiences I could have hoped for on my 5 day tour with TSC. We were a very small group and our guide, Koray, shared his wealth of knowledge and love for his country with enthusiasm and professionalism and was always aware of our comfort - nothing was too much trouble. From Cappadocia to Pamukkale to Ephesus - what an amazing and beautiful country. A return visit is definitely in my future travel plans. Thankyou TSC for making my first solo trip a positive and rewarding experience.

Fantastic vacation in Turkey. We used TSC to plan a 9 day itinerary for Turkey for 6 family members. Okan responded to our initial enquiries quickly and adapted the itinerary with minimal fuss. We arrived in Istanbul at 5am and met our tour guide Mustafa Ozdemir, who was with us for the full duration of the tour. Mustafa had a great sense of humour and kept us entertained throughout the tour. He was also very knowledgeable about the attractions that we visited each day. Our driver for the majority of the trip was Ashraf was safe and cautious as we made our way around Turkey. The whole trip was a fantastic experience and I would reccommend TSC without any hesitation.

History, beauty and culture!. We used TSC with our plans in Istanbul, Cappedoccia, and the Ionian coast and Greek/Roman sites. Our three different guides were all knowledgeable, pleasant, informative and comfortable. The hotel selections were all acceptable and reasonably priced and best of all, travel transfers from place to place with air, private vans, etc was seamless and flawless. We had pre-booked a couple of hotels ourselves and we were concerned how this would mesh. No problems. In the one or two instances of minor issues, Okan squared us away immediately. We spent over three weeks in Turkey and found the country charming and safe. Thank you to TSC for making this a positive experience.

An exciting, varied experience of this fascinating country. We have just concluded 10 wonderful days in Turkey. TSC arranged a specialised itinerary for us to concentrate on our interest in exploring ancient historical sites. Okan attended to all matters, right from our initial contact, with efficiency in every detail. There was an amazing variety to our experiences, so we felt we had the best of everything. Hotels were clean. Meals always provided plenty of choice of delicious food. Guides were knowledgeable on a variety of subjects not just the sites we visited. They were always helpful and pleasant. Drivers were careful and cooperative. We would not hesitate to recommend TSC to anyone travelling in Turkey.

We had the best time in Turkey with TSC thanks to Melek Ada. We had a great 12 day tour with TSC and our guide Koray was the best. We were with him for 6 days and his knowledge of the country was excellent. I would recommend touring Turkey with TSC, there professionalism is the best. Also in there office, the hub of the company is Melek, she is the best, always responds to each and every email ASAP. She is the back bone of the company.If we ever return to Turkey again we would use TSC Turkey tours.

Great tour company -perfect for families. We spent two weeks in Turkey as a family with our two kids and had an amazing time thanks to the great planning by TSC. The tour guides they work with are great and really tailor themselves to your needs which is great when you have kids 14 and 10. The logistics went 100% smoothly so we could just focus on enjoying ourselves. The team at TSC is also really flexible and works with you in designing your trip. The hotels they picked had great locations and great service so again, we could enjoy the sights. They also worked with our budget. I would HIGHLY recommend TSC for anyone organizing a trip to Turkey.

PERFECT TOUR FROM START TO FINISH!. Our tour with TSC was just perfect. We could not be happier with every aspect of our trip . From our initial contact with Okan, who organised a tour tailored especially to suit us, to our final flight, everything ran perfectly. The hotels booked were fantastic. They were in great locations, clean, with helpful welcoming staff. The included meals were impressive. Transfers, flights, tours etc all went perfectly to plan. The vehicles used for day trips and transfers were all new and spotless. The drivers were not only very professional but also friendly. Above all, our guides, Mensure, Koray and Youseff were exceptional. They were not only so knowledgeable in their fields, but they were easy going and fun. They made our days interesting and rewarding. Thank you TSC for an amazing experience.

WONDERFUL EXPERIENCE WITH TSC. We recently visited Turkey from 5/23-6/2 and had a great time. My wife and 16 y/o old son had the time of their life. We are from Arizona, USA and were in constant correspondence via e mail with Mrs Melek Ada, who was prompt in getting back to our questions prior to traveling. A little nervous about making transactions on line, but trust me, TSC is very reliable. We were greeted at the Atatturk airport in Istanbul and taken to our hotel which was within walking distance to all the major attractions. The next day we left for Ankara. Our guide, Mustafa Ozdemir was very knowledgeable and answered our questions. It was a small group as promised by TSC, 7 people in all alongwith a Canadian and Australian couple. We bonded like family. With small groups, you have more time to marvel all the historical sites. We took the 10 day/11 night trip and covered a lot in that time. The highlight of the tour was of course Ephesus, a must see for all. The buffet breakfasts and lunches were exceptional. The hotels were very good and all their staff were very friendly. We are planning on visiting Egypt and will definitely go with them again.

Maureen-Turkey Tours. May 2015 -Turkey is such a great place to visit - safe, friendly and rich in culture and tradition. I have booked with TSC on two occasions - in 2014 (with 3 friends) when we visited Istanbul and Cappadocia; and in 2015 with my husband, to Istanbul only. Okan is a pleasure to deal with in terms of his professionalism and helpful suggested tours to suit our own personal travel arrangements, and also with his quick and polite responses. .It was so good, after travelling such a long and tiring journey from Australia to Istanbul, to be met and cared for so well on arrival by the TSC staff at Ataturk airport and to be so comfortably and courteously whisked off to another world. From the moment we arrived, until our departure, all elements of our travel and care went like clockworkMustafa was our guide this year. He is excellent, very knowledgeable, polite and friendly and his English is excellent. He could answer all our questions in relation to culture, tradition and the sites. . The tours and sites Mustafa took us to were great, as well as the delicious lunches of traditional and local cuisine. I would therefore recommend TSC highly.Regarding the hotel we stayed in, whilst the staff are very helpful and attentive, , I would recommend you request an upgrade to a deluxe room. The Ferman hotel is perfectly positioned as all the sites are within walking distance, and it is perfectly placed to enjoy a wonderful evening stroll to the nearby shops and eateries and local bazaar. The atmosphere in this location is everything you expect in terms of safety, and Turkish hospitality.I have no hesitation in recommending TSC travel to any Australian travelling to Turkey.

We visited the seven church of the book of Revelation and other historical site. we extremely love this tour.. We love this trip very much. Our love our guide Mr. Koray Yasa and our driver who committed themselves faithfully not only to the profession and also care for us. There was an incident happened during our trip, when one our members fell and hurt himself on this forehead. Actually the position is between his eyes. He was bleeding and our guide Mr. Yasa and the driver took him to the hospital while arranged us to have lunch in the restaurant. This kind of arrangement not only fit the need of all parties, it also comforted our group. The good deed and the professional care is unforgettable. the rest of the trip is full of joy and we really learn a lot from this trip.

A day in Istanbul. Our family of five arrived in Istanbul in the morning and only had one day there. Mustafa was our guide and we had a wonderful (full day) walking tour of the old city and saw all the important sites. He was very knowledgeable (and very nice) and also took us to the best place for lunch!! Okan was very responsive via emails - and always so prompt and contacted me while we were on our travels prior to arriving to Istanbul to touch base with us. I would recommend Okan and TSC Travel. I chose TSC based on Trip Advisor reviews!

7 Churches of Revelations. Prior to the trip, we were impressed by the quick responses from Okan to our queries. All queries were responded within a day. Excellent!During our trip, we found the guide, Ender, to be good, knowledgeable and helpful. The hotels that we stayed in were clean and good; however we felt that the quality of the food, especially lunch, can be improved. The vehicles that transported us were comfortable and clean. Perhaps water could be provided on a daily basis as part of the amenities in the vehicles.On the whole, we enjoyed our trip. Thanks.

Best of Turkey & Greece. We had such a wonderful 15 days/14 nights package withTSC Travel. This trip brings back many historical location and understanding during the early civilisation. But we must said that without an experience driver and a very knowledgeable guide, Mr Koray, we might not be able to experience the full impact of this trip.once again thank you Mr. Koray and your team.

Amazing - Can't go wrong with TSC Travel!. My partner and I traveled with TSC travel last month on the 10-day Turkey Specialist Tour. From start to finish this tour was amazing. Okan was incredibly patient and helpful answering all of our emails all throughout the booking process. The days prior to our trip we received our confirmed itinerary with exact details of our trip, hotels, restaurants, free time, etc. When we arrived in Instanbul a driver was waiting at the airport for us to take us to the hotel and a welcome package from TSC welcomed us in our rooms. On our first day of the trip our tour guide, Mustafa Ozdemir, picked us up at the hotel and we started our amazing 10-day journey through Turkey. Turkey is a stunning country with seemingly endless sights to see – but it was our fun and charismatic tour guide Mustafa who kept us laughing constantly and made the whole experience just that much more incredible. I would highly recommend TSC travel to anyone looking to experience a personalized tour of Turkey in a small group. While on this trip we learned that TSC also offers tours in Egypt and Greece and we undoubtedly plan on using them again in our future travels.
Very good tours in Turkey. My wife and I went for an 8 day your in Turkey organized by TSC. We appreciated the excellent organization in every location which allowed us to have an enjoyable trip.

Turkey & Greece - 2015. I'm usually a do-it-yourself kinda guy, and this is the first time that I've used a travel agency to help me plan one of my trips. What a difference it makes! TSC travel crafted an excellent itinerary that allowed me and my friends to take in the historic and natural sites of Turkey, while also finding time to relax on the beach in Mykonos. Without their help arranging transportation and tour guides, we would have been stuck taking the bus or a taxi. On our last day in Turkey, our driver managed to save us from dealing with an hour of bad traffic by taking a lesser-known route, allowing us to catch our flight on time. TSC provided us with excellent hotel bookings, with my favorite being at the Sentido Resort in Kusadasi.If I had any complaints it would be that I gained a lot of weight eating all the food at the restaurants they kept recommending. I look forward to employing their services again when I travel in the region.

Istanbul - May 2015 - Terrific Tours - Highly Recommend. We have used TSC travel on several occasions whilst visiting beautifulnIstanbul.Proposed tours have been delivered by good quality guides. During yesterday Mustafa, Gave us a most enjoyable day visiting several different sites in Istanbul. We were picked up as arranged from the Cruise terminal on time. Driver excellent, vehicle clean and well maintainedToday the ferry ride to Princes Island and the Carriage ride followed by lunch was just right and our guide Hasan was organised and supervised our small group of 7 very well.All arrangements in dealing with Melek Ada have been professional and well documented.You can safely rely on delivery of good tours led by quality guides at a fair and resonable price.We were delighted with the service.

Istanbul trip 2015. Okan and Hasan at TSC Travel are truly amazing and friendly tour guides. They made my friends and I very comfortable during our 6 days in Istanbul. They "smoothed" out all the stereotypical assumptions and answered all our questions with prompt facts. Effiency in our transportation and tour schedule were well planned. Going the extra mile is a common trait of theirs such as arranging a surprise birthday cake and ensuring were always together as a group. They take great pride in their town and country and are not afraid to show off the good life and great history of an intriguing culture the Turks have. I had a 'belly dance' blast and memorable experience and cant wait to tell everyone back home. Thanks again Hasan and Okan of TSC!

Gallipoli, Troy, Ephesus, Pamukkale - just outstanding!. I can not speak highly enough of the TSC people. They worked around us and our requirements, meeting our needs at every stage. Even when there were only the two of us on the tour, they didn't cancel so we got a personalised service! Their guides are highly qualified, knowledgeable, personable and great company. They also have excellent interpersonal skills which can often come in handy. They delivered everything they said they would deliver, pretty much on time. The facilities (hotels, buses) were all excellent. We were delighted with everything they did for us. Don't look any further - these people deliver!

Cappadocia Tour. Cappadocia is the most amazing place I've ever seen, like something from another world. TSC Travel made everything easy, the tour and guides were great and staying in a cave hotel was awesome.

Great side trip to Cappadocia. Having travelled in Turkey before, we didn't need to spend time in Kusadasi or Istanbul on our Mediterranean cruise. We wanted a side trip to Cappadocia but needed to be back on board for the departure from Istanbul. Okan from TSC tours organised two nights off the ship in Cappadocia. This involved transfers, flights, accommodation and local tour guides. All arrangements met our requirements perfectly. We stayed in the charming town of Goreme and our guide, Aylin, took us to the major sites. Okan had been happy to answer all my questions in the planning stages so we were reassured. This independent excursion turned out to be one of the best things we did on the cruise.

Good Company. We had a great time with the tour organised by Okan at TSC, The guide (Mustafa) and the driver were both very good. The attractions visited were highly interesting and well explained by the guide. Perhaps could have done with some more time at some attractions, specifically Pumakkale and less time or not visiting others, overall highly recommended

Turkey and Greece Holiday. Absolutely wonderful tour. The Turkish leg of our holiday was particularly amazing with personal attention and enthusiastic and knowledgeable guides. We would recommend TSC 100%.Thank you to Okan Kutlu for oragnising a beautiful experience and to all the guides and staff for making this a most memorable holiday.

Traveler's Friend. Traveling to Turkey or Greece? Put your trust in TSC Travel. You will not be disappointed. Okan and all of TSC Travel are there to make sure your trip runs smoothly. If you have any concerns along the way, just contact them for assistance. The hotels we stayed at were comfortable and pleasant tourist class hotels. All the people we came in contact with were helpful, positive and attentive to our needs. Our itinerary included all the "must sees" on our list of things to do. We enjoyed Istanbul, Capadocia, and Ephesus in Turkey. We dreamed of longer stays on Santorini and Mykonos. The richness of history and culture in this region is exceptional. Go TSC!

Trip to Turkey and Gallipoli. Thanks to Okan for organising a wonderful 4 days. Every tour was professionally run, informative and all transport on time with great drivers and clean comfortable cars.The hotels we of a very high standard and breakfasts yummy.... especially the honeycomb at Doors of Cappadocia. We highly recommend TSC travel

It couldn't get any better. My wife & I spent our honeymoon in Turkey on a trip put together by Okan Kutlu at TSC. The trip was based on where we wanted to go & what we wanted to see & do, not just a predetermined trip like so many others offer. The ability to customize our trip was a big plus. We initially had several different places in mind & Okan was quick to respond with detailed breakdowns of what it would cost to do each location, and with the option of various levels of accommodation in each place. His communication was excellent & he was very quick to respond to any questions or concerns I had.We visited Istanbul, Cappadocia, and Kusadasi during our stay. This included guided day trips to Pamukkale, Ephesus, Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Grand Bazaar, Spice Market, Bosphorus cruise, Topkapi Palace, Goreme Open Air Museum, hot air balloon ride over Cappadocia, plus plenty of free time on each are to explore on our own. We also added a few days on in Kusadasi at the end of our trip to relax & explore the area by ourselves.All hotels, transfers & domestic flights were included in the cost of the trip. TSC made everything incredibly easy. Additionally, the fact that you fly from place to place saves a ton of time & lets you see more things in a quicker & more comfortable manner. Many of the trips offered by other travel agents have you traveling around by bus. That means you are sort of forced to eat in the out of the way places that cater to busses full of tourists rather than the good spots where the locals would eat. Additionally, you are spending half of your vacation driving around in a bus with 30 other people. Thanks to TSC, we were able to avoid that kind of nightmare, and for the same cost many of the other companies charge for those awful bus tours.We stayed in the mid-level hotels & they were all fantastic. Our hotel in Istanbul was in the heart of the old city, and walking distance to a lot of sites, shops, restaurants, bank, etc. We had an amazing view from the rooftop bar of the Blue Mosque & Hagia Sofia on one side & the Bosphorus on the other. In Cappadocia, we were greeted after a rough flight by the owner & his assistant. They were incredibly friendly & welcoming, and showed us to our room... which was absolutely beautiful. TSC had provided us with a lovely gift to congratulate on on our marriage. It was like something from a movie! In Kusadasi, we stayed right on the water at a very sleek, modern boutique hotel. We ended up befriending the woman working the desk & her husband, and have remained in contact with them ever since. All the hotels were charming in very different ways, and all were clean, comfy, close to everything, and with incredibly nice & helpful staffs.All of out tour guides were amazing as well... great personalities who seem to love what they do & enjoy sharing their beautiful country with us. During our tour of Istanbul, we were accompanied by only a pair of older ladies, one of which had a leg injury & they had to sit out parts of the tour, so we basically got a private tour. Our tours in Cappadocia & Ephesus were private, just us & the guide. Our trip to Pamukkale was a small group of about 15 people. Most travel agencies would charge a fortune for private tours, and it would be next to impossible to have a small group or private tour if you were on one of those bus trips. Less people in your party means being able to see what you want to see, not having to compromise for a bunch of strangers.I truly cannot imagine how our trip could have been any more perfect. We can't wait to visit Turkey again, and will undoubtably be using the services of Okan & TSC again.

Turkey March - April 2015. An amazing trip - Istanbul, Ankara, Cappadocia, Efes, Pamukale, Kasadasi were the highlights of my travel organised by TSC Travel. What a fabulous team. They are very professional and well organised. Flights, transfers, pickups all ran smoothly and on time. Just arrive in Turkey for you TSC Tour , sit back and the rest was taken care of. lGuide Koray and Driver Okan were a joy and so easy to travel with. Koray's expertise as a guide was an added bonus, he was very knowledgeable about the places we visited, made everything interesting, he was fun and happy ... a great guide. Okan was a wonderful driver. the comfort of our bus and his excellent driving skills made for a very relaxed holiday. Both were only too happy , to answer questions, always had the best smiles and happy faces. I very highly recommend TSC Travel to anyone visiting Turkey. I intend to return and will most definitely use TSC againMy only regret was I did not stay longer.Thank you all

Dream trip to Cappadocia. Everything from the start was terrific about this company. The transfers to/from the airport were great. Drivers were courteous and the vehicles were neat and clean. All the arrangements in Cappadocia were spot on. The information given to us was easy to follow. No problems at the airport either!!! Well worth it. Thank you TSC and Melek Ada!!!

Cappadocia. This was a definite high point of our trip to Turkey. After a late decision to take this trip the tour company did everything they could to make this possible for us. Every detail of the trip was well organized and went very smoothly. From pick-ups, flights, a beautiful cave hotel, balloon ride (not to be missed), and a wonderful tour guide we were very pleased! This tour company really knows what customer service means!!
Turkey 2015. Congratulations to everyone at TSC. I would specially reccomend the spanish speaking guides we had during a whole day city tour in Istambul and our 3 days stay in Cappadocia.

Incredible Value in Cappadocia. My family (including two kids, ages 14 and 11) returned yesterday from a week+ in Turkey, with 2 days / nights in Cappadocia organized by TSC Travel. The experience was magnificent; and the level of professionalism by Okan and his team was impressive. My numerous pre- and mid-trip email questions / requests received responses within hours; and the level of detail around the planning and execution were exemplary. But, what truly blew me away was the value delivered on my investment. For what I considered to be a very reasonable sum, we received: flights to / from Instanbul, ground transport, private certified guiding services, admission to attractions, amazingly educational tours at artisans' studios (hand-made carpets, ceramics, and onyx), exceptional meals, and two nights' stay at a memorable cave hotel. More than once I checked my bill to confirm that the fee was, in fact, for the group...and not a per-person fee. This left plenty of our trip budget to spend on other Cappadocia attractions that were not included in the tour (most specifically a surprisingly expensive -- but truly unforgettable -- hot air balloon ride). I certainly intend to return to the region. When I do, I will definitely look to travel with TSC again.

Highly recommended and Professional. The TSC service was very good and professional. Everything was punctual, well organized and highly detailed. We as tourists were treated with much respect and priority. The service is recommended for all who want travel or explore Turkey. Kudos TSC! We truly enjoyed your commitment and dedication and We thank you to Okan Kutlu, Funda Yilmazturk, Felice, Pudjor and the drivers

Weekend Trip to Cairo!. We have just returned from a "weekend" trip to Cairo and it was amazing! We booked our two day tours through TSC Travel and they arranged everything from top to bottom.We were met at the airport in Cairo by our assistant - Essam and Mohamed our flight was delayed a few hours and they were there with smiles and warm Egyptian welcomes. Along the way to the hotel, though late at night both gentlemen gave us tour along the way, pointing out the different interest points along the way.We added a Pyramid Light and Sound show to our itinerary for the next evening, so glad we did, it was very interesting. The next morning off to the Pyramids where we met up with Suzan! What a wonderful, informative and special person. We learned so much from her talks and she knows everyone! Our second day was spent at the Museum and different areas of Cairo.We had a wonderful trip thanks to the help of Ms. Melek from the Istanbul office and Essam, Mohamed and of course Suzan. Mr. Kutlu of TSC and his staff and associates all over do a fantastic job!

Very Efficient Operation. I was visiting India before I visited Istanbul and work with TSC for a 2 day/1 night trip to Cappadocia, I was totally dismay by the bad experience I had in India. Then TSC helped me to go to Cappadocia, which I was not certain about how I would be treated. I have to say that I have a very good time in Cappadocia because the efficient operation by TSC. They kept their words and deliver excellent service on everything. Thanks.
