Gallipoli and Troy tour -incredible. We recently took the Gallipoli and Troy tour and it was very emotional and really being there is very confronting. The tour organisers were very helpful and had extensive knowledge. We would highly recommend this tour.

Magic of Turkey Tour with TSC. Okan arranged the tour and the itinerary within very short notice for our travel to Turkey during Dec 2014 / Jan 2015. Our group was very small which was great and ensured flexibility with regard to the timings. Mustafa our tour guide was a knowledgable professional with a good sense of humour and did an excellent job in explaining the history & other facts in relation to all the places we visited in Cappadocia , Pamukkale , Hierapolis , Kusadasi , Ephesus etc. The accommodation (specially the cave suites) and the food was great. Mustafa and Okan (our driver) ensured we were in good hands at all times ! (and they were extra-patient with all our photography sessions ;)) Thank you TSC for making our trip to amazing Turkey a truly memorable one! - Tili

Magical Turkey. Our first trip to Turkey was organized courtesy TSC Tours headed by Mr.Okan Kutlu. We chose TSC over all other Tour Operators as they were flexible and responsive to our specific needs. We visited Istanbul, Pergamon, Ephesus, Hierapolis, Pamukkale and Cappadocia.We were very impressed with the quality of properties we stayed in, the knowledge of Tour Guides and most importantly the professionalism displayed by all TSC staff. Our entire stay was seamless and enhanced our enjoyment of what is a truly magnificent country. We would recommend TSC to one and all sans reservation.

Personal Tour of Turkey by TSC. During my recent trip to Turkey with my family in December 2014 (10 December to 21 December) we were very fortunate to have arranged a private guided tour with TSC Travel. Okan was very helpful in planning the itinerary and our tour included Istanbul, Cappadocia, Pergamon, Kusadasi, Sirince, Ephesus and Pamukkale.We had a truly memorable trip and everything went smoothly. The guides provided by TSC, Mustafa in Istanbul, Mansure in Cappadocia and Koray in Pergamon/Sirince/Ephesus/Pamukkale are very knowledgeable and professional. My family and I throughly enjoyed ourselves in Turkey. Our guides ensured that we travelled comfortably throughout our conducted tour and also provided good recommendations on where we will be able to find good and reasonably priced restaurants. We will definitely recommend TSC Travel to all our friends and family members who would like to have a conducted tour while visiting Turkey.Tinag Lim Ee Singapore

TSC Travel - Okan as tour guide. During our recent overseas trip to Istanbul we were fortunate to experience a guided tour with Okan from TSC Tours. I cannot praise him enough. Okan was extremely knowledgable of Istanbul's history and its historical sites. He was professionally articulate, friendly, humorous and full of suggestions.He accompanied us to a rug store where we bartered for a rug - he suggested we visit the Spice Bazaar as it was less 'touristy' than the Grand Bazaar. He was full of anecdotes and background information of great interest to us. But more than anything we felt we had made a friend. Okan ensured our stay in Istanbul was a happy and memorable trip for our family (parents and 2 adult children). This is a 'must do ' tour ! We will be back.Thanks Okan ,the Lewis family from Perth Western Australia'

The magic of the “Magic of Turkey” tour of TSC Travel. I had the great privilege of visiting Turkey in October 2014 on the "Magic of Turkey" tour organised by TSC Travel. It is a 6-night, 7-day tour visiting several museums and the most popular sites of Turkey such as Cappadocia, Pamukkale, Hierapolis, Kusadasi, Ephesus, Troy, and Gallapoli. I was in a small group which made the experience much more flexible and personal. It was a magnificent tour and an experience that I will always treasure. I left Turkey with an appreciation for its rich history and vast variety of natural scenery that are unique and no-where else to be found in the world.What I liked and appreciated most of the tour were, for example:* a cleverly designed itinerary that includes all the top sites without over-filling the daily activities;* the quality of the tour guide (friendliness, competence, knowledge and professionalism)[Koray Yasa];* ample time allowed at sites to explore on our own - which suited me brilliantly being a keen photographer that always takes a bit more time to explore and get the more special pictures;* the flexibility of optional activities that are available (at extra cost of course but that's expected and normal);* the competence and professionalism of the driver and worth mentioning is that he cleaned the mini-bus, especially the windows, every day to allow us to enjoy the scenery while on the road;* the seamless arrangements and logistics;* the suitability of the accommodation (there was only one hotel that I may comment somewhat negatively about but all the rest were excellent);* ample meals with plenty of good food;* the helpful and professional pre-tour arrangements by the online travel agent [Okan Kutlu] - I did receive a misspelt flight ticket at some point, but that was sorted quickly.I can highly recommend TSC Travel with a warm and content heart!Tom Brown, South Africa

what a way to spend Thanksgiving in Istanbul. We are a family of 5 traveling to Turkey for Thanksgiving break. I chose TSC travel for all the great reviews at Tripadvisor and by no means was disappointed. They organized a very good tour per my specifications. The guides were great especially Mustafa in Istanbul and Mensure in Capodoccia. The transportation services were excellent also! I would definitely recommend this company to anyone

Gallipoli Troy Pergamon and Ephesus Tour. Picked up TSC from the internet so not sure what to expect but overall pleased with the trip. Most of the guides were very knowledgeable and interesting, some a little harder to understand than others. Our hotels were very good and better than I had expected for a tour.We thought our last day day tour of Ephesus was rushed and left the site far too early and recommend more time spent there as very little to see once you leave the Ephesus site. Tour guide wanted to charge an extra EUR75 to visit the basilica of st John even though we had a full day tour and finished early.Also suggest you avoid any offer to visit carpet sellers unless you really want to buy a carpet or interesting in experiencing a top class sell!

A 5 star tour!. I did a Turkey Specialist Tour with TSC and enjoyed it very much!! Everything was very well organized and effortless that i felt like I received a 5 star treatment all throughout. Email communication during booking was accurate and clear, no hidden costs. All the transfers from hotels and airports were done by super clean, air-conditioned new vans which made all the rides enjoyable. The tour guides and drivers were accommodating, flexible, courteous, kind and very knowledgeable that I would give them 10 stars if I could. I especially enjoyed our tour guide Koray…he was very kind and accommodating, and of course exceptionally knowledgeable!!!I was a solo traveller but did the tour with 6 other incredible people, which made it even more enjoyable. I highly recommend this tour company!!!Thanks TSC!

Great time in Turkey, highly recommended. I planned to visit Turkey for 1 week with my family. We had 7 persons and each of us had own condition that made it difficult to plan the trip by myself. So I sent the inquiries to many agencies asking for private tailor-made tour. Okan responded very promptly with perfect itinerary. There were a couple of times that we changed our dates and flights, Okan quickly and effectively managed to change the itinerary to fit our schedule. He is very professional and service-minded.He replied every questions I asked and provided all information I needed.  We went to Cappadocia, Ephesus, Pamukkale, Istanbul. Everything was perfect and well-organised. All tour guides were knowledgeble and friendly. The drivers were also punctual and polite. The hotels in Cappadocia and Kusadisi were great as well as the restaurants. We had a great time in Turkey. BIG Thanks to TSC

Highly recommended! Jan and David from Melbourne Australia. We fell across TSC by chance and we are really pleased we did! We planned our Highlights of Istanbul and Cappadocia Tours with Melek. Her communication was excellent and she answered all our questions promptly and with genuine interest and concern. We were very impressed by the detail of our itinerary and everything ran like clockwork, from pick ups and transfers to organised tours. Several of our day tours were in very small, personal groups and our guides were both friendly and knowledgable, as well as having a very good command of English. In particular we enjoyed Ebu's quiet and kind approach in Istanbul and Mensure's vitality and sense of fun in Cappadocia. The hot air balloon ride was amazing and I am pleased I managed to overcome my fear of heights, as the experience was a real highlight! Thanks TSC for making our time in Turkey so memorable.

Istanbul, old city tour. Full day tour with Mustapha, our guide from TSC Travel. We spent a wonderful day as our guide was very interesting and knowledgeable. We visited the Topkapi palace, the blue Mosque, Hagia Sofia, site of the hippodrome and Grand Bazaar. Mustapha brought us to a great restaurant for lunch. Since TSC Travel booked us at the Ferman Hotel, all were at walking distance. Ferman hotel was in very quiet street, clean and with hospitable employees. Would recommend TSC.

Complete Turkey tour. Great service from Okan and the team at TSC from booking to actual tour. We were a small group of seven and we did two days in Istanbul then on to Capadocea and finally Izmir where we Kasadasi and visited Ephesus hieropolis and Pamukkale one of the most amazing places I have ever been. From start to finish everything worked from pick up to internal flights to hotels. The three guides we had all had great knowledge as well as good Englisg. All in all a great value for money tour. Would recommend TSC to everyone. You will not be disappointed.

Kapadokya. Our three day excursion from Istanbul to Kapadokya was amazing. Everything worked like clockwork. A driver appeared promptly at our hotel at the appointed time. The check in at the airport went smoothly. The flight was quick and easy. We were met at the airport promptly and transferred to the most wonderful hotel, The Kaya Pension, where the staff were friendly, food great and ambience magnificent. The Turkish dinner and entertainment were most enjoyable and transports there and also to the balloon launch the next morning were efficient. The balloon ride was one of the most memorable experiences of all our many travels. Thank you TSC!

TSC. beyond a doubt the most competent and knowledgable tour company I have worked with I in thirty years of travel. Every person at TSC is helpful and competent. Taha Ozyavus is the best guide we ever had. If you're planing a trip to Turkey choose the local tour company TSC not the big impersonal tour companies who care more about your money than your experence

Tour of Turkey and Egypt. We have recently returned from tours of Turkey and Egypt arranged through TSC Travel. Our arrangements were handled by Melek Ada and we can't speak highly enough about her professional attitude and willingness to adapt arrangements to suit our needs. Nothing was too much trouble for her and she is a credit to her Company.The tours met all our requirements and the tour leader in Turkey (Burja) handled her role to perfection. My wife unfortunately had a fall on day 3 and badly sprained her ankle. The attention given by Burja was immediate and professional and without her help and attention, we may not have been able to continue on the tour. Burja also handled all situations which arose because of a mix of younger and older members of the group with patience and diplomacy. The Egypt part of our holiday started badly, with missed flight connections (the fault of Egyptair, not TSC) but once we got to Luxor, all was well. We had our own guide for the entire tour (Mohsen Al-Barbary - "Moss") and his knowledge and patience (we were very slow) made our trip memorable.All in all, our trip was great thanks to the organisation of TSC Travel.

Very good guides in cappadocia. We had a two day private tour, which included a driver, mini bus, and fluent English speaking guide. We were very pleased with the sights we saw and the help of the guides.

Everything on time, as promised. We travelled to Cappadocia for a short three-day visit. TSC delivered on everything they promised. Every pickup was precisely on time, in good quality, well-maintained vehicles with courteous, helpful drivers. The guides were knowledgable. The hotel was pleasant and efficient. Everything worked.And the sunrise balloon ride over Cappadocia was simply breathtaking. Overall, the visit was excellent,We do not have a single complaint, and would happily use TSC again.

Self-Planned Turkey with TSC. Cappadocia - Pamukkale - Aphrodisias - Kusadasi - Ephesus - Pergamon - Troy - CanakkaleCappadocia Hot Air Balloon is a Must - Spectacular experienceTSC offered a very comfortable van for the 5 of us with a very careful and good driverTour guide Mustafa is very knowledgeable and has great insights into the Roman historyHotels are comfortable and cleanMeals are very decentWe enjoyed ourselves thoroughlyAll thanks to great planning and suggestions by Okan of TSC

Excellent Trip. Had reservations about a tour as usually travel alone, but once on this tour with TSC was extremely happy. The tour was well set out and saw as much as we could with our limited time. The food and hotels were excellent and the information on our tour was informative and educative.I highly recommend this tour. It is personal and friendly and a small size that means that you have a nice new 'family' while you are traveling.The price also was excellent for what you got.Highly recommended and have told friends already TSC is the way to go.Brad I

Well organised tour with excellence in organising and execution. My partner and I booked our return ticket to Turkey for 2 weeks. Shortly after, I decided that I wanted to join a tour that will provide me with the basic infrastructure of traveling around the country (without having to drive and to book domestic air tickets), yet at the same time allowing us a degree of freedom to do our own activities. I chanced upon TSC and was initially sceptical of the reliability of its services. Nevertheless, I was heartened by the numerous positive feedback posted on line and signed up for the 10-11day tour. To this day, I reckoned it was the best decision made as the services were impeccable, highly reliable and certainly recommended. On most days, meals were provided. Even though, we opted for the cheaper hotels, on hindsight, we should have gone for the luxury version as the price difference was not considerable. In summary, we had great meals, great hotels, a knowledgeable and well informed tour guide Mustafa and a ball of a time. Highly Recommended!

Cappadocia - My best 'have been' to place so far... I came across TSC by searching 'Turkey tours' online & visited their website. I was a bit reluctant when asked to pay the full amount weeks before the tour date but relieved once the day arrived. The email correspondence between myself & Mr. Melek was very helpful - he answered patiently all my queries about the tour. The tour was amazing, we were picked up at our hotel in Taksim (Rixos) at 4:30am by the driver and taken to the airport where we headed to Cappadocia (1 hour flight from Istanbul). Upon arrival another driver was waiting for us, took us to the tourist information area next to a restaurant where we had our breakfast & soon enough our tour specialist, Mensure, arrived & gave us the agenda of the tour. I booked a day tour to Cappadocia - so I wasn't able to experience the Hot Air Balloon ride as they operate during sunrise and sunsets only. So in case you want to experience it, you have to at least spend the night - which I will be doing during my next visit. Cappadocia is a very beautiful city, and TSC made it more beautiful by giving us all the information about this magical city. The fairy chimneys were just surreal. A must see indeed. We were also taken to so many places such as the Open Air Museum, Pottery, Weaving, Ceramic, Jewelry, Churches still having the Frescos - really amazing experience., and the panoramic views of Cappadocia - in the end we were taken to the Pigeon houses where we saw the hot air balloons starting to fly :D I'll treasure that sight always. It is also nice to experience the Cave Hotels - seen them as we were driving along the city. The locals are friendly and very helpful to the tourists. A lunch buffet is also included in this trip and the lamb kebab was the highlight of my meal ^_^ An open WiFi is also available in this restaurant. Thanks again TSC for making my Turkey trip an unforgettable experience. & I will definitely use their expertise once I'm back to Turkey.

Great Job Okan, our travel specialist. My Turkey enjoyment started way before our trip began. All thanks to the experienced and helpful TSC travel specialist Okan. I organised this trip for our team of 20 people. As, this was our first time to Turkey, I needed lots of information to ensure a smooth and enjoyable trip for my group. I made several tour enquiries to few travel agencies. Eventually it was TSC Travel who provided me with a more reliable and value-added tour packages compared to other agencies. Okan was always prompt In providing detailed answers and great suggestions. He made all arrangements smooth and painless for us, from tour itinerary to lodgings. The hotels provided were amazing with great locations, views and comfort in Cappadocia and Pamukkale. We thoroughly enjoyed our tour especially the Cappadocia hot-air balloon and Rose Valley walk.Special mention also to Mustafa, our tour guide throughout our trip. He was knowledgeable on the history and places of Turkey. Oh yes, not forgetting the bible of our trip: TSC Travel Guide book that was provided (can be downloaded on their website). It provided knowledge and relevant informations about travelling in Turkey.An unforgettable trip that I will be talking about for years. Thank you Okan, thank you TSC Travel, for the speckless tour plan.With pleasureLarry Wee of AIA Singapore

TSC cappadocia 3 days. Initially I was a bit uneasy about booking our trip with them as we paid in full up front, but the reviews I read were all positive so we decided to go with them. We decided to upgrade our rooms to the mid range. Our rooms were great, the pickups were on time, emails were responded to promptly.We also booked a balloon ride as part of our trip, but due to bad weather we missed out. There were no probs with the refund. I would certainly use them again. We usually travel with a small group tour but if we go back to this region of the world, I will definitely see what they have to offer.Bren.
Great tour. I enjoyed this tour, everything ran quite smoothly. The hotel was nice and in a great location. The shuttles were on time and the tour guides very knowledgeable.

Istanbul Discovery Tour was great!. We greatly appreciated getting picked up at the airport and returned to the airport for our departure. The drivers were there early and courteous. Our first day of the tour we were picked up and then placed with an English speaking group and guide. The second day of the tour we had a personal guide for our walking tour of the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia andvTopkapi a Palace. He was very informative and kind, spoke very good English and we highly recommend Ebubekir Cetinkaya. Our third day, we were with some of the people from the first group and enjoyed our day at Princes Island. Overall, we were happy with the Ferman Hotel,tours and provided lunches. We would recommend and use TSC Travel again.

Great Visit. Everything worked the way it was advertised. Our cave hotel was fantastic. The tour guide spoke wonderful English and seemed incredibly knowledgeable. And the option hot air balloon tour was not to be missed.

Greece and Turkey. The logistics were excellent. Drivers were timely, courteous, helpful. Flights were well arranged also. Tour guides, not so much. English spoken with a very heavy accent, in some cases. Also, the guides seemed intent on getting a specific message out, rather than listening to questions and trying to provide the specific information that the tourist wanted. Side trips to rug and pottery salesmen, who sometimes with used some strong sales pressure was not appreciated. All in all, very happy. I would just say that tour guides with better English skills would be an improvement.

Word of Warning. If you want to be able to communicate with your fellow travellers, make sure you don't get put on a bilingual tour. We have just returned home after a trip to Europe. Mostly we travel independently but decided that in Turkey, we needed a guided tour so we booked the Magic of Turkey Tour with TSC. We were expecting an English speaking tour as nothing in our communications or reading led us to believe otherwise. Imagine our shock when we discovered that we were the only English speaking people in the party of 12. The guide was bilingual, but with 10 Spanish speakers and 2 English, the conversation was heavily weighted on the side of the Spanish. We were also disappointed that the one time that we travelled with other tourists, we could not communicate with them. Also the 6 days and 5 nights was a bit misleading, as the first day starts in the late afternoon and the last day finishes early in the morning. However, it was still reasonable value for money. We chose the tourist class hotels and were perfectly satisfied with our accommodation and the mini van was comfortable and the meals were okay. Overall the tour was fantastic and covered all that we expected - the balloon ride is a must, even though a bit expensive. We would have just liked a bit better communication. If we had known that we were on a bilingual tour we would have either opted out or learned a bit of Spanish, but we weren't given the opportunity to do either.

TSC Travel were excellent. TSC Travel made arrangements that allowed us to have a wonderful time on our trip to Cappadocia. All of the activities were wonderful. We would like to especially commend Mensure, our guide for our private tour on our first day. She was great—showed us a variety of interesting sites and was very knowledgeable about the area. She even invited us to her wedding the following week (unfortunately, our travel plans did not allow us to accept). The balloon flight on the next day was also a highlight. The hike up the Rose Valley on the following day, with a group of about a dozen people, was a bit long, but very interesting. We would also like to thank Okan Kutlu at TSC Travel for all his hard work on our behalf when our flight from Kayseri to Istanbul was cancelled due to thunderstorms over Istanbul. He was able to get us an additional night at the same hotel in Goreme (Doors of Cappadocia, which was a lovely place and very convenient) and reroute our flight through Nevsehir the next day (including transport from Greme to the airport) to get to Istanbul. The evening our flight was cancelled, we ran into a family who had been in the group on our Rose Valley walk. The said that their tour operator was of no help—they could not get any accommodation that night in the area nor a flight to Istanbul and ended up taking a fourteen our bus ride to get there. We knew that Okan had been extra helpful, but after hearing their tale, we so glad that we had chosen TSC Travel as our tour operator for our trip to Cappadocia.

I RECOMMEND TSC TRAVEL. My wife and I highly recommend TSC-Travel. We feel that (a) TSC gave us reasonable rates, (b) The itinerary was excellent, (c) the hotel accomodations were between "very good" and "excellent", (d) the free meals were also good; and (e) our Turkey tour guide Mustapha was patient, understanding, and had a lot of stock knowledge.I am trying to reach the FAMILY OF 5 FROM ADELAIDE (Athy K). We exchanged email addresses before we left but I lost them. I hope Trip Advisor can help me here so we can share pictures of this great trip.

Some Disappointing Aspects. We normally organise our own trips and don't do tours but felt we would try one in Turkey as we had heard good things. And there were good things: air and land transport was reliable and efficient; hotels were well located; hot air balloon ride in Capadoccia was fantastic; some tour guides were excellent; and small friendly group sizes.However, the morning pick-up times were extremely early, meaning we did not get the breakfasts we paid for and it was a long day; the tour to Ephesus was spoilt for us by a guide that we could barely understand and who took us to a carpet shop for two hours despite us clearly stating we were not interested; the four star hotels we paid for had great views but dreadful breakfasts - so I guess missing out on the other breakfasts had its good side.We were not shown the exact itinerary before we left Australia so did not have the opportunity to examine the details. Overall, an interesting week but, as I said, some disappointing aspects.

visit to Cappadocia Turkey. I highly recommend if you go to Turkey to visit Cappadocia, what an incredible city!! but it is important to have the right Travel Agency and TSC-Travel was amazing, everything the offered and more we had, everything on time, wonderful hotel, the best tour guides, the food, the place, the HOT Air Ballon is a must! The price was just right, we compare with other tourist and they were amazed by what we paid and the service we got. Okan Kutlu | Managing Director | TSC TRAVELtook care of every single detail.That was a life experience, Thanks Okan.Dunia and Ana Sophia Miranda

History on the Turkish Coast. We are a senior couple (early 70s) who wished to see some of the historical sights on the Turkish coast. In addition we wanted one day free for ourselves at Kusadasi, and several days in Istanbul when we would look after ourselves. Through an exchange of emails with Melek, all was quickly arranged to our complete satisfaction, from a pick up at Istanbul airport to the transfer back to the airport at the end of our stay. Everything went extremely well and we were very pleased indeed with our experience overall, the tours and the hotel chosen for us in Istanbul. The only downside was the hotel in Kusadasi. It was a large tourist hotel well out of the town and catering mainly for Russian or eastern European tour groups. Once there, you were pretty well trapped. For a couple such as ourselves, wishing a free day in Kusadasi, we would have been much better in the town itself. However, everything else was excellent, the arrangements went smoothly and without any problems, and we thoroughly enjoyed the tours themselves and our experience of Turkey. It's a great country to visit and we found the local people we met very friendly and helpful.

TSC Turkey Tour Management Excels U.S. and European Competition. Myself, a US citizen over 80 yr old, and my sister a UK citizen (over 71 yr) have been traveling all our lives extensively almost all over the world! I was a bit unsure of trying a foreign tour company especially over the internet to handle our desired guided tour of Istanbul.This risk taking turned out to be a most pleasant and positive surprise!! The very first correspondence with MELELK ADA revealed his concern and depth of knowledge about providing guidance for foreign tourists. His meticulous and immediate PROMPT answers to all the questions and concerns with professional as well as personal helpful attitude were tremendously confidence building! In my estimate all aspects of such tours, preliminary correspondence, payment procedures, specific tour details, timings, meeting and departing places and personnel contacts, hotel and transport arrangements, the guides and drivers and other details were handled exceeding my expectations and over and above all my experiences with other companies I had been used to!!KEEP IT UP TSC!

TSC Turkey speialist Tour. As a family of 5 we did the turkey Specialist tour and we were delighted. The tour encompassed everything in our list of things to be seen.Our guide Mustapha had an encyclopaedic knowledge of the history of the area and although some phraseology gave us all a laugh we enjoyed the commentary and the knowledge imparted.We asked for some modifications like an add on to see the Dervishes, and a side trip to Gokceada and this was all arranged without fuss and went superbly smooth.My only criticism is that there was too much crammed into the tour but it was the list of what we sought, had we more time we would have stretched the tour over more days.Turkey was stunning and we loved every minute. Also all the food stops had excellent buffets and meals.From our perspective we could have left off the carpet, leather and ceramics shops but I appreciate others like to have this included.Overall wouldn't hesitate recommending TSC and Mrs Melek Ada in particular for exceptional service.

Wonderful experience with TSC Travel. We visited Turkey in the last week of July. Okan was very helpful and professional. He prepared the itinerary that covered all the major destinations and places of our interest. The planning was perfect and we were overwhelmed with the hospitality and helpful nature of our guides. Sameet our tour guide in Istanbul was excellent, knowledgeable and very cooperative. Our tour guide at Pamukkale/Kusadasi was Koray and he was very knowledgeable, well-organized, lively and extremely patient. The tours were reasonably priced and very well organized. Loved the tour, loved the country, loved the food and the historical sites. Will definitely recommend TSC to everyone and will be back soon !!

Good advise, communication and personal service par excellence.. Firstly let me say, that we could not be more impressed with Turkey Tours efficiency and communication, when we were jointly planning our trip to Turkey. Secondly, having now been there and done that, we are absolutely thrilled with the tour that was organised and can’t thank you enough.There was never a moment in our planning that communications were misunderstood and the speed with which the answers came back was exemplary. Okan “is the man” his communication was fast and concise which is what I expect with my own business contacts in this modern internet age. The selection of accommodation, transport and guides were very, very good and we could not be happier with his suggestions as to location, price, format and amenities. He went the extra mile and at one stage on tour to solved a transport issue on the run, when one of the group inadvertently left behind travel document’s. By Okan being available on his mobile, he solve our problem that could have seen us all miss a flight.Remember you only get a few chances to travel and you want to make it as pleasant and trouble free as it can. Turkey Tours did that for our private group of discerning travellers. Lorraine and the group of friends are very happy with your services and would recommend you to anyone.

Turkey: Great Destination. TSC Travel: Good people!. The Istanbul Tour and the Izmir, Kusadasi and nearby areas tour was excellent. The tour guides in both places were knowledgeable, friendly and efficient. TSC Travel paid attention to small details and also allowed us flexibility in changing our plans at the last minute without any grumbling. It was a great trip. Turkey is beautiful.

Great guided tour of Western Turkey!. The Turkey tour was simply amazing! The tour guide and driver was extremely friendly and professional. The hotels were nice. We have no complaints, simply loved it.

Cappadocia from Istanbul. We had limited communication access while in Turkey and we needed to make changes to our hotel. Although it was not communicated back to us TSC got our communications and the change in hotel was not an issue. Pick up and trip went without an issue. We went with an economy hotel and the hotel was good. The only thing we would have liked would have been air conditioning. The hotel had a great location in Goreme and built right into the caves. Tours where informative and good. Thank you TSC.

Superb time at Göbekli Tepe!. Göbekli Tepe is a hard place to get to on your own; but it is worth the travel.Upon arrival in Istanbul, the concierge at the hotel had a parcel already waiting for me from TSC Travel. This detailed my schedule and transportation -- flights and cars all sorted for me. The local guide, Taha Ozyavuz, was a legend. He has lived in the area since birth, and has an acute sense of the archaeology of the site. He has spent time with Klaus Schmidt and the Dig Teams. He also knows the town of Urfa inside and out -- a real bonus when it is 45°C hot. Ask for him if you canAt TSC Travel, Melek Ada consistently went above and beyond to make the experience a painless and positive one. She is great.I strongly recommend this as a way to experience Göbekli Tepe.Dr Andrew Cochrane.

TSC Travel. We were very disappointed, from what I can read I think it depends on which tour you do. It started off well with the email contact and being able to make changes to the itinerary so thought all was good. The tour itself is not cheap especially for Turkey, the first day in Kusadasi with the tour of Ephesus, was amazing and our tour guide was great, despite the information they gave us about not being able to pick us up because it was 45 minutes out, when it was only 15 minutes out from Kusadasi. We had a great first day and were looking forward to the next 2.It started off badly on day 2 as we thought we were having an early start but having missed one of their emails, a 9 am pick up went to 10.30 am from Kusadasi. Our guide left a lot to be desired and his English was a challenge, the lunch was average and they only thing we did all day was Pergamon and travel on a bus for 8 hours to Cannakale. The guide got off the bus some 3 hours before the end. The hotel which we paid $ 350 USD for 2 rooms was $ 100 USD per room when we arrived, (apparently you can choose your own hotel to suit your budget, but we were not made aware of this). We complained as we were a family with kids 12 & 14 and our 2 rooms were at either end of the corridor, the guys their were great but the Helen Hotel is not worth what you pay for it. The next day was off to Troy and then Gallipolli. The guides on these 2 tours were great, but it is a very long day starting at 8.30 am and arriving at Istanbul at 11 pm. Gallipolli tour goes for 4.5 hrs and then the trip to Istanbul is 5+ hrs (not helped by a bus driver that didn't go the speed limit and we had tomato trucks passing us - very frustrating) Given the high price, relative to everything else we did and paid for on our 5 weeks holiday (including a 7 day cruise), we would not recommend the tour to others

TSC compiled a personal itinerary. We wanted to visit several places that were not on a single tour. TSC put an itinerary together for us that combined several tours and worked out very well. A couple of hiccups were resolved with a phone call to Okan.

Magic of Turkey. Everything with TSC Travel was easy. Okan from the beginning on-line was very helpful. Our tour guide Koray was a wealth of knowledge - nothing was a problem. We ended up with a group of 11 including children. With Koray included we bacame a large family for the week - much fun had by all. We will have many lasting memories of Turkey and our new friends.I would have no hesitation in recommending TSC travel to anyone.Thank you Okan and THANK YOU Koray.

Wonderful travel experience in Turkey with TSC. Thanks to Tour Specialist Company (TSC), we (6 friends from Singapore) had a wonderful holiday covering central and western Turkey in the past 12 days.Since our initial contact with its manager Okan, he called us twice with detailed discussion on our itinerary. Finally he worked out a tailored itinerary suitable for our special interest of photography. Our tour guide Koray Yasa is very knowledgeable, well-organized and patient. He always tries his best to help us and accommodate our requests including those last minute ones. One of the examples includes that we requested to return to a valley in Cappadocia for sunset shootings, and Koray and the driver did make our day by making our dream coming true right around sunset! The final highlight was a pleasant surprise. The roof of the hotel that TSC booked for us provides a fantastic view on Golden Horn and the city of Istanbul. Our shootings ended up with landscapes of beautiful Istanbul with sun set and at night. It was a perfect finish of this unforgettable trip.Tour package charge from TSC was very reasonable. Furthermore, TSC’s policy to keep groups small (no more than 15 tourists per group) adds another beauty of the tours organized by this travel service provider. During the course lasting more than 10 days, each tourist is given sufficient attention and care. We enjoyed this trip very much. It was our first trip to Turkey and we plan to re-visit this wonderful land in near future by using TSC’s service again. We would also highly recommend TSC to anyone going to visit Turkey.

Ephesus Tour from Bodrum : Private Tour. We had limited time in Bodrum and also with teenage children who are apt to get easily bored on tours we decided to book a private tour for our family. TSC were fantastic, we had our own extremely comfortable van, driver and private guide for our trip to Ephesus. We were free to do the tour in our own time frame and then stop at a couple of other attractions. I would highly recommend TSC for both flexibility and the guide's knowledge.

Trip to Turkey and Greece. We had a wonderful experience on our trip to Turkey and Greece thanks to the very well coordinated efforts of TSC and Ada Melek! The guides were very knowlegdeable of the history of the places we have visited. Special mention goes to Gül Demir for the tour of Pergamon and Filiz Capraz, who made the Visit to the House of the Virgin Mary and the tour of Ephesus a very special occasion! It was really good to have all transfers impeccably organised, no waste of time at all, so we did the most of our short visit. Our gratitude goes to TSC and Ada Melek for a memorable trip! We will come back for more. Turkey is a beautiful country, so much to see! And the good service continued once in Greece, seamlessly! Highly recommended!

WE would do it again!. After deciding to travel to Turkey, I sent hours on the computer getting quotes and reading reviews. We finally decided to go with TSC "Turkey Exclusive Tour". Everything was spot ON! Okan was very attentive and answering all our questions making special arrangements for extra nights lodging and travel arrangements for us and our son who was staying on in Turkey after my husband and I left to come home.The tour guides were always prompt, friendly and knowledgeable, and I might add that most days it was just the three of us and the guide and the days where we shared the tour we were joined by a lovely couple and made new friends , whom we dined with and really enjoyed. This tour was great, we only had eight nights and 7 days and we experienced so much. Thanks Okan and your staff for making this experience a memorable one and we will diffidently use TSC on our next Tour.

Istanbul daytrip. We were a group of 8 with a 8 hour stopover in Istanbul. TSC pickup us up from the airport and returned us again well in time for our flight. Okan our guide waited for us in the Old City. We found him to be very knowledgeable. He never rushed us and it was pleasant to spend time with him. Some of the younger ladies also found him "soft on the eye'.I will use TSC again in future

Excellent Experience. Traveling on a cruise which stopped in Istanbul, we knew our time there would be limited, although we did have a night stay in port. I checked online and liked the options offered by TSC, and booked a 4 hour tour. It was an excellent experience, and our tour guide was friendly, informative and very bright. I would definitely use them again when i travel to Istanbul for a more extensive trip.

Izmir: Kusadasi, Pamukkale, Hierápolis, Ephesus + Capadoccia in 3 days. We only had 4 days to visit all these places. TSC was one of 2 travel agencies that actually told us that it could be done and prepared a package for us.Okan was very helpfull and patient, answering all my pre trip questions.They sent all the vouchers, a guide and some souvenirs in a package that was delivered to our hotel.We had 2 guides who were absolutely amazing, in Kusadasi and in Capadoccia.Hotels were really nice, transportation was in new cars/buses. 85% on time for pickups.Restaurants included were good (2 buffets and 1 no-buffet).No problems with airlines tickets. Everything worked well.Great trip to Turkey!Tips: If visiting Pamukkale...it is a 3 hour drive from Kusadasi, each way. Bring a towel and dress as if you were going to the beach.The carpet place were they take you in Kusadasi is amazing. You are guaranteed to buy an authentic carpet and that most of the proceeds go to the ladies who make them. It is a teaching weaving and tradition school. I didn´t really liked to other factories (onyx and leather), but the carpet place is very interesting and educational.Kusadasi is 1 hour drive from IzmirGoreme/Capadoccia is a 70 minute drive from the airport

Wonderful experience. I contracted a full package with TSC. Everything was honored. The quality of the hotels was very nice. The vehicle we traveled was new. The driver was friendly and careful and the Gide, Mr. Koray Yasa, was a very nice guy, very friendly, helpful and had knowledge about the places we were. The places were fascinating! I went for 11 days trip - Turkey Specialist Tour. I was alone but I joined a very nice group. Perfect trip!!!

Cappadocia: marvellous place, marvellous tour. TSC's Okan Kutulu arranged a really 3/4 day wonderful tour. Everything was way better than we expected, great tour guide who spoke english very well was personable and very professional, great transport to wonderful attractions including superb balloon ride of a lifetime. Even the included lunches were way beyond expectation with great food beautifully presented in lovely surroundings...and our cave hotel wa delightful.Our guide was even able to arrange a side trip to Chez Galip a fabulous world famous ceramic gallery and an introduction to a Turkish Living National TreasureThis is without doubt the best tour I have ever bought.Thanks Okan.

Fantastic TURKEY. The contract was honored very well and we received everything that was promised.We found the places we visited very interesting and the sites fascinating. We enjoyed the trip from Ankara to Instanbul with all the sites in between. Both the driver and guide were friendly and very helpful and the guide very knowledgable. The group (of seven) were very friendly and we got on very well. Would recommend TSC highly.

All the must-sees from locals' perspective. We did the 10 day Turkey Specialist Tour which included 1.5 days of tours in Istanbul; 1 full day walking tour right from our hotel and half day tour of Bosphorus Cruise and Spice Market. The walking tour day was very full and beautiful. Our guide kept us on time and gave us a great historical overview then time to take photos before meeting again. The half day was very different. We were given no preparation for what was happening but taken from our hotel to a central meeting place for all the buses. People were then moved from bus to bus according to which hotel they were staying in and maybe by which tour they had booked. Our native guide then talked about local issues as we were bussed to Spice Market which we loved--so much more fun than Grand Bazaar---and then we took the Bosphorus Cruise. It was a beautiful day so very enjoyable but we were disappointed that it went only west from the dock so we did not get to seeother points farther east that we had really been looking forward to seeing from the water's perspective--like Topkapi Palace. We were also very happy we had booked an extra day in Istanbul to explore more on our own and revisit our favorites. Our tour planner, Okan Kutlu, had given us a list of suggestions including travel directions! We took the tram easily but avoided taxis due to all the bad publicity they have received. Sultanamet is very walkable.

TSC makes travelling easy. We were going to do the planning ourselves but decided to check out TSC and we are glad we did! They took the hassle and anxiety out of our lives. They arranged the whole trip - hotels, transport, tours, guides & drivers. Okan Kutlu was always ready to help, courteous and efficient. We travelled from Istanbul, Gallipoli, Troy, Pergamon, Selcuk/Ephesus, Bodrum and Cappadocia. Loved the country, the food, and the people. Highly recommend using TSC to plan your next trip to Turkey and/or Greece.

A terrific week's tour of Turkey. Nothing was too much trouble for TSC - and we changed our minds and plans a few times. TSC was always responsive, courteous and extremely efficient: cars arrived on time, plane arrangements seamless and guides informative, clear and lovely. We wanted to see all we could and TSC put together a first-class itinerary which covered everything we could. Also, the hotels were very good and a great benefit was that they were all different: old but good in Istanbul, a cave hotel in Cappadoccia and by the sea in Kusadasi. We had a marvellous and unforgettable time thanks almost all to TSC. Thank you!

Egypt and Greece Tour TSC TRAVEL. I am working with TSC travel for my trip to Egypt and Greece and could not be happier with their excellent service.Melek Ada worked very hard to customize the tour through Egypt.She is a great travel agent and has gone out of her way to plan a great itinerary.I would highly recommend asking for her if you go through TSC travel

You don´t need think anything... TSC do it for you. Perfect!14 days, 7 flights, different hotels, guide, everything you need... TSC thinks for you.Please give yourself this experience!!!Turkey and Jordan, amazing experiences:Istanbul, Capadoccia, Efeso, Amman, Madaba, Dead Sea Aqaba, Wadi Rum, Kerach and PetraThe transfers, the guides, the hotels, everything were thought for you and your enjoyable time.You only enjoy it.Okan, your jobs is the other planet!Thanks for all TSC

every bit enjoyable!. Our 3 day tour of cappadocia was trouble free and most enjoyable from the flights from istanbul to kayseri, (and back) the transfers, the cave hotel in lovely Goreme and our knowledgeable, well-spoken and helpful young guide Alp. He got us to sites and lunches and walks before the crowds and when we decided we were desperate to enjoy that fabulous balloon ride, he arranged it for us through the agency. Our driver was most careful. It was a pleasure to be a passenger. A delightful experience all round!

TSC Travel Turkey : Incredible Service. We can't say enough about Mr Okan and his staff. We were having a wonderful experience in Turkey, expertly organized by TSC Travel. Unfortunately our holiday was interrupted by an accident in which my husband broke his ankle. Thankfully TSC came to the rescue: our tour guide was unbelievably conscientious spending hours with us at the hospital, translating, and making sure everything went smoothly. She called the company with our news and Mr Okan immediately arranged our flights out of Turkey with wheelchair support, and organized transportation to the airport. We now realize that in a situation like this how critical it is to book with this reputable travel company with staff who become involved and who were such a valuable resource for us.

Best of Turkey and Greece. We booked the Best of Turkey & Greece package, with about 9 days in Turkey and 7 in Greece. There were 7 of us in our group, and the best part about TSC is that all the transfers, tours, many meals, and hassle were taken care of for us. When finagling a group, it makes it so much more enjoyable when someone else coordinates all the details, and we can sit back and enjoy. And even better, TSC does it at a great price! Okan took care of organizing everything and answered my questions very promptly. While in Turkey, Emine was our tour guide, and she was a delight to be with. Very knowledgeable and patient and fun to tour with. My favorite locations were Istanbul, Cappadocia, and Pammukale. Everyone enjoyed the trip immensely, and I recommend TSC for your travel plans!

Turkey travel May 2014. TSC went above and beyond our expectations, they were able to accommodate all of our requests and sites to visit and were always on time and extremely professionals over the 9 days of our trip in Turkey

Fantastic Turkey!. TSC made our trip to amazing Turkey worth every cent. Professional and extremely helpful staff and management made sure that we saw all the main sites in only 3 days, even with a trip to Ephesus included, on VERY short notice. I will definitely recommend them to all my friends and will DEFINITELY use them again. I have to go back to Turkey...did not see enough.

Second time with TSC Travel. This is our second time using TSC Travel and have been extremely happy with all of our arrangements. Okan & his group are good listeners & have been extremely helpful. Everything was as asked for.

Best Tour of Turkey. My family had the most amazing tour of Turkey, visiting not only Istanbul, but also Ankara, Pamukale, Cappadocia, Troy, Ephesus, Heirapolis,etc. We saw so many ancient ruins and extraordinary sites. The country is absolutely beautiful, and what made the trip most enjoyable was the tour itself and our tour guide. They took care of everything: reservations, transportation, restaurants, city/site tours, etc. We didn't have to lift a finger, all we had to do was show up and enjoy the ride. The staff was amazing, especially at the Ferman Sultan Hotel, best customer service, great personalities, and just really wonderful staff that know how to treat their customers. Also for fellow Muslim travelers, the tour was great in seeing Islamic sites, learning history, and even on the road at designated pit stops our tour guide told us where we could pray and gave us time to do so. It was a wonderful experience, saw amazing things and met amazing people. The tour made it so easy, so that you can focus more on enjoying the experience instead of worrying about all the other things that go along with traveling. They worry for you. 5 stars no doubt!

Perfect experience!. My husband and I traveled to Turkey in February 2014. We went through TSC to experience Turkey the right way. It was perfectly laid out and everything went exactly according to the itinerary. Amazing experience. Truly amazing. Definitely want to return to Turkey. And use TSC to make everything perfect!

Trip to Turkey in February 2014. The trip occurred exactly as spelled out in the TSC itinerary when we landed in Istanbul. We were picked up on time at the airport and drove to different hotels per TSC personnel during our stay. Hotel accommodation and service were great. Their minivan were first class and all of their guides were knowledgeable, nice and dedicated. I would rate this trip as 5 stars except for one unexpected incident. In the itinerary it said the optional balloon ride was $175 per person, in Cappadocea when we decided to sign up for it we were charged $195 US, the guide said the increase of $25 were due to last minute sign up. If that is the case then they should make it clear from the beginning of the additional charge for last minute sign up, there were 4 people in our group, that makes $100, we could have saved this money for a nice dinner.

First time in Turkey and with Okan ( TSC ). My wife and small boy always travelled together . We got a customized package to tour 3 places in Turkey within 7 days and were pleasantly surprised at how much we got out of the tour . We are happy with the time and hotel arrangements . In short we enjoyed Kusadasi seaside resort , Cappadocia cave suites and Istanbul guided and free and easy walkabout . We went to Taksim and saw much and explored much on our own . The programme was not restrictive simply because we were well advised and thus got value for money . Our extension tour to Athens was also well handled by Okan . Generally exceed our expectation .

100% Worked-out fine!. Recently TSC booked a trip for me and my wife to Egypt, Jordan and Turkey. Nothing, absolutely nothing went wrong or disconnected from the program. We had a wonderful time and recommend them. By the way, even though Egypt is going through some rough times, not in a second we felt or passed through anything that could be considered risky.

Guided Tour with a difference. This is the second time we have used TSC Travel and the service was impeccable. We do not usually go on guided tours preferring to do our own thing but as our Turkish is limited we decided to utilise the services of a tour company and we have been pleasantly surprised. The groups have been small and the guides efficient, friendly and above all knowledgeable. Special thanks to Filiz and Sam who took us around Pergamon, Ephesus and Pamakkale. The staff are so helpful and just organise everything so well we will absolutely use them again.

Wonderful family vacation in Turkey!. My family and I spent 10 wonderful days in Turkey this Dec2013-Jan2014. We booked with Okan Kutlu from TSC and we were pleased with the service provided by TSC.Okan was very accomodating and did his best to fulfill all our requests- like ensuring that our tour was private and halaal friendly.The tour guides that were allocated to us throughout the different places in Turkey that we visited were an absolute delight as well! As soon as we arrived at each airport there was always someone to receive and transfer us timeously.I would definitely recommend TSC, especially Okan and his team to anyone visiting Turkey. I look forward to booking with TSC again!TasmiaSouth Africa

Wonderful expreience with TSC on a 9-day Turkey tour. We found TSC on the internet and got in touch with Okan Kutlu, their managing director. Okan designed a 9-day tour for my wife and I covering Istanbul, Pergamon, Pamukkale, Ephesus and Cappadocia, essentially all the places we wanted to see in Turkey. Visiting all these places in 9 days may seem hectic, but the arrangements made by TSC took place very smoothly and everything went like clockwork. All drivers and tour guides showed up on time in airports and hotels and we experienced virtually no delays of any sort. The tour guides at various locations were very knowledgeable and explained things very clearly. The hotels provided in the tour were in the 4-star category and quite comfortable and quiet. The meals included in the tour were also very good. We had a completely worry-free tour of Turkey and enjoyed ourselves enormously. We would recommend TSC very highly to anyone who is considering to visit Turkey.

TSC travel ~ Turkey. I booked a trip through TSC online, and got more than what I expected. Travelling on my own and not knowing what to expect I was quite amazed from the monet I stepped foot at Ataturk airport right through travelling to Cappodocia. Everything was well organized, after my first day I knew i could relax and enjoy my tour as I knew this was a company that knew what they were dong and everyhting was on time and planned well. I want to thank Melek Ada for catering to my personal needs and making sure I was taken care of right through my trip. I will definitely use them again. ~ susana jooste~

TSC Packs a Lot into their 10-Day Tour and Delivers Value. Carol and I enjoyed TSC’s whirl-wind ten day tour of the western half of Turkey including Istanbul, Ankara, Cappadocia, Konya, Pamukkale, Hierapolis, Aphrodisias, Kusadasi, Ephesus, Pergamon, Troy, Canakkale, and Gallipoli. It packs a lot into ten days. TSC’s general manager, Okan Kutlu was consistently responsive to any questions we had or issues that required resolution. This modestly priced tour ($1,350 per person) delivers real value for your money. The best thing about the tour was the excellent, friendly and knowledgeable tour guides that TSC chooses to accompany you. As our first introduction to Turkey, it was a good choice.You have to accept compromises when choosing a low to mid-range tour. The main compromise on this trip was the forgettable dinners at the large hotels we were booked into. The food was routinely buffet-style, the quality of which all of the guests on our tour found disappointing. However, breakfasts were fine, and we had some excellent lunches on the road in small restaurants.Normally, a summer TSC tour is 35-40 persons. We traveled at the end of November and enjoyed an almost private tour of 10 people for the first six days, and only 4 people for the last four days. Go to Turkey off season and avoid the crowds! This is particularly salutatory at popular sites like Ephesus and the Grand Bazaar in Istanbul. Our guides confirmed that places like that guarantee a wall-to-wall, sardine-like experience in the high season. Check the long-term weather forecast just before you leave, and pack for changeable weather. We had two days of rain in ten, and the early morning balloon ride in Cappadocia would have been unpleasant without warm clothes, hats and gloves.We purchased the Istanbul ‘Turkish Night Out’ for $75 each as an extra. It promised an evening of fine Turkish food, song and dance. The show was “Vegas Style”, the belly dancers had unnatural, grapefruit-sized breast implants, and at the end, danced for money stuffed into their bras which we found very tacky. The food was boring, chicken (again!!!), the vegetables over-cooked, and the appetizer dish forgettable. Avoid this extra, it did not deliver.That disappointment aside, we heartily recommend TSC Travel!

Highly attentive and great overall tour service.. I booked with TSC on the recommendation of a friend of mine who booked as well. After going back and forth on the various options for hotels, tour, transfers, I was able to obtain a package that I really liked and felt was the right value. Moreover, I was able to make changes to my plan to accommodate any needs I had in terms of options for sightseeing. I'm very picky in particular, so the fact that they were able to accommodate my needs was a great sign of their commitment to customer service and a great trip overall. I highly recommend them as I felt that they were focused on getting you the best value for the best service.

Perfect and highly knowledgeable service!. Found this company on the internet and are we ever glad we did. Before we even left for Istanbul, they had sent us a map of EXACTLY where they would meet us at the airport. Our plane was an hour early and they were right where they said they would be. That was just the start of a great relationship. New clean vehicle and informative driver to our hotel, great guide the next day for an all day private walking tour of everything to see in Sultanahmet area of Istanbul (and nice lunch). Also looked after two great days in Cappadocia, plus Bosporus cruise and spice market and then met our cruise ship for all day in Ephesus. Couldn't have been better. They know Turkey, they know arrangements, they know guides, they're polite and informed and sensitive to your every need. We will definitely go back to Turkey and wouldn't think of using anyone else. Well done.

Personalized learning and service!. Okan Kutlu really understood our tastes and desire to learn about Turkey. Our guides were exceptional and flexible in response to our needs. The hotels and gulet were perfect - we would never have found these without his expertise. We recommend TSC for customized travel in Turkey.

Seven Churches of Revelation. Okan Kutlu went out of his way to ensure all of our concerns were looked after as I was not sure how this internet booking and follow thru wold work.So i called him on Skype and he set up a tour specific to our requirements and was always available to respond to us. mainly by email.Our tour guide and driver far exceeded our expectations.They knew how to get around to all of the sites listed in the tour plus a few extra that we asked about and always found the most interesting places for lunch.The hotels we had with all meals were top notch,all the air,land and hotel connections were flawless.(they were always on time at airport,hotels and last day departure back to Istanbul).We were so pleased with all of the TSC Travel staff that we are now planning a tour to Egyptnext Sept with them.

Thanks, TSC!. We had an excellent holiday in Turkey, and this was mainly because of the organisation by Okan at TSC. We felt we had great value – and more – for the cost of our itinerary, and would recommend them to anyone.   The guides we had were absolutely excellent. We saw and heard some guides for other groups which made us realise how lucky we were with ours. We were fortunate that, even for the tours in Istanbul, the groups weren’t too large. But on our trips out of Istanbul we were so lucky to have just ourselves in Cappadocia and with only one other couple in Izmir.Ilene in Cappadocia, and Filis in Kusadasi were so knowledgeable, considerate and delightful – We couldn’t have wished for nicer guides. Okan was the most careful and considerate driver – the best. The Ferman Sultan was an ideal hotel for us – once we got moved out of the basement ...! The Hotel Yusuf was excellent, and the Efe in a great location.Transport was excellent and most comfortable. The best thing was not having music in the bus – we really appreciated that. Very disappointing that the balloon trip was cancelled, but better safe than sorry, and that was no-one’s fault. Thanks, TSC!

Excelent Service. I hired a tour to Cappadocia with two friends. The guide we had was excellent and the whole tour organization was impeccable.The only observation is that the hotel we chose although cute, is very collapsed and attention is not good.I higly recomend TSC.

Istanbul Tour. TSC travel were very helpful when booking a last minute tour of Istanbul. However when I arrived I found I was checked into a different (lower standard) hotel that I originally booked, it took quite a few calls and emails to persuade TSC to move me to a better hotel. The situation was resolved when I was moved to a lovely hotel in a great area.I enjoyed Istanbul and all other aspects of the booking were fine.

Gallipoli & Troy. Booked an overnight tour from Istanbul down to Gallipoli & Troy then return via the internet many months ago. I was a little nervous that we might arrive to find something had gone wrong, but I needn't have worried. There was a welcome pack waiting at our hotel for us & we were collected right on time. The entire tour operated by Crowded House Travel ran like clockwork. We were greeted with a great lunch on arrival in Eceabat, had a very informative tour of the Gallipoli site then were excorted to our hotel in Cannakale. The next day we were collected on-time, had another great tour of Troy & joined the bus for the trip back to our hotel in Istanbul.We could not have hoped for a better experience and recommend TSC Travel/Crowded House Travel.

Wonderful planning, terrific time. We had the pleasure of using TSC for a day trip out of Istanbul to see the sights in Cappadocia. It was terrific as were our guide and driver. I loved that there was no pressure to buy anything at the workshops that we visited.We also had the privilege of visiting the site of Gobekli Tepe - a 12,000 year old temple complex still being excavating. This was another day trip and it was fascinating. Our guide was so proud of his city and of the sites he showed us, it was a pleasure to spend the day with him. Highly recommend this very organized travel planning group.

Cappadocia Tour. We did a two night, three day trip from Istanbul to Cappadocia, which was great. We had two wonderful guides on the two days who were not only very knowledgeable, but also very friendly and helpful. We loved the hotel we stayed in in Goreme, especially when our host made up sandwiches for us for breakfast when the shuttle bus arrived early to take us to the airport! Okan was very good to communicate with before the trip and we were very satisfied with what was offered. Our only snag was that the shuttle driver to take us to the airport in Istanbul had trouble finding our hotel so we just got to the airport in time!

Highly Recommend. We booked a 9 days holiday in Turkey tours through Istanbul, Gallipoli and Troy, Cappadocia, Princess Islend and traditional Turkish dinner cruise. Everything went perfect thanks to Melek ADA she organised everything all pickups were on time and all guides were very nice and helpful the hotels were spectacular with amazing views. I would highly recommend TSC Travel for anyone looking for a relaxing and beautiful holiday ❤️❤️❤️

7-Day Tour of Turkey. We have recently did a 7-day group tour of Turkey through TSC with an itinerary organised to suit our travel plan.We arranged the tour through the internet and right from the first contact, Okan was a most helpful and responsive operator. He was thorough and professional in his dealings. BEST Tour Guide in Instanbul !! :D. Two friends and I had a whirlwind 3 day trip to beautiful Istanbul at the end of September 2016 and we were lucky enough to find Zeki to be our guide!We'd been a bit naughty sampling the nightlife of the city so we didn't start our exploration of the main sites until around midday, oops ;p But our main stop was the insanely beautiful Hagia Sophia and I can't imagine enjoying our time there more with anyone else. From before even entering, Zeki pointed out the much older ancient ruins of the very first basilica at the foundations of the Hagia Sophia which I'm sure we would have walked straight past had we been alone. This this attention to detail was obvious throughout our whole tour of this incredible place and you can really feel that Zeki has real passion and deep knowledge. I've had many tour guides in the past (I'm a history buff and general travel lover!) but I truly felt so immersed in the fascinating history of this place - even being shown the worn down marble slabs at the main entrance door caused by hundreds of years of wear by the Byzantine guards who once stood on them. So cool!!The whole experience was a blast & Zeki is genuinely the sweetest, friendliest and most knowledgeable guy you could ever hope to meet - he even recommended an evening Dinner Cruise on the Bosphorus which was also amazing (Orient Bosphorus Dinner Cruise - look it up!) - and I will be sure to call on him for our next Istanbul trip....I have plenty more I want to see! Teşekkürler Zekiiiii!!

Taxi tip off. Two tips when using a yellow taxi in istanbul. 1. ideally have ten and five denomination notes. 2. If you are using 50 or 100 notes hold the note until the driver gives you your change then pass the note. Locked in a cab twice yesterday same scam you hand over a large note the driver shows you a five. If you are caught in this situation, I know doh twice !!! Just ask the driver to call the police (he won't) then take a picture of his badge plate and say you are reporting him, they get a months suspension , uber for me ..

Commitment and passion that make the difference!. My husband, our six-year-old daughter and I love traveling, and we had had two good experiences with private tour guides before, in other countries. As we did like it, we decided to do that again, and we looked for one here on Trip Advisor. We picked out Zeki as we could have chosen any other, as the reviews of others were as good as well. He answered right away on our first contact, rapidly answered all our questions, offered shuttles and anything else we might need on our stay in Istambul. He set a schedule that was just perfect for us, traveling with a child that might be annoyed by the tour, but she also loved him. His English is perfect and he is also kind and very outgoing. He took us to cozy local restaurants, and we even had the opportunity to go to an authentic Turkish Hamman (Turkish Bath). We had a very good cruise tour on Bosphorous, where he explained all the important spots, and had a delicious Turkish Tea!He helped us doing some shopping in the Grand Bazaar, told us about the tradition of bargaining in Turkey, and was concerned with us all of the time. We showed interest in going to Cappadocia, and he set everything for us, and that was just perfect! He set shuttle from the hotel to the airport, the airline tickets, the shuttle there, a cozy boutique hotel just up on the hills of Cappadocia with the best view ever, an excellent ballon company (we had an unforgettable ballon tour - amazing!), and shuttle back to Istambul as well. In Cappacocia he also included a tour with a local private tour guide that was as competent as he is. We visited all the important spots there! We couldn't imagine that to be better!I mean, all the partners he indicated us were as responsible as he is.And during all the stay in Cappadocia he kept in contact with us, asking if everything was ok.We are experienced travelers, we have more than 20 international trips (and we are not in the 40's yet!), and this time we are coming back home really satisfied!In addition, I would like to say that we really saved money in having Zeki with us.When we travel by ourselves, as we did many times before, we spend much more money in looking at the maps, looking for the best places to go, and sometimes when you are on vacation, you don't have the time to do that and visit everything you would like to. And plus, you spend more money going to the wrong placesI would recommend him to all travelers coming to Istambul. He is a professional tour guide who loves what he does. And that really made a difference!Thank you, very much Zeki! Kind regards from José Roberto, Gisele e Beatriz!

But then when we decided to go to Hagia Sophia, this man was standing at the entrance and asked do we needed a tour guide. At first we hesitated not knowing the price to ask for or would we be comfortable with him. But then we gave it a shot and it was the best decision we took!  Zeki made our trip memorable with his charm and with his humble nature, oohh and also his jokes. He is a funny guy! He took us to all the sightseeing places and being a vegetarian and an Indian in the heart of Istanbul we had a problem with our lunch! But no worries since Zeki was there and he knew Indian restaurants too. He was helpful throughout our trip! And also the night boat tour which he took us to was amazing. I always wanted to see Istanbul at night and just enjoy it's stillness from the boat and Zeki here just made my wish come true! No need to look any further for an Istanbul guide. Zeki is as good as a tour guide gets, he is very laid back and very knowledgable about Istanbul. He will either take charge and run the show or let you tell him what pace and direction you want to take then keep up. Our situation was unique in that I caught a stomach bug from my son evidently the day before we left but it didn't hit me until the night before the tour. I tried to tough it out but ended up passing out at the first top of the day, the Hagia Sofia. Zeki rushed to by me some juice and the cafe while I was laying on a rock table as old as the Hagia. Needless to say it was a bit embarrassing with thousands of tourists looking on, but Zeki handled it with care and got us back to our room immediately. He offered to take us to the hospital, etc. but we knew it only required a bit of rest. The only thing we'd paid him was the deposit, and he had already exceeded that in expenses for the tour (he pays for the entrance fees, cabs, etc. and you pay him at the end) He just told us to call him over the next couple of days to start where we left off. We did just that the following day and had a wonderful full day with Zeki. We usually don't use tour guides, and especially not group tours, but we would not hesitate to use or recommend Zeki to anyone.

Fantastic Guide!. I was traveling alone and only had one day in Istanbul to see the sites and completely lucked out running into Zeki first thing that morning in front of Hagia Sophia Museum. I hadn't planned on hiring a guide but it turned out to be the best thing I did that day. Since I only had one full day and wanted to hit as many major sites as I could, Zeki accommodated my timetable and interests perfectly. Not having to wait in lines for tickets is standard with all official guides, but I'm pretty sure Zeki whisked me inside the blue mosque a little ahead of other tour groups. As well, and this is the best part, he took a real interest in what I found interesting and tailored each site tour to my tastes. You can easily spend an entire day at the palace, but he gave me a run down of what we could see there and gave me the option to nix whatever parts I didn't want to spend time exploring. Oh, and during that palace visit when he was explaining that tulips originated in that region (April would be a great time to see the palace in full bloom) and I lamented that I would have loved some bulbs but knew we were out of season, he took me to a tiny gardening shop and had the owner climb up into the attic and retrieve some bulbs for me to take home! There is no way, and I mean absolutely no way, that would have happened without Zeki. He was very thoughtful and just a pleasure to be around. And he is well-traveled enough himself that we never ran out of things to talk about. Zeki is a fountain of knowledge and his English is perfect (I believe he speaks German, Spanish and French as well). I would recommend him as a personal guide without hesitation!!

Red & Green Tour. Mr. Ali & Mr. Hezrat made our 2 day tour fun and informative.. They will gladly listen to your requests if it's possible of course. And they helped us tooked great photos.

Lovely Trip in Cappadocia - Green Tour with Ali Battır. We had a great time from the beginning until the end. We had full day program with many attractions and sightseeings. Irmak&Dogucan

Balloon ride Cappadocia. AMAZING and spectacular words can't really express. Travelling with elderly father and my daughter as well and we all loved the experience. Fantastic tour by Cappadocia branch office. We attended the green tour first day.Second day we did a private tour.mr Ersin the guide he took us very interesting and unique places , showed around Cappadocia. We took detailed information each loaves we visited.All the guides in the agency are very friendly.They are very friendly and humorous.We felt very comfortable and safe in anywhere in this wonderful country.l highly recommend this trip to anyone who wants to visit Turkey and Cappadocia.

Reliable and Profesionally Conducted Tours. On reaching Cappadocia our hotel manager recommended we take the day tours conducted by Insider Travels rather than touring on our own in our vehicle. We were glad we heeded his advice and opted for the Green tour because the guides were well informed and all the interesting places were included. Our guide Ali spoke good English, was well versed with historical facts and had a delightful sense of humour. The driver Hazrat was also very obliging. At the end of the day tour, they went out of their way and took us to a shop to buy local specialities. We were so satisfied with the Green tour that the next day we booked ourselves on the Red tour.

Excellent and profesional service. We arrived in Istanbul and wanted to do some tours,so we went to the office of Insider Travel Istanbul where we were assisted by Sivash who put an excellant pakage that helped us cover Turkey's important attractions.From the very onset of our tour in Istanbul then Cappadocia ,Pamukkale (guided by our tour guide Ali Battir-a very informative,humourous and caring guide)we were given the best treatment and never had to worry about anything,cause the entire programme was taken care of by Insider Travel Turkey.A very special thank you to all of you from this travel agency for making us foreigners feel welcome and cared for.

In Ali We Trust!. The Cappadocia area is great but without our great guide Mr. Ali Battır, it wouldn't be that great! He made our day and he was the most knowledgable and sincere guide ever! Therefore we enjoy the trip thanks to him! My special thanks to Mr. Ali. See you next time!

Cappadocia Day Tour - Redline Tour . Our guide, Ali Battır is the best. He bring us to hidden places and explain extra information of each place. He is funny yet serious to the tour. Thanks Insider Travel, thanks also to manager Ersin and also the ladies working in the office, Yildiz and Munevver!

Awesome and Fun !. Awesome trip at Cappadocia with our awesome tour guide Ali Battir and Turan the driver !
