Amazing!!!!!. Originally I booked with insider tours as I was lost in cappadocia looking for my hotel when I was rescued by driver Haznet, I came too the office the next morning and booked my trip last minute and I am so glad I did, the green tour was amazing you are taken through the south of the area and visit the underground city, see the fairy chimneys and the monastry, plus a fantastic lunch. I think what made the tour extra special was guide Ali, driver Haznet and the people on the tour. I'm a solo traveller and have never been part of such a great mixed group. I decided I wanted to stay so extra day which the office did for me including rebooking my coach ticket and I booked the red tour for the next day. I was delighted when I arrived and 6 members of the group had done the same. We saw a completely different side of Cappadocia and I would urge anyone visiting to do both!!! Ali was the tour guide again but this time Manager Mr Ergin as the driver. Insider travel also looked after my luggage after I checked out as the hotel couldn't and after our tour me and 4 others the use of their office before our coach came offering us beverages and traditionally cooked potatoes. Hospitality at its finest. Thank you to everyone at insider travel for making this trip so memorable and special including the office ladies yiblit and minewer!!!!!

You guys are the best!!!. Best gila Ali jadi tour guide. Tak bosan langsung. It's so fun and memorable👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼 Thanks also to our dear Mr. Ersin the manager who helped us alot. And also to Yildiz and Hazret for being a part of my memory in Kapadokya. Sangat2 recommend kat sesiapa yang nak datang Cappadocia. Terima kasih Insider Travel🙆🏻🙆🏻🙆🏻

INSIDER TRAVEL TERBAIK!!!!. Great trip with great travel guide Ali, driver mr ersin and hazret with great travel mates. Good hospitality. Memang best tak tipu. Rasa nak datang lagiiiiiiii. Ali blh tlg ambil gambar kteorg, mmg cool 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

Fun and Informative. Awesome tour of Cappadocia with Ali our wonderful guide and Turan the driver. Took our group to some very interesting place off the beaten track and managed to avoid the really touristy places. Perfect for anyone who wants to do a (Long) day trip from Istanbul.

Amazing experience. Ali was fantastic during the tour. He gave us a lot of information on the history of the place, He was very considerate of the elderly couple on the tour. I would highly recommend him as a tour guide

Aaa. Everthing was great the tour guide Ali is very informed person he knows about everthing and that makes the tour more amusing. Also our driver Hazret was funny person. Finally if u pick up them on ur vacation u wont be regret

Most Memorible trip ever in Cappadocia!!!. To the company:Thank you for arranging our tour in Cappodocia. Thank you for being nice with us.Thank you for the good and efficient service. Kapadokya. Great trip thank to insider Traveler,good prices,responsable people and the tour guides Ali Batir and Hazret are excellent.

good tour for 1 day. This company people are the best . I came capadocia and i choosed red amd green tour in this agency. Best tour guide, human being, funny and sweet heart person. I love his way to talk makes travelers feel comfortable and makes us to enjoy the travel. Best Guide and Best tour :). Awesome!. Highly recommended! We were scheduled for Green and Red tour and were lucky to have our tour guide Ali and driver Hazret for both days. Awesome . V hv completed our trip to Turkey.... V booked our tour with inside... The entire trip was very well organized.... Thank u for ur help, hospitality... Tnx 4 an awesome tripKeep it up n Stay blessed

Great tour with Handan as tour guide!. i had an awesome experience , really organized and interesting! Our tour guide 'Handan' was of course the best part of the tour, she was very attentive and spreaded out her great energy along the whole day!

very nice company. insider Travel arranged my trip in Turkey.l had such a wonderful time all was nice orginze and l got really good price offer.l wanna say thank you Insider travel to my holiday unforgetanble and nice memories.Cappadocia was the best exprince druing my trip.Thank you all of you gusy..hope to see you soon..

Insider travel - cappadocia - tour guide ALI BATTIR. We started our cappadocia tour with Ali Battir as our guide. He is very professional, enterprising and has amazing knowledge regarding each and every place we visited. Also has decent knowledge regarding most of the countries & thus could engage all the tourists talking about their respective countries. My camera charger was not functional. Ali went out of his way in guiding me in getting hold of a charger within no time. Takes pride in describing the culture and heritage of Cappadocia. Insider travels had arranged for decent meals during our tours on both the days. Also arranged hot air ballooning at a good price. Highly recommended for tourists visiting Cappadocia.

Many thanks to Insider. It was our first visit to Istambul. One evening, we was passing at Insider Travel, which is in the old city and in a very nice location of Soltanahmed. Mr. Savash, helped us to plan our Istambul trips in a very kindly and professional way with a nice cup of Turkish coffee. Especially the Bosphorus tour, Princess Island and the Turkish night was amazing. No promiss was broken! Later we booked a trip to Cappadocia. Mr Savash did an professional job co-ordinating this great tour, good accomodation, very good fabulous guides- all speaking very good english. Many thanks to our tour guide Ali. He knows what to do!! If you are looking for an adventure, with deep history, art, unic landscape, people and food!!! We highly recommend MR. SAVASH at Insider Travel. We definitely will come back!!!

Insider Travel Cappadocia. Best experience ever with this branch in Goreme - Cappadocia! I arrived late at night at the airport and in the shuttle to the hotel realised I had forgot my memory card for my camera - I was due for a once of a lifetime balloon flight the next morning at 5am but it was already approaching midnight so chances of buying a new card was zero.,,On the shuttle was a staff from the Insider Travel who was EXTREMELY helpful - called his colleague in the office as he thought he might have a spare memorycard and he did - so late at night he made the shuttle stop by the office and I got to borrow the memory card which just totally saved the trip! Will be forever grateful for this and send you a warm thought whenever I look at my Cappadocia balloon photos! :-) There should be more people like you in the world!! Thank you!! Maria

Best trip ever!. Our tour guide Ali is a professional guide. He really know well history of the every place we visited. He is really a friendly guy and the kids love him! And thanks also to the driver which i already forgot the name!Will come again to cappadocia one day for sure!
Tour. It was really unforgettable the tour! I recommend you do it with them, especially with Ali! He took us to great places and explain everything really well!

Wonderful trip . Last minute I organize my trip to cappadocia from Istanbul with insider travel Mr. Savas Aral was great he helped us with every details. He is very friendly We arrived the airport they picked us up and started our tour right away. Mr. Ali Battir was our guide he was great friendly,funny, nice. Because of him our stay was great! Second day even it was his day of he came cause we ask if he can. Green and red tour was great! We loved it! THANK YOU!

Green tour & Red tour, Cappadocia. Our guide Mr. Ali is very nice, friendly and professional. He takes care of everyone and always tries his best to show us the real Cappadocia, and Ali has his unique way to make the tour interesting. Also, Ali will introduce the attractions with photos and notes with drawing, which makes things very easy to understand. All photo points are best. Highly recommended!!

Private tour - Athens. ProsOn time.Very willing to satisfy.Good driver, comfortable late model merc.Evei our Athens guide for the first half, very capable and great company.NeutralThe second half of our full day tour was driving around looking at shops via the car and not worth it. Would recommend reviewing the half day option.ConsOur tour was 450 euro for the 4 of us. Value 3 out of 5.Would recommend this company overall based on their willingness to make their customers happy.

Highly recommended . I did two tours (green and red) and luckily Ali Battir was the guide. One tour was with 9 people, other tour with 5 people. Ali was a great guide with good knowledge about Kapadokya as well always there to answer individual questions. Plus he is a funny guy. Highly recommended. As well both times I had great group members that made the tours even more enjoyable and fun.
Green Tour with Ali Bakkir. We just did a green tour with Ali and we are totally happy. Ali had great English and great sense of humour. Well organised and executed. Loved it.
Excellent Cappadocia Green Tour. Ali is an excellent tour guide with vast amount of knowledge of the sites on the green tour. He is funny, engaging and very helpful.

Excellent tour guides!. We toured Cappadocia with Ali Battir whose English is very good, and whose command of the history and culture of the region was excellent. Ali brought a real sense of wisdom, humility and passion to his task of explaining to us, first time visitors, some of the highlights of the region. Cappadocia is a treasure. Our visit was greatly enhanced by having a first-rate guide like Ali. Well done!

Cappadocia Red Day (North) Tour highly recommend it. Ali was our guide for the Cappadocia Red Day Tour and he is very passionate about Turkey and what it has to offer as well as the Cappadoccia region. We had a great day visiting the Uchisar Castle, Goreme Open Air Museum and fairy chimneys in various valleys. The pottery demonstration was very enjoyable and we also visited a small place off the beaten track where the host gave us fresh tomatos and dried grapes from his garden. Highly recommended.

Kapadokya Green Tour. We were confused about which tour agency to pick but the open and friendly nature of Mr.Ersin Uludag made us pick this one. Our guide Emre is a localite and was pretty knowledgable about the area. Everything was conducted in a very professional manner. The transport arrangements were very good and the lunch was okay too. Overall a nice and pleasant experience with them.The only negative I have to say is that they didn't provide us drinking water during lunch.

very bad experience,,. if there is less than zero, I will give to this agent. they send their sharpers to hunt the tourists and promise they will give the best price and cheapest one. but unfortunately, they are always more than other by more that $100.I went to bursa, sapanca and princess island with my wife by about $500 while other agencies give the same trip (package) by less then $350.Also, there buses don't have air conditioner. And when I back, I went to their office to tell them that. But unfortunately, they did care.Any way I will not recommend it for any one I love, may be I will recommend it for any one I hate.

Excellent service and Support. I was in Istanbul with my wife. Walked into Insider Travel SultanAhmet office. They arranged my trip to Kappadokya and Pamukkale. I must say everything was well organised and as per the commitments. Enjoyed every bit of my trip. Sarvas in Istanbul office is really helpful and you can count on him. Ali and Mehmet are really nice tour guides. Ali with his humour and Mehmet with his knowledge. Highly Recommended.

Awesome experience!. Amazing tour company! The tour was very well organized and they were timely. The tour guides were amazing as well and very entertaining throughout the trip. I would highly recommend using this company to book your trips and events in Turkey!

Kapadokia tour. Insider travel is good for day tours especially our guide Ali was excellent..the way he described the culture, the place was really great. He was sensitive above everybody likes and took special efforts in making us comfortable..ensure that your have him for the tour

Red and green tour of Cappadocia with excellent guide, driver and group size. We had the pleasure of taking the red and green tour with Ali Battir and driver Hazreem. When researching travel tours from home it is always hard to assess what tours to take and which company to choose but both days were amazing. Ali was extremely knowledgable and Hazreem was an excellent driver and the mini van in great condition. Tour maximum capacity is 15, we were a party of 8 one day, 12 the following. Both days were excellent. There was no pressure on buying anything when on the tour and lunch on both days was good and excellent value given the cost of the tour.

Red & green tour Capadoccia. From and back to Istambul, everything was well planned and nicely done, knowledgable and fluent tour guide, great spots and overall good food included, highly recommended! :)

Mercenaries. Went to Capadocia with some friends, to take the hot air balloon tour, which we bought in Istambul with Insider.When we arrive we were told by the hotel manager that there was a problem with our tour. We called and found out we had been re-scheduled to the following morning. When asked why, the Insider agent in Capadocia told me to call the agent in Istambul. We did so, to no account.Long story short, we went to confront the agent, a tall, asian-looking guy named Hamid or something like that. He accidentally let it slipped that the hotel told him we where staying one more night, so he changed our tour date without our concent. Which you cannot do. Refund was clearly out of the table - this guys are mercenaries: you can take what they offer or nothing at all. He event though it fit to demonstrate his kicking abilities when he felt intimidated. Not kidding. He speaks English very well, and talks to no end so as to confuse custumers.And of course we did not fly in the first group so we missed the sunrise.Talking with some other, more serious travel agent, we were told this guys owe money to half Turkey.Save yourself trouble - go elsewhereDisclaimer: the present review is only for the company Insider, not the Company that actually provided our Hot Air Balloon Tour - Skyways Balloon. I have rate them separately

Pleasingly good staff. Had a balloon ride cancelled due to weather. It was a little disappointing and we requested the agency weather they could find a ride the next day. Though they said it is highly unlikely as they were all full, we get an early morning call for the ride. All thanks to Yildiz Caldiran. Sweet lady with a smile always. Also the tour guide Ali was fantastic. With his subtle onliners and a very friendly nature, it was more like a friendly tour than a guided tour. Thanks for the trip guys. Job well done.

Excellent guide for the Cappadocia day tour-highly recommend!. While on my recent visit to Cappadocia, I had the pleasure of having Ali Battir as my guide for the group day "Red Tour". Not only did Ali provide our group with a lot of interesting information about the sites we saw, he was also very enthusiastic and added a unique, personal flavor to the experience. I learned a lot about the culture in Turkey, in addition to just the tourist sites! Each site we visited was amazing, and simply breathtaking. Ali was attentive to each of the group member's needs, and made sure that we were comfortable over the course of the day. He went above and beyond, and when I had an issue with getting a partial refund from a tour from the previous day from a different company, he went out of his way to help me get that issue resolved with the other company and assist with the language barrier. Ali was a terrific guide, left me feeling very positively about the hospitality and kindness of the Turkish people, and I learned a lot over the course of the day. I would recommend this tour company for anyone visiting Cappadocia and looking for a reasonably priced and informative day tour (Red or Green)!

Not Reliable. Our tour package in Cappadocia included all transfers. On getting ready to leave the area by bus we were in the office to arrange the transfer from our hotel to the bus station. I was put on the phone with the "boss" who asked me why I needed a transfer since the hotel is only 30 meters from the bus station. I told him that it was several hundred meters and that the transfer was part of my package. He agreed to have someone pick us up at 19:30 for a 20:10 bus departure. Nobody showed up. I'm 70 years old and needed to drag my suitcase through town so we wouldn't miss the bus. This was not the only problem we had with this tour company.

Cappadocia day tour. We did a one day cappadocia tour with them in June 2015. As we were advises by our agent in Istanbul someone would turn up at cappadocia bus station with our names to pick us up, however no one turned up. A few of us kept waiting at the bus station for 40 minutes early in the morning for someone to pick us up, we were later advised by the information desk that the insider travel office was just 50 meters from the bus station. The north tour we did was pleasant and comfortable. Our guide Ali did a great job. However the carpet and pottery exhibition we were taken too were overpriced. They could have made us visit places that were affordable and hence we tourist could actually buy something and in turn make some profit for the local artisans.

Wonderful trip coodinator and tour guides. I took a two-day tour to Cappadocia and Pamukale. The travel coordinator was terrific and very helpful. I made the tour with personalized itnerary. The local tour guides are very professional, passionate and knowledgable. It made me feel very safe and comfortable in a foreign country!

Left Stranded. Left it to the hotel I was staying in Istanbul to make arrangements for a 2 day Cappadocia tour about 30 days before my arrival from the states. They referred me to Insider Travel. I wasn't happy with the late return flight to Istanbul on the second day when I got the itinerary from Insider Travel. My flight wasn't scheduled to leave until 23:00, but I didn't review the itinerary before booking so my fault. The return flight to Istanbul was delayed about 30 minutes. By the time I exited the airport it was 01:00 or so and there was no one to pick me up for the transfer to my hotel. I was so tired I jumped in a cab. Mr. Savas Aral from Insider Travel told me after I returned home that the driver waited 30 min. only then was advised to leave the airport without me. They obviously didn't check the flight arrival time. I wouldn't book again with this company for that reason.I did the Red Tour the first day with a really knowledgeable tour guide and a small group of about 15 people. Very enjoyable. I don't remember the guide's name but he isn't an employee of I.T. The second day was the Green Tour which involves more walking and an Underground City. I ended up in a big bus with over 30 people which was way too many people for the Green Tour. I.T. advertises small groups of 15 people. False advertising.The Mystic Cave Hotel is so so. My toilet stopped working the morning I was leaving and it took over 10 minutes with the water running to get a hot shower.You get what you pay for!

Recommended for Cappadocia tours. We just had our Red and Green tour with Insider Travel. Initially we had no idea to which travel company that we paid for Green and Red tour as we booked our tours from ANZ Hostel at Selcuk. They gave us the best price of Green (100TL) and Red (90TL) tour. Besides being happy with the cheap price, we somehow felt worried we gonna get conned by non reputable company. However, Emre and Yasmine did changed our thoughts and expectations. They were very knowledgeable on their respective area. Their effort in explaining and accommodating each participants need is really appreciated. They are also being very helpful. I was carelessly left my hand phone at Onyx factory after Green tour and only realized after we reached Goreme. I returned to Insider office to ask Yasmine's assistance to call Onyx factory if they had seen my phone. Yasmine instead offer me a free ride using their black van to get there. Immediately with the help of Jamal we went there again and I managed to obtained my phone back.We never regret what we paid for.

GREAT. So helpful. Rearranged everything for us and booked us an amazing week seeing the sights for such a reasonable price! Would definitely recommend them to anyone thinking of touring to cappadocia and pammukale or around Istanbul. They let us leave our luggage and shower there too.

Great planning. We arrived to istambul without knowing what do to in capadoccia but insider travel agency complete planed us the trip! The staff is so welcoming and they are they help you in everything you need! Definitely plan your trips with them!

good guy made my trip. Hi people, my name is toshi. I traveled turkey in this winter. I liked their food, nature, culture, and people. But on top of that I got one guy in insider travel who did something cool, and made me like Turkey even more. His name is Savas, working for Insider travel in Cappadocia. Due to the wind, balloon couldn't fly, but the agency in Pamukkale seemed to decide to be silent about it. I had my flight back to my country, so I had to leave it to Savas. He said he will get my money back from that agent. he kept promise. Yo, Savas, you made my trip a good memory. Will visit you some time again in the future, lets have a drink.

Punctual & honest....!!!. They provide excellent service & punctuality was very good! Mr Savas Aval was very kind & honest to us! If you want great & cheap tour package...i suggest u to contact Mr Savas! The journey was awesome & very safe.. buffet lunch also was good....highly recommended...!

good service. We had three tours from this agency and the service was very friendly from the staff. We were offered tea on arrival and even chips on a separate occasion! On the tours the guides were very knowledgeable and would take out time to explain the significance of the historical sites visited. I felt the tours where good value for money and the meals provided for us as part of the tour where at very pleasant restaurants. I would book with them again if I was to return to Istanbul.

St.Valentine day. on St Valentine's Day my boyfriend and I decided to take part at this unforgettable dinner organized on the boat, with dancing shows. Thanks to the excellent advice of the agency, we had the opportunity to live an amazing experience. The Bosforo tour by night in the moonlight, a delicious dinner (you could choose to eat fish or meat), different and incredible shows, was something incredible! And then, everyone could dance among floating heartshaped ballons. Flowers and....so much love. Thanks because you let me have the most beautiful St. Valentine of all my life.Adele

"Unexpected and most memorable". Had a tour to one of the most enchanting places in Turkey, Cappadocia, with Insider Travel on the 29 Dec 2014. The staff are extremely accommodating and warm. It was a day trip and a flight back to Istanbul that night and I don't regret booking this unexpected trip.

Warm and friendly. My son and I did a Green tour in Kapadokya with Insider. We had a great day, enjoyed our guide who kept us moving so we didn't come home too late and was full of information about the places we went. In the office the staff were very friendly and we spent a bit of time talking about other things to do and see in Kapadokya and Turkey. My son was made extremely welcome and everyone was particularly nice to him. Turkey is a great place for kids, and Insider is a great travel agency. I recommend them.

Tour too rushed, ended in a jewellery shop. Took a Green Tour in Cappadocia with Insider Travel. The tour guide was very rude, at least she seemed to be having a very bad day. She was shouting at the group to move at EVERY single stop, so she obviously didn't realize the main point for tourists with these tours is usually first to enjoy the landscapes and the atmosphere of the places, really tune into the surroundings, and just then hear about the facts, history and interesting details. Everything she told was pretty much the stuff u could guess on your own anyway ("this is a kitchen and this used to be an oven/fridge/fire place" or "guess what this is - oh it is a well/air vent, guess what they did with them") and her whole point seemed to be just to run through all the places forcing people to listen to her and then rush everyone out. And yes, the tour ended up in a jewelry store where we had the most time to hang out then in any of the other places - BLAH!Only good thing was that the stops were all amazing. But since exactly the same green tour is offered by all the other tour agencies in Göreme, I would definitely advise everyone to use them, not this one.
Friendly service at Insider Travel Cappadocia. My husband and I did a 2-day tour in Cappadocia with Insider Travel. Staff were very friendly and professional. Thank you!
Great experience. We visited the Insider agency in Istanbul and also in Cappadocia. Nice and warm staff, and they helped us make a perfect tour in Turkey!
Wonderful. ıt was great!nıce peoples, and nıce trıp.ı leave here wıth my unforgottable memory.

3days trip. Great company! Really nice people, their sentence is "we can do that, we can solve that, we can make it". The travel was really well organized during the two days. Small group. Great lunch. The bus night was really good too. Hotel really good. Really nice! We couldn't make the the ballon experience, but it was great! I would do it again!

Very friendly one!. It's my first time to Turkey. Cappadocia Insider Travel is definitely a good choice to make.The 2 chief staff (maybe the boss?) are super friendly (even gave us oranges from their parents garden :p ) Very helpful with their point to point transportation with caring and warm greets.The hostel arranged in reasonable price and also in good quality and view.We joined red tour in the 1st day and green tour in the 2nd day.Tour guide in the red tour is good in English and clear in the hirtorical knowledge. But the one in green tour spoke a bit too fast, and the tour is bit too packed somehow. I hope the shopping part could be minimized in the green tour if possible... So that we could have a longer time spent in the ilhara valley.But anyways, Insider Travel staff are all very friendly.P.s. recommend the Turkish night, the belly dance in the finale is fabulous!! We spent a wonderful night there! (Well.. just don't expect too much about the food in the Turkish night..)

Great Hospitality. The chief staff there are extremely helpful and heart felt warm. Transportation is door-to-door and timely. The hotel " mystic cave hotel" run by this company is of reasonable price (we stayed in 6bed dorm),very convenient location and clean. Part of the tours bring you to shops,which make the trip a little bit hasty(the southern tour has longer driving time, thus shorter time for the sights), we don't mind shop a little to help out the quiet business in winter time, but can improve in arrangements of time. All in all, their trip is enjoyable and tour guides knowledgeable to the history n background of Cappadocia.

Goreme agency is fantastic!!!. I booked everything if Bonita Tour, but Insider Travel, in Goreme, did the tours for me. Even I did not contract direct from them, they were amazing with me. I needed help to book a hotel in Istanbul for the same night that I asked them and they did everything for me in a very lovely way! Savas is the person that helped me and he is very, very nice!!!Our guide, Emre, was very nice too.I really recommend them!

hacı. My time in Turkey as a whole was more a negative then a positive experience overall, In Istanbul I experienced people trying to rip me off where ever I would go they were generally unfriendly and unhelpful but the insider travel office in Goreme was pleasant and doing business the way it should be. They went the extra mile to help me out and assist in anyway they could. Alper was a very good tour guide, really intelligent and carries a good vibe with him. I definitely recommend the red tour. The food is definitely a bonus on that tour. As for the office. Extremely helpful. Every person was a pleasure to meet and were happy to have a conversation and just generally interested in me and not my money. So thank you.. If I was to recommend going to turkey.. I would only recommend this place. Thank you!

Too much walking, not enough history of old city.. We did the full day 'old city tour'. In the brochure we were given there was no mention of that it was a walking tour. It was so exhausting that 2 of our party dropped out before lunch. Some members of the tour were virtually hijacked at the carpet demonstration so we didn't make it to our frugal lunch till after 2 pm. Very disappointing. The guide was knowledgable but spoke too fast and was always in a hurry.

Terrible tour guide. The locations that the tour visited are great, but the tour guide, alpe[r] was useless. He avoided questions and had hardly any knowledge on any of the places we visited. He seemed to hardly care about anything and spent more time talking to other tour guides and chatting up the female tour guides than explaining anything or engaging us in any sort of conversation about the places we were at. We would be waiting to get into something and he would just stand there ignoring everyone and talking to other tour guides! Even if I asked a question he would blow me off. I am very interested in history, particularly early Anatolian history, so I was incredibly disappointed. We rushed through the underground city, which was the coolest place, but then spent ages at a JEWELLERY SHOP! I am incredibly disappointed and I do not recommend. Insider Tours, educate your guides on the regions and places they're discussing, and also on how to respond to questions! If he didn't know the answer to a simple question, he would just make something up. On a lighter note, lunch was nice and the places visited were too.

WORST TOUR EVER!. We wasted an entire day of our travels. From not finding our hotel to waiting 2 hours in the sun for a queue for a horse and carriage ride. Left next to no time to explore the island. On the way back the tour guide decided to forgo the 5 minute journey to drop us off at the hotel instead to go in the opposite direction dropping everyone else off only to find out that they got off themselves and left us on the bus to experience the Istanbul traffic first hand. Well 3 hours later we got back to the hotel. Worst tour experience ever!

Please Avoid!. Mr. Arif (our tour guide), you are in the wrong profession! We took a full-day tour (Euro 140 for two persons) including run-through-without-gaining-any-knowledge 'Dolmabache Palace, touch-and-go Spice bazaar, Pathetic Lunch, sway-around-like-orphans 'Bosphorous Cruise' and the most useless and terrible way to waste a beautiful spot like Pierre Loti hill. To end this on another awful note, taking excuse of traffic for cancelling the shopping part in the tour.Our guide's body language was indicative of the lack of interest you show when you already have pocketed your remuneration before performing your duties.Please make sure to check the guide's name with whichever tour agency you are going for, because my friend Arif is a free-lancer and works with many tour operators.

Waist of money. We booked the "Old City Morning tour" which included Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Hippodrome & Grand covered Bazar. Two people and we paid 80€ in total. Pick up at the hotel was 08.30. At 10.45 we had only seen the Hippodrome and we were starting to get worried about the pace of the tour guide. He had actually been away for 20 minutes without letting us know. Mentioning this to him, he just ignored us. At 12.15 we acutually choose to leave the tour. At that point we had been in Hagia Sophia, however running into new problems at the Blue Mosque. There was a long que and the others wanted to go for lunch i think... Long story. At the end, nothing worth paying 40 € each as you can do better on your own.

Trustworthy and Excellant.. I spent as much time possible talking with locals in my 11 days in Turkey. The tourist sites were not nearly important as my relations with the people and culture. You can't find better people than Muset (manager) and Keyvah who work at their Istanbul office. They both speak English very well. These guys will take care of you, and if a problem arises they will make it right. Prices were the same range as what we had found online. In other words you were paying the same as if we arranged it ourselves. Traveling in Turkey can be a bit crazy. Unless you speak Turkish you really put your trust in the people who make the arrangements. We took a bus to Cappadocia and the transfers were pretty exciting to say the least. Insider made sure there were people there who got us from one bus to another. The shuttles got us to Goreme and back without a problem or hassle. They arranged balloon fights were were wonderful. They arranged our bus to Cappadocia region, Goreme which went smoothly. They arranged a Bosphorus Cruise who had a wonderful tour guide who put up with me asking him 1000 questions about Turkey. You actually just ride on a ferry boat and you pay a bit extra for the English speaking tour guide. You also stop off at a mosque and Spice market during the tour. The first day of our balloon trip there was a mechanical problem with our balloon. I was very pleased that they chose the side of safety and decided not to fly that balloon. We were given the choice flying 1/2 hour later or wait till the next day. We waited for the next days flight which was wonderful.  Muset from Insider found out about the problem and gave us a call at our Hotel in Goreme to check up on us and make sure we were rescheduled. That is the kind of service he delivers. Take the time to accept his tea which he will offer and take the time to get to get to know him and Keyvah. Wonderful people. Something to consider. If we were to do it again, I would fly to Cappadocia region. Because we chose a night bus we had to arrange late check outs from the hotel and killing some time before the bus left in the evening. Also you arrive in the morning before check in. (Adora, Grand Cave Suites and Anemon were all great in accommodating us). From experience, talking,and reading, bus rides in Turkey are a bit hit or miss. Sometimes they are great experiences, other times not much air conditioning, frequent stops with lights coming on. Or, If I had the time I might take a day bus just so I could see the country side as we traveled overnight.

wonderful time. Due to a hiccup I was not met on reaching Goreme when I reachedthe office of insider travel I was welcomed and looked after. I went on two tours with them with different guides. Both guides were knowledgeable and informative. Yes we were taken to a commercial enterprise, but I and others found the visit interesting.

A superb travel agency!. Insider Travel Cappadocia is one amazing travel guide! Words aren't enough to express how much we loved the trip they prepared. For travellers like us, time is essential. We wanted to be able to visit as much places as we can without spending too little on each place. Insider Travel made this possible!They were always punctual but still flexible to whatever request their customers had. Our 2 days at Cappadocia was amazing-from the hotel, the itinerary and our travel guide, Alpe! He was very accommodating, knwoledgeable, and funny! There was never a dull moment in our trip. Everything was perfect! Thanks, Insider Travel!

Don't be conned. If you book a tour with them beware of getting taken on a shopping trip to a leather shop. We wasted the first hour of a three hour tour to the Chora museum through this waste of time. In fairness, it was mentioned as part of the tour, but when I want to go shopping I will choose where to shop, and what to buy after comparing prices independently. Especially in Istanbul you should do the same. It is well worth visiting the Chora museum, but save money, buy a guidebook, and do it independently, and you'll find its safe, and more satisfying.

trip to cappadocıa. Intınally ı was not sure about the group tour but ı booked myself wıth the travel agency ın cappadocıa 'INSIDER'. These people are very professıonal. Our travel guıde Hasan Alı was well versed wıth the hıstory of turkey and wıth all the monuments , places we vısıted durıng our stay ın Cappadocıa. He ıs very frıendly and provıdes you wıth the hıstory ın form of storıes to make ıt ınterterıng. ı totally recommend INSIDER travel agency:)

very good trıp. We spend two fantastıc day ın cappadocıa. Also thanks to the perfect guıde Hasan Alı.abbıamo trascorso due gıornı meravıglıosı ın cappadocıa, un esperıenza unıca e fantastıca, grazıe anche alla nostra guıda A lı Hasan che cı ha accompagnato nel green tour and red tour ın manıera professıonale ed amıchevole. Sperıamo dı tornarcı presto.

wonderful tour guide. Hasan Ali is an amazing tour guide I met in Goreme. With the help from this responsible, resourceful and professional guide, I had a wonderful experience in red and green tour. I enjoyed the scenary, learnt good knowledge abt the sites while being kept safe. Highly recommand!

Great tour with the best guide. During our stay in Goreme, we had our red and green tour with this travel agency. Our guide Hasan Ali, is the best guide in have ever met. He is so resourceful and responsible. He is friendly and interesting. He is willing to answer our questions and cared my friend when she was falling sick. Really appreciated! We want to say thanks to Hasan :) thanks for giving us the great trip.
Excellent job. Hassan Alı ıs a good tourıst guıde. He has gıven a lot ınformatıon abaut ,places we have a vısıted. Very frıendly and easy to ask any assıstance.

Great quality and informative. I had a great tour with Insider Travel (the green tour). Along with being blown away by my surroundings I found the tours to be well organised and dedicated to the guests and their needs. My tour guide Hassan Ali was informative, sociable and I had a great few conversation with him in between stops.

Excellent Green Tour in Cappadocia. We took the green tour from Goreme and it was quite nice. The tour guide was super knowledgeable and very funny. I also like that he talked a little about the situation in Turkey at present.The only negative thing I could possibly say about the tour was the last two stops were solely for commercial reasons. We stopped at a jewelry store and also a sweets shop. Pretty much a waste of 45 min for us. I think most companies do this though.Overall though, a good tour option.

Not worth your money. My sister and I arranged to go on their Bosphorous Cruise with Cable Car (half day, Tour 4A) on our first day in Istanbul. Sadly, the tour guide was basically just a person who shuttled us from point A to point B. He gave us little information and just left us with a meeting time at each point (he didn't not walk around with the group and talk about things, he only gave a snippet of info before releasing us). Even a novice traveler or a tourist could easily have gone to the places independently and saved 35 Euro. The worst part of the tour was at the end when we stopped for "shopping" at a leather shop. We were walked in and had to endure a mini-fashion show, then walked through the store. Only 1 person of our group stopped to buy anything. Had we understood this as the last stop, we would have left the group at the previous stop and not wasted our time. I don't know what their other tours are like, but I wouldn't recommend this one- perhaps, it was just our guide. I don't even remember his name as the tour was so un-tour like.

Junaid Abbas from Dubai. Our tour (Red Tour & Green Tour) was booked by our Istanbul Travel Agent "PARAN TOURS" with "INSIDERS TRAVEL" in Goreme / Cappadocia. When we arrived at Keyseri Airport, their driver was standing at Airport with our name, we arrived at Keyseri Airport at 0815 hrs and they straight took us to their office in Goreme & when we arrived their, tour bus was ready for Green Tour. We started our Green Tour at 0930 hrs. Our tour guide was "HASAN ALI", one of the finest tour guide, very knowledgible, young, funny & punctual guy. He guided and explained us all about the tour routes, history, places. We finished our Green Tour at 1645hrs and then they dropped us to our Hotel. Next day our Red Tour started at 0930hrs and again our Tour Guide was "HASAN ALI". As usual he explained us all about Red Tour, Sites, History and all.I would HIGHLY recommend to everyone to use "INSIDER TRAVEL" & everyone must ask for guide "HASAN ALI"

Beautiful Goreme in Cappadocia. We were in cappadocia for 3days and stayed in Goreme. The hotel recommended this company and we followed their recommendation and did the central 'red' tour. It was fantastic. Six beautiful stops, lots of breath taking views, nice lunch and a friendly entertaining guide happy to answer our questions. We would happily recommend to anyone. A great choice!

Tour 3 old city . Tour guide: Handan önal (Happiness)Had the greatest time with tour guide Handan. She really gave the energy to the tour. Very detailed with historic knowledge. Truly welcoming experience. Whats a tour without plenty of laughs...
Amazing guides. We had an amazing time full of informations days ago .. guide name was handan önal .. she was very helpful anf educated and experienced

Gate 1 Travel Turkey. Had a great time in Turkey. Gate 1 was great, no problems. Tour guide Salih, was excellent. So much to see, the people were so friendly and nice, would recommend this trip to anyone . . Also, such nice people on the tour. Gate 1 seems to attract a really nice group of people and their guides are terrific . t .I went to China with them previously and loved it as well.

Dont select Insider for Bursa. If you want waste your time and money please go with insider otherwise go by your self and select famous company to take you to Bursa.good thing: the advisor is talking english and very kind.bad things:1 wasting your time on the way from Sultanahmet to Bursa by selecting.2- filling the bus with diesl and washing bus took from our time and it have time more than any time that giving to us during tour.3- they send us to spacific shops which selleing the items with high prices 4- on the Brochour they put telefrek picture and in small remark they mention that telfek is not working. so take care they are fake only

Hi aydine(아이든)?. Today...Green tour is very comfortable & sweetwhen I left a camera in accomodation, you return to my accomoationThank u so muchI will miss you You are nice tour guide....♡Van driver is too...Wellcome to korea

Don't take Insider Tour to Bursa. We unfortunately went on the one day tour to Bursa. The van driver was scary; it's amazing we actually made it there. The tour itinerary did nothing to foster the highlights of Bursa. We stopped at several "outlets" to shop for junky clothing, the restaurant was pretty bad, we visited the "cultural" park late in the day for 30 min and there was a ugly man made lake and nothing to do. We thought we were going to see the silk bazaar but instead stopped for 10 minutes at a tourist store next to the mosque. The highlight was the tour of the mosque and the green tomb which took about 30 minutes of our 10 hour day. Luckily for us we left and spent the night at a spa hotel and visited the bazaar the next day. If all we saw was what the tour offered we would have thought Bursa was a bust. Thankfully we spent time visiting ourselves. That said the total time it takes to go and come back to Istanbul is long and torturous especially with ill behaved kids on the bus.

Amazing Cappadocia!. Insider travel took very good care of us while we were in Cappadocia. Kadir was our contact at the office and he was so incredibly helpful (Thank you, Kadir!!!). He set up fantastic tours, fixed a miscommunication we had with one of the balloon companies, arranged transportation or drove us himself, was very kind and professional and was always available with either a quick phone call or a stop by the office if we needed him. We did the North tour with Deniz, the South tour with Tugba, Turkish Night, the Whirling Dervish Ceremony and the Balloon Ride. They were all phenomenal experiences and if you have the time, I highly recommend doing them all. If you have to choose only a few, you must do the North and South tours and the balloon ride...WOW!!!Everyone we met through Insider Travel was very knowledgeable, helpful and fun. The prices for everything were very reasonable. Insider Travel will definitely make sure you have a great time during your stay in Cappadocia!

Cappadocia seen with a Golden eye. Our stay for 2 days in Cappadocia was made knowledge and enjoyable by our tour guide Tutba .. She is an amazing tour guide who has great knowledge of the area and showed us the city with great detail. Extremely friendly and highly recommend that you request for her during the North and South Cappadocia tour.

Amazing tours with a very friendly tour guide. I found the tour very worthwhile as I received a variety of interesting information and history about Cappadocia. Our guide, Deniz was very spirited and always answered any questions with great intent. He definetely made the experience much more memorable.

Sleazy driver!. I travelled on a two day north/south Cappadocia tour with my sister this month. As two females we received a lot of unwanted attention in Turkey. However, what we experienced with Insider travel was simply terrible. The driver hit on my sister and tried to lie down on her when we were sitting on floor cushions in a restaurant. We then told the manger who promised he would take care of the situation and we would not have the same driver on the second day. Low and behold on day two we had the same driver. At the end of the tour we talked again to the manager who said that he asked the driver what happened and the driver said nothing ever did. I would not recommend this tour company to anyone as there are plenty of others in the area with a better track record.

Cappadocia presented on a golden platter. We were in Cappadocia for only one day, but it made for an unforgettable experience. Our guide, Deniz, was very knowledgeable and friendly. His cheeriness never let our spririts down during this very charged day. His information gave the sites much more meaning, without getting boring. Top!

Bursa - Unprofessional tour guide, dangerous driver. Avoid at all cost!!!!”. We have booked the above day trip via paran tour. Ozcan never informed us that the cable car is not working and when I complained to him about part of the tour, he pretends he cannot hear me from the phone. He charged people differently for the same tour. So do not use them.The tour itself is a disaster. The driver constantly switches lane., drives very fast and at the same time talk on the Mobile phone. Although the tour does include lunch you might as well not. As the food is horrible. The food in McDonalds (which I normally do not like) is better than what this tour have provided. The meat is like donor kebab meat but dry. One of the stop that they drop us to - mount Olympus / uldag has no views full of rubbish and cars. Yet we need to stay here for an hour doing nothing. When we complained to the guide he was not helpful but just say I am doing what the brochure tells me. I am not sure he is insterested in his job. As after we complaint his attitude change completely. He did not take us to the olives market as according to the bronchure. When he takes us to see a very old tree I asked him what is So special his answer was you go and see it yourself. When he drops us off he did not even bother to come down from the car to say goodbye or help!!!! How unprofessional. His English is not good enough to be a guide as very often when we asked him question he does not understand!!!!

Dolmabahaçe Palace, Bosphorus. i enjoyed my time visting the awesome dolmabahaçe palace, then having a nice launch ,our tour guide ömer eraslan was so friendly and we liked the way he managed the tour, we were excited to listen from him about the history of the palace,then we went to the egyptian bazar, it's nice but very expensive,the bosphorus was amazing we had alot of pics , i really recommend this tour especially with ömer

Excellect Day Tour. Had the chance to book a last minute day tour visiting places around Turkey that included Dolmabahaçe Palace, Spice Market, Lunch beneath Galata Bridge, Cable Car @ Piere Loti Hill and Bosphorus by Boat. Me and my wife did quite a bit of walking around ourselves prior to the tour day, but I must say, our tour guide Ömer Eraslan was wonderful. His knowledge of Turkish History is vast, and he was a pleasure to spend the day with. I would DEFINITELY recommend him to any visitors wanting to take a detailed tour.Thanks,

Dedicated to service. We wanted a French spoken guide for privates visits of Istanbul highlights as my husband was speaking Turkish, I was speaking English but our children neither nor. Finally we accepted to have Ömer Eraslan who was such a nice and service dedicated guide! Thanks to him we could experience things like the non tourist local food and tramways. So, at the end, we dis not regret our choice! Kind regards to him from the French family he had on April 24 & 25....

Excellent Trip. We arranged to travel on an all day trip taking in the following: Dolmabahaçe Palace, Spice Market, Lunch beneath Galata Bridge, Cable Car @ Piere Loti Hill and Bosphorus by Boat.Collection at our hotel meant a 5 minute walk to the minibus as stopping outside our hotel was a bit of a no no. Our first port of call having traipsed round Istanbul collecting various passengers was the Dolmabahaçe Palace. It is a vast place with many interesting artefacts and decorations, the rooms are overlarge and very ornate (If visiting independently, you will require a guide) It took well over an hour to traverse all the rooms that are open to the public and there are several renovations in progress. It is something not to be missed on a visit to Istanbul.The Spice Market was our next port of call and we were given about 50 minutes to look round and purchase anything we liked. Having met up with most of our fellow travellers (two went walkabouts) we walked to the restaurant under the Galata Bridge. We were given a "mese" starter and offered fish or chicken for main course finishing with fresh fruit. It was what one would normally expect on such a trip. Whilst lunching we were able to observe the comings and goings on the Golden Horn not forgetting the many fishing lines from the bridge of locals catching their supper.Having located our miscreants we made our way to the bus and headed to the Piere Loti Hill, which afforded spectacular views of the inlet. Returning to road level we headed for our final port of call, the boat ride up the Bosphorus. We caught on of the many ferries that ply their trade along this route. It was a pleasurable way to spend an hour and a half cruising between Europe and Asia. (Note: wrap up warm as the wind can knock the temperature down many a notch).The whole day was an excellent way to spend our last full day in Istanbul. Our Guide for the day was most knowledgeable and had a very good command of the English language. He never stopped imparting information as to our surroundings.Although pricey, it was well worth the money as we had a wonderful day out. Thank you Fuad.

AMAZING cappadocia!!. we are visiting from Dubai 3 of us, and we booked our south south with Insider Travel. The trip was absolutely amazing plus our tour guide Mr. Asim who gave us all the information about the history of each places through out the trip and he was very knowledgeable and interactive with all of us, thumbs up for him!! we definitely will be back again for the next trip and will recommended Insider Travel with Asim as the tour guide! Big thanks to him to showed us the beautiful places in cappadocia and made our trip unforgetable!!!! i love cappadocia

Cappadocia is Awesome with Asim!. Cappadocia is a incredible city with a landscape like no other! I went on a tour with our guide Asim Ciftci which made the time worthwhile. He was very knowledgeable about the region’s history and we learned a lot while enjoying the sites. Asim also was very accommodating and helpful once the tour ended which helped make Cappadocia the best part of our trip!

Cappadocia best part of Turkey. Thanks to our tour guide Asim Ciftci (and "Tuna" our driver), our trip to Cappadocia was wonderful and truly authentic. We got a great deal of information about the history of Cappadocia and visited several beautiful and interesting sites.

Not bad. I went with Insider Travel Turkey to one day tour to Bursa, specially to see Uludage mountain to see the snow in the top , but when the tour start the guid she said just we will to see mosques in Bursa and visit silk bazaar , we stopped her and we told here if you won't take us to the mountain we will get off from the bus and go back to our hotels, finally after negotiation she accept to take us to the mountain.It was long journey it take 4 hours to get there and 4 hours to go back, We had our launch in Bursa then we continue to the Uludag , and we stayed there just about one and half hour in the top, Handan the guide of our tripe was very good and she all the time was looking after us .One thing I notes that in the tour we were 11 people they picked us up from our hotels , but the prices fore each one of us it is deferent , for me I went with my wife and we paid 90Euro for each one , I asked the other , one of them paid 70Euro and other paid 100Euro.

Great Tour of Cappadoccia. Spent 2 days in Goreme. Was very lucky to be referred to Insider Travels. We covered north and south Cappadoccia in 2 days. I have to especially mention our tour guides Efe and Touba. They were both very considerate, kind and knowledgeable. Everything on the tour was perfect. From lunch to the transport to the sites. Great Job.

Cappadocia: The Land of the Beautiful Horses. I cannot do justice in words to the beauty that is Cappadocia. You need to see it to believe it! Insider Travel did an amazing job of showing all the beauty that this land has to offer.I would highly recommend Tugba Dogu, my guide, who was smart, funny and extremely helpful throughout the trip!Keep up the good work!Jordan

Capadocia Region. We spent 3 days in this incredible region. Our tour guide Asim was great, thanks to him and his partner we got to know the local culture. He was a great guide he explained everything and took a lot of pictures of us. It was an unbelievable trip.

North and South of Cappadocia with Asim Çiftçi. I'd like to tell everyone how beautiful and interesting is Cappadocia! I spent two days in this amazing place. In my first day trip I went to know the North part, we visited all the tourist places and could learn about history and myths things. In the second day I visited the South part and once again enjoyed a lot all the things I saw and learned. Asim was my guide in both days, he's a really good guide! Beyond his huge knowledge about the spot, he is also a host who will help you with any other thing you need. I haven't done the balloon flight because I got tired and prefered to leave this to do next time, but if I had had one day more over there sure that I would have done it. So, this is my tip: try spending at least 3 days in Cappadocia.

Captivating Cappadocia. I recently returned from a week-long visit to Turkey. I spent a few days in Istanbul and several in Cappadocia. Cappadocia is truly captivating. I did both the north and south tours with Insider Travel (and they also arranged a balloon tour, which is a very popular thing to do in Cappadocia). It was a great trip. The reason why is was so fabulous was our super-awesome, friendly, warm and knowledgeable guide -- Tugba Dogu. She's an engaging young woman who truly understands how to work with groups. By the end of each day, our groups were engaged with her and with each other. Her English is excellent and she was great at answering all kinds of questions. Also transfers and driving was excellent, timely, clean, etc. Lunches were good..really a good time. I highly recommend a visit to Cappdocia and ask for Tugba with Insider. She's fab!Other: fees for attractions were included in the tour package and it was a great way to see the whole area.

Nice experience. I been for a week in turkey.sometimes i like to flight alone and one of the best things that i did in istanbul was my experience in the capaddocia.two wonderful days living in a magic land,the balloon flight was incredible, and also all the histories about the caves and the faery chimney. I have to mentioned my guide,tugba,very kind girl.always happy.

Worst experience in Istanbul. We were a group of two families total of four adults , four kids, and three infants, we had spent three days in Istanbul visiting museums on our own, it was ok since most have the audio guide which was really helpful, the kids were tiered from walking around historical sights so we decided to take a tour to bursa for a change, that's when we were deceived by the insider travel into paying 90 euros per person which we were told would include the transportation, lunch and a cable car trip to the top of uludag, and visiting an ottoman mosque and tomb. We were told that the trip there is around three hours total,We booked our trip a day before ( which was the last day of the holy festival, bayram) , we were told that they would pick us up on 8:15 am, but they arrived 7:30am and were rushing us, you can imagine how things are in the morning with kids, we were at the bus 7:50 am , we were taken to a gathering point where we waited 30 min , that's when our tour guide started saying that they might skip the cable car ride because of the weather ( which actually seemed ok) , on the way there we stopped at a Turkish delights shop for half an hour, then in a so called shopping mall for over an hour, nothing special in either. By then the kids started getting fed up with the trip, we arrived at bursa after the guide claimed he got a phone call from X saying the cable cars were closed and that we were visiting an old tree instead , we asked our guide to take us to the cable car station but he refused, we spent 30 min watching a very big tree, we then arrived at the area were the restaurant , the mosque and the tomb are, we were givin an hour and 20 min free time ( no guide) for lunch and visiting the sights, by then it was 3:35 pm. We had lunch at the restaurant where we asked for a table with a view and they refused, claiming that it was the agency that reserved the tables, the kids had to wash, then we had about 15 min left to visit the mosque and the tomb, not enough to take pics , we rushed to the bus, that's when we were told that since its the last day of the festival the roads will be crowded, and it really were we arrived back at the hotel 11:40 pm .we spent ten hours on the bus and we weren't givin enough time to see bursa not even the uludag mountain. The whole group thought It was a total waste of money and more important time. No one was satisfied at all.The next day we complained to the agency they were very rude and unprofessional handling our complain, they were not even willing to apologise verbally . I don't recommend this agency at all.

worst tour of new district istanbul. it all started of quite well. We visited the Dalmabache palace. Then we were taken to a leather store. We were taken into a dark show room where a leather "fashion" show took place. Then herded up some stairs to rooms filled with merchandise. After that horrible waste of our valuable travel/touring time, our guide took us to the spice market where she herded the group into her friends shop. We - my friend and I - escaped and shopped on our own which allowed us to see the spice market during the 20 minutes allowed.  The rest of the group was trapped in her friends shop and not allowed to do any experiencing of the spice bazaar.  I would never recomment this company to anyone. I was charged $52.06 for a morning tour which turned out to be just the palace, trapped in a leather show and a quick spin of the spice bazaar which we saw only because we excaped our guide for 20 minutes. THe worst tour.

Excellent trip to Cappadocia. We had a great time with Insider Travels for our trip to Cappadocia. Asim Ciftci was our key tour guide, and it was real fun. My entire family has kudos for the Insider travel team. We recommend them fully for your trips to Turkey.

Amazing trip. La belle Cappadoce!The trip was amazing. Us guide, Asim Çiftçi was so great. We pass a wonderfull time with him. We laughed and discovered so much things. Like beautiful places with beautiful view! He know very well the place and he was aswering every questions that we have. Thanks for everything!

Excellent Service in Cappadocia. We had taken the two day Green and Red tours in Cappadocia from Insider Travel. We arrived from Denizli (Pamukkale) by bus at around 8.30am. The Insider Tour representative walked us from the Bus Station to the Insider Tours office adjacent to the station. The tour bus was yet to arrive, and so the tour guide very thoughtfully drove us to our hotel in his own car! Our tour (Green Tour) started on time and the Tour Guide was very pleasant. Though a lot of us were tired from the overnight bus ride into Cappadocia, the guide was very energetic and took the pains to explain the tour and account for relaxation time. The tour of the underground cave city was simply superb and is a must try experience!The valley walk was nice, but not necessarily unique - so was a little tiring. The food was a bit of a problem as we were vegetarian and the fare was edible at best. However, the guide was very kind to notice that we weren't enjoying our meal and offered to have sandwiches made for us. Through the tour the guide was friendly and regularly enquired about our experience.We were very tired at the end of the tour on day-1 and hence wanted to pull-out of the tour on day-2 (Red Tour), as we had a balloon tour in the morning as well. We informed Insider Tour in the evening and the response was cordial and understanding. In fact, he voluntarily returned the tour fee (and its not often that travel agents act so professionally). The balloon tour, also organised by Insider was excellent, through rainbow balloons. The balloon ride started early in the morning at 5am and we had some sandwiches and tea at the Rainbow balloons office. Once the balloon was ready, we were taken to the site to board the balloon. The ride lasted about an hour and we had an experienced pilot. The ride was capped off with a champagne party upon landing (and a perfect one at that). We thoroughly enjoyed the ride.Overall, in our brief visit to Turkey, we rate Insider as one of the best operators that we saw in the country.

Fantastic activities and perfect guides for us!!. We were a group of seven people and we did amazing routes and activities with them. They were very cheerful, polite, funny and attentive!! We would hire them again!!

Awesome Asim!. We did two tours in Goreme (Cappadocia) with Insider Travel - the Green and Red Tours and couldn't have been happier. The Green Tour was definitely better than the Red Tour as you felt your group was the only ones there. The Red Tour took you to some of the more touristy areas where it was a little more crowded, but both tours are a must. The highlight of the tour was our guide Asim - he was indeed awesome! We were lucky enough to have him for both tours. His English is great and was extremely personable and explained everything incredibly well. He mixed history, stories, and humor throughout both days making us wish the tour would never end. Request Asim and you will not be disappointed!!Insider Travel as a whole seemed extremely professional and truly catered to everyone's needs. Some people need to return early for transfers to the airport or the bus station and they would take them during the tour without affecting the flow of the day. I can't speak more highly of Asim and the agency!Bravo!

Bursa tour. Took Bursa tour to go up Mount Olympus. Only 2 carriages working and the total return trip was over 4 hours with 3 hours of that time waiting in lines. DO NOT take this trip until this problem is fixed. The rest of Bursa is not worth the 6 hour traveling time to get there.

Bad experience. I chose insider to go to Bursa under one condition which is the guide must be an Arabic speaker and the representative assured me that. When I got into the bus and after half an hour the guide said that she needs someone from the tourists to translate into Arabic.!!!! My children asked me to translate to them which I really tried to avoid .Most of the Arab tourists did not enjoy the trip not because only the unavailable Arabic translator but also the unnecessary stops we made plus the horrible lunch provided to us . I decided to leave the agency in cable car because they did not provide the second stop in the cable car which is the most beautiful and came back to Istanbul by taxi which I paid from my money. Next day I went to the agency to complain and I met the representative who spoke to his manager whose name is Ozcan. This manager was trying to convince that this condition is not written , so I realized from the beginning that he is not a problem solving . I had my witness when the representative assured me with my condition. Ozcan shouted at me and asked me to get out of his office !!!!! A clue of a good service. I decided to complain to the Turkish tourism office but my witness managed the situation with the agency and the offered me a free trip inside Istanbul. Although the situation somehow managed not by Ozcan , I really do not recommend this agency not only because of the bad service but also because of the bad attitude of the manager Ozcan.

Insider Travel - Cappadocia - Tour guide: Efe. What an amazing experience! We did both the North & South tours (Blue and Red?) So many great sites & our tour guide was really fun, knowledgeable and a great singer. The food was great, company was great. Happy to recommend.

Excellent Tour Guide. Emre Rehber was an amazing tour guide from beginning to end. Before we ever got to Turkey every detail was planned, organized, and communicated to me by Emre. I knew every flight we would be taking, every hotel we would stay at (and hotel website so I could check them out in advance), historical sites we would be visiting, as well as, various side activities to consider. In addition, Emre listened to and responded to ALL my questions/concerns about travel in Turkey. One of the best things about Emre is his initiative--he takes his job very seriously and wants to make sure that his client's expectations are met. He finds out what your interests are so that he can personalize the travel experience as much as possible. In my case, I love cooking so Emre set up a morning of preparing a tandoori lunch with a lovely and amazing local woman in her home. That experience was just one of the highlights of the trip (and, the food was beyond delicious--one of the best of my life!) Emre is very organized yet flexible if tell him you would like to make a change in the days activities. Emre is a personable and open guy--very easy to talk to. He wants you to know about Turkish history and how all the pieces fit together. He clearly loves his job and his country. Lastly, we always felt absolutely safe with Emre and his drivers. Everyone we met through Emre was professional, kind, well spoken and competent. I give Emre my highest recommendation.

Best Vacation ever.... I am a world traveler. My husband and I are love to travel new places. We visited Istanbul once and dreaming to go there again. I can not think of one thing that I did not like on that trip. We had the most knowledgeable and the most professional tour guide, Nesrin. We are still in touch from time to time. I highly recommend and refer all our friends to Delightful Istanbul Tours. Thank you for an amazing vacation experience.Anna and Val Roytman, USA.

Great country, great sights and above all Great Guide!!! Our fascinating and enjoyable tour of Turkey in two days !!!!. We had an amazing time in Turkey touring Pamukale, Kusadasi, Ephesus and Istanbul. yes all that in just tow days. I must say it would not have been possible with our the expertise of our guide Emre.He is simply incredible, very professional and phenomenal in managing all our requests for the various sites with our limited time.We not just saw the sites but also enjoyed his company as he is very friendly and spoke very fluent English. Right from the moment I had send him my first inquiry email to the last moment, when he dropped us off to the airport, he was very patient, helpful and everything happened smoothly. His guidance was simply amazing. The transportation, entrance fees, hotels- everything was very well organized and of top quality.We were warmly received at the Izmir airport by him and his associate( an amazing person also) , and then we set off on our amazing tour of Pamukalee and all the interesting smaller cities that were on the way. Emre told us interesting facts and details of cities like Nazili, Atca, Aydan and more. Pamukale and the ruins of Hierapolisi were very marvelous. Definitely worth the long drive. The sunset over the pools of Pamukale was amazing and sunrise on the shores of the Kusadasi was breathtaking. Another highlight of our tour was Ephesus. Fascinating history and Incredible town planning from thousands of years ago. So much can be said about the city of Istanbul. The magnificent architecture, tiles and art work of the Blue Mosque, Aya Sofia and the Topkapi palace are beyond description.Emre has a genuine passion for history which makes him very knowledgeable and made the entire tour very interesting and educational for us. Looking at the beautiful scenery and sites is one thing, but knowing the history behind them makes it all the more fascinating and interesting.We concluded our incredible tour of Turkey with the show of the mesmerizing Twirling Dervish. We had an unbelievable time. I just have to go back for another tour as there is still so much to see in Turkey and there is no doubt that Emre will be our guide. His pleasant company added to make our trip so awesome.He was truly a great reflection of Turkish hospitality and culture, I will definitely recommend him.

Day City tour with my Family -excellent service. It was a great experience and Omar (our guide) did a fantastic job with my family walking us through the streets and iconic places of the city. His knowledge of the city was really good and had the patience to answer all the question that my 10 year daughter had!!...and they were lots Q&As

trip to istanbul kapadokya izmir ephesus. Our experience with Emre :- very knowledgeable about history in ancient time, answered most of our questions- brought us to the eating places to taste turkish dishes- we even experienced to cook with a local woman- transportation, hotels, all entrance fees are excellent- pleasant guy with humor

Great Guide - Highly Recommend Him. We spent 10 days with Emre going from Istanbul to Izmir to Cappadocia. He is a great guide and a lovely person to be around. He helped plan our itinerary, recommended hotels, internal flights and restaurants. He accommodated our preference to walk a lot (as opposed to sitting in a car all the time). He is knowledgeable about history, Islam, local sites, flora, and fauna. He answered our endless questions skillfully and patiently. He planned a pace that was busy but left time to shop or take photos. We saw all the key sites but had extras as well: a river trip on the Bosphorus, a multi-course lunch with wine tastings at a vineyard in Ephesus, cooking with a local woman in Cappadocia. He met my special request to visit a clinic and school. We also did a great hike in Cappadocia. He also accommodated us in other ways, for example, we did not want to have a big lunch and dinner every day so he found quick and tasty places to have a light lunch many days. I would highly recommend him.

IT WAS WONDERFUL. In this tulip season of Istanbul we had a great time with guide Kaan and enjoyed our vacation .. They took us to the great museums, sightseeing places, restaurants and oriental authentic bazaars of the city . This company's services were really so over our expectations all the way through Istanbul. Kind regards from the northern part of the worl

Personalized touring at its finest. I have been using Delightful Istanbul for my clients traveling to Turkey. Emre provides excellent guiding in Ephesus and Istanbul whether your on a cruise or a stopover in Istanbul. As a travel professional I need a very trusting and reliable source in every city our clients travel to. For Istanbul and Ephesus Emre and Delightful Istanbul Touring are my choices.

Couple from Spain. As a couple from Spain we've been to Istanbul and had a lovely time there . Our guide Kaan did a fantastic job and showed us many beautiful hidden spots of Istanbul . When we made contact for Istanbul tour everything was organized carefully . Thanks A lot Kaan for a very informative tour in Istanbul . In the future we hope to be back in the new tours with you.

Istambul & Ephesus. I contacted Emre Emre OZKARA from Delightful Istanbul Tours for a 14 people guiding service in Istanbul and Ephesus. He planned everything and made valued suggestions in our travel plan. I was particularly concern with the transportation ( there were 4 kids and 2 babies in the group). Finally we got first class vehicles in both cities, baby seats were OK and we even got a Van with WIFI. Another concern was the quality of the guides- because my father in law is very well informed in historical stuff. Both guides were very keen. If you go to Turkey and need help to getting around with a group I strongly recommend Delightful Istanbul Tours.

Excellent tour!!!!. Kaan was our tour guide with his friendly manner & excellent knowledge of Istanbul made our trip unforgettable, would highly recommend both Kaan & delightful tours as a way of seeing all that Istanbul has to offer..Beautiful & amazing place thank you to Kaan for such a fantastic trip..

Amazingly friendly and informative trip. Thoroughly enjoyed my tour of Istanbul with our excellent guide Kaan aksoy, got to see some amazing sights and found the entire experience an absolute pleasure, would highly recommend 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 A+ service :)

Brilliant tour of Istanbul . Myself and some friends visited Istanbul and decided to take a tour of some of the main tourist attractions. Kaan Aksoy was our guide and he was fantastic, he was very knowledgeable and also very pleasant. It was a joy having him as our guide! He brought us to many wonderful locations within Istanbul, there is so much to see. The blue mosque was my favourite! We will be back to see this beautiful city and its beautiful people such as Kaan who made it that much more enjoyable :)

It was really amazing. Last summer I was in Istanbul with my friends. Almost all places we visited that need to see.Ofc in company with professional Turkish guide. The city,the tour were great but professional tour guide Kaan Aksoy made it perfect . He is really skilled,diligent,polite.Above all , he has full knowledge of İstanbul. Thanks for all Kaan, i hope we see each other again.

Great Istanbul Tour . We had our first visit to Istanbul last month and we really enjoyed it . Emre and his crew organized the things very well during the tour . Our tour guide was very knowledgeable and hospitable. We absolutely appreciated your work . Thank you so much Emre :) We are looking forward to visiting Turkey again .

A wonderful experience..Highly recommended. After a 2 weeks Europe tour in October, we decided to fly to Istanbul for short visits. We had Embre as our guide. Our tour was small and pleasant. Embre was professional, kind & knowledgeable. I felt like he was just a friend. After so many days without having rice as our meal, Embre took us to a Chinese restaurant, and Embre had his very first experience in Chinese food with us. He also brought us to try the goat milk ice cream which we thoroughly enjoyed. We would not hesitate to recommend his service to anyone travelling to Istanbul and also Embre- You're the best!

Fabulous tour of Turkey with Emre. We (2 families) spent 10 days at Turkey between Istanbul, Cuppadocia, Pammukale, and Kusadasi. It was a fantastic trip, thanks to Emre who has been our guide all through. Very professional.

Excellent tour sultanahmet by Julide from delightful tours. Tour was great ! Guide was Very knowledgable and accommodating to my questions and picture requests . Blue mosque, topkapi , Hagia Sophia , cistern, grand bazaar, spice market all covered extensively. Highly recommended !

Great Company All-Around. I took a group of 10 people to Istanbul and hired Delightful Istanbul Tours as our guides.My experience with them was great from beginning to end. They answered my e mail inquiring about their services right away, were always thorough and professional.When we got there the guide Emre was knowledgeable, always on time and very friendly. Everything was excellent. I would hire them without a doubt.

Excellent choice for a tour guide!. I organized a tour for my family with Emre. Although I never got to actually meet him, I found him easy and efficient to deal with and organize the trip through. According to my family - the tour itself was excellent. Due to flight problems, what was meant to be a 2 day tour was reduced to part of a day, but they said Emre really did his best to ensure they got to see the best highlights of Istanbul in that time. They spoke very highly of his energy, interest and enthusiasm towards his guests. They were very happy and didn't even feel like they missed out too much, despite the flight delays!

Day in Istanbul. We had a day docked in Istanbul, not nearly enough time to really experience this amazing city. Our decision to employ Emre for the day meant we made the very most of the time we had. He was able to guide us efficiently through the major attractions and was a wealth of knowledge.

Best Tour Guide Ever!. We visited Istanbul in June and I had been researching tour guides to help us see the city.Little did we know that the best tour guide in Istanbul would be available to us. I saw some write ups on Delightful Istanbul Tours and decided they were worth a try. And, I couldn't have picked a better company! Emre is a delightful, knowledgable and very flexible guide. We saw everything in the two days that he was our guide, experienced the food, culture, as well as the Blue Mosque, to the Cisterns, the Topkapi Palace and even a cruise of the Bosphorus. He even arranged a cupcake birthday party for my grandaughter, while on our cruise. We all enjoyed Emres' company, especially my grandaughter. I cannot recommend Delightful Istanbul Tours enough! I also enjoyed working with Emres wife, Nezrin, while planning our trip. She was a delight to work with and provided important information for our tours. JUST THE BEST! You won't go wrong, can't wait to visit Ismir and Ephasus for tours with Emre.
