CAPADOCIA VISITA CON -CHORA TRAVEL. circuit I made two nights three days of Cappadocia, With Chora Travel Turkey.I have to say That Both excursions with English-speaking guide, like the hotel, as well as transfer to aeropueerto PICK, worked perfectly.meeting expectations.At a very reasonable price.The visit to Cappadocia was very nice and I would recommend to everyone.July month of 2013francisco Ayala Barcelona (Spain)

Excellent Services Provided. My 3-day trip to Cappadocia (2 days) and Pamukkale (1 day) for one person was a last-minute decision which has been suggested and planned by Chora Travel. The charge was a bit on the high end but I was very satisfied with the services provided. Chora Travel gave very quick response to my enquiry, emailed me all the vouches for domestic flights, hotels, and tours. I was particularly satisfied with the Tour Guide provided by Shah Mat Travel for Cappadocia Tour because it was one-on-one service for my first day arrival (half day tour at Cappadocia). The arrangement for one night at Cave Hotel Room of Cappadocia did provide good experience. The only suggestion for improvement of the one-day Pamukkale Tour provided by Mislina Travel is to arrange a hotel that provides bathroom facility for non-overnight guest. Because I travelled from Cappadocia by 10-hour night bus, it means I arrived at Pamukkale by 6 am. I was picked up at bus station and was transferred to a local hotel to have a rest at the hotel lobby and to wait for day tour starting at 9:30 am, completing at 4 pm. However, no bathroom facility was provided by the local hotel. It will be good to be able to take a shower particularly after the day tour.

Turkey Trip. We would like to thank Chora travels for organizing a wonderful trip to Istanbul,Cappadoccia and Kusadasi. Ours was a last minute decision and Mr. Yusuf arranged everything in a day. Infact when my luggage didn't arrive in Kusadasi , Mr. Yusuf along with his associates Crossroads travels managed to get my luggage the next day. We are very grateful to them. We would like to thank Haroon from Shahmat travels in Cappadoccia . He is very knowledgeable when it came to sightseeing in Cappadoccia. Also special thanks to Ms Begum from Crossroads travels with whom we did Pamukkale.

Top rate tour company. I returned from Turkey earlier this week and had a fabulous time, thanks in part to the excellent tours arranged by Chora Travel. After extensive email exchanges with Nejo months before travelling to Turkey, I ended up forgetting to confirm and pay the deposit! Nejo only knew that I was still interested when I contacted him the day of my arrival to Turkey...and the first tour was planned for the next day! Thanks to him, he arranged for me to visit the places on the original plan - Istanbul, Troy, Ephesus and Cappadocia - and the first tour took place before I paid a cent!The tours themselves were professional and well organised; pick ups took place without a hitch. It was also good value for money. Additionally, I felt safe as a single female traveller and it was a blessing that everything was already organised and that I did not have to plan or worry about anything (the company organised/paid for pick up from hotels and airport, food while on the tour, entrance fees to the various attractions).After putting him through the last minute planning, it was certainly a pleasure meeting Nejo when I overnighted in Cappadocia and invited to share in dinner. I felt like an honoured guest and was touched by the gestures.I would definitely recommend travelling with them and expect that I will soon be planning a tour with them for some members of my family!!Tricia

Chora Travel did the Impossible. Everyone told us we couldn’t visit Ephesus, Pamukkale and Cappadocia in 4 days but Nejo at Chora Travel did it for us! He arranged all the direct flights on regional airlines like SunExpress and Atlas Air (instead of thru Istanbul on Turkish Air which would have taken more time and cost us more) and put us up in great hotels. For example, Cappadocia Cave Suits in Goreme was simply superb. The tour guides that he arranged for us were extremely knowledgeable and humorous (very important for the 6 hour journey to and from Pamukkale).Even better was when I left a piece of my luggage behind in a restaurant in Kusadesi, Nejo arranged for his sister company CrossRoads Travel to collect the luggage and send it to him in Istanbul. He then sent it back to me in Singapore. Together with sister companies CrossRoads and Shah Mat Travel, I rate Chora Travel the Number One Travel Agency on TripAdvisor.

10 Days of Turkish Wonder. Having searched the web unsuccessfully for a tour that fitted in with our holiday itinerary I came across the Chora Travel site and the amazing Yusuf. Through the interchange of emails initially and on arrival in Turkey, personal contact, my wife and I were subjected to the most amazing 10 days of professional guides, transportation and excellent accommodation. Nothing is too much trouble for Yusuf or his colleagues. Touring such a beautiful country could quite easily be a nightmare particularly language wise, yet everywhere we travelled our guides and accommodation were extremely friendly and even went to great lengths to obtain answers to any queries.Thank you Yusuf and company for providing a lifetime memory.

8 days 7nights tour. Had a wonderful trip. Thanks to chora travel. It was a last minute holiday and yet chora travel accommodated me and my family and arranged everything in 2 days. felt very safe and they were so helpful. Travelled with my 70 year old mom and 6 years old daughter....they were so helpful in managing both of them. Thank you so much for an unforgettable trip.....simply loved it

10 days tour & blue cruise inTurkey. We are a group of 6 pax that have just return home from an enjoyable and memorable tour that was arranged by Yusuf from Chora Travel. We would like to say that from arrival everything was well arranged and well connected including the transfers and internal flights. Kudos to Yusuf who answered all my enquiries promptly prior before our trip there. The blue cruise left us all mesmerised by the beauty of the surrounding islands and beautiful starry nites. Kudos also to the crew members of the gullet. Well done Yusuf and Chora and please keep up the good work!

9 days in Turkey. We were a group of 12 from India who spent 9 days in Turkey thanks to the excellent arrangements made by Chora Travels and Nejo in particular. I had corresponded with Nejo over the internet months in advance and was pleasantly surprised to find all that we had planned being executed with elan. The pick ups were punctual and guides and drivers courteous. Special mention must be made of Eren, our guide from Kayeseri to Kusadasi for her enthusiasm and helpfulness. The hot air balloon ride with Jao Rodrigues was also impressive as was the ride through central Turkey onto the coast. Kemal our Sprinter driver was good company and never did we hear a murmur of discontent from him though he drove hundreds of kilometers. In all a big thank you to Nejo and his team at Chora Travels.

Turkey trip. Back recently from Turkey after spending about 7 days in Istanbul and Kusadasi. We had Chora Travel for the arrangements - tours and accomodations. We were a bit apprehensive, at first of making booking arrangements through internet and what more to pay 30% advance to a company outside our country. But this turned out to be reliable and a pleasant experience with punctual pick ups and smooth arrangements. We thorougly enjoyed the tours and visits and the extra days we had was put to good use in doing a bit of shopping for Turkish items for souveniers and exploring Istanbul ourselves. Thank you to Chora travel for the good arrangements. The English speaking tour guides like Halil (Istanbul), Mustapha (Ephesus) and Yawuz (Pukalale) are very good. I am sorry I cannot remember their Turkish names. Thank you also to Yusuf whom we met on the first day in Istanbul.

Awesome Turkey. We just got back to Mumbai after a very memorable and a fantastic trip to Turkey. A big thank you to Chora travels for the well planned itinerary that they had chalked down for us. It was a well organised trip. We were very hesitant to book through the net, but once when we spoke to Nejo over skype, we knew we were in safe hands. We would like to thank everyone who made our trip so wonderful, the Captains who were so punctual, the guides in Istanbul, Harun in Cappadocia who was very understanding and he went out of his way to get us good bargains, the hot air balloon ride was just an out of the world experience with Joao Rodrigues, Hakan in Kusadasi too was really very good. A big thank you to all of you ,specially to Nejo.Khozema,Mumbai.

Turkey Delights. Just arrived back in South Africa after a fantastic trip. We are so pleased that we found Chora Travel on the Internet when planning our visit to Turkey. We thoroughly enjoyed a trip that was well organised and worked like clockwork. We can definitely recommend Chora Travel to anyone who is looking for a fabulous experience. All our tour guides were good and we never had more than 12 people on a tour, sometimes there were only 5 of us. Yusuf was very insistent that we do a balloon ride, it was spectacular, don't miss it. We had over 100 balloons in the air at the same time following 2 previous days of unsuitable weather. We heard about the unfortunate balloon crash which could put people off taking the ride, but hey, cars crash every day and people still ride in them. I must mention one tour guide by the name,Harun Yalcin from Shah Mat Travel who looked after us in Cappadocia, he was fantastic. He really made that part of the trip special. All the hotels booked for us were outstanding. I wish I could get Yusuf to organise all our overseas trips! It is great to be able to tailor make ones Itinerary and not be tied down to specific starting dates and length of a tour. Flexibility is the name of the game. If we were to go back to Turkey we would definitely do our bookings through Chora Travel.

Amazing Turkiye. A big thanks to Chora travels for making our trip a memorable one...We were a grop of seven including 3 kids...Though i was hesitant to book through the net an overseas trip(we had to send a 30 % advance) i dont regret my decision. Yousuf was really patient and answered my tiniest queries.We did Istanbul,Cappadocia and Kusadasi and Yousuf planned the itinerary so well that we could see a lot in 7 days...Thank you for the excellent hotels with excellent locations....A special mention of Cercaun (Istanbul) and Harun(Cappadocia). Even if we wanted last minute changes or queries Yusuf was just a phone call away....We will surely recommend Chora Travels.....

A Wonderful Tour of Turkey. Our tour of Turkey went very smoothly with Chora travel and the places we visited were amazing. My wife and I were doing Turkey as our Honeymoon and we had a wonderful time. Leading up to the Holiday, I was in regular contact with Yusuf, from Chora, via emails and he was very prompt with his replies and gave some great advise about my original itinerary. I paid a 30% deposit and the remainder in cash $ on arrival.We did Istanbul, Cappadoccia, Ephusus and Pammakule for 10 days. This involved 4 internal flights. One bit of advise if you are travelling from Cappadoccia via Kayseri to Izmir, there is only a direct flight on certain days, otherwise you have to fly to Istanbul and then catch another plane to Izmir. Our dates weren't flexible so we had no other choice, but if you have flexibility rather try and work it so you can have a direct flight.The hotels that Yusuf booked for us were outstanding. I would even say that they were more fancy than what we expected, but we were on Honeymoon so it was well received. Our hotels were 4 star , with one 5 star. If one was to travel on a slightly tighter budget, I would pressume then that the 3 star hotels would be more than adequate.We had private guides and transport in all of the places we visited. The vehicles were of a very high standard ( one mini van was brand new ) and the pick ups at the airports worked very well. Yusuf gave us his cell phone number when he personally met us at our hotel, and he was very pleasant when we phoned with even minor queries... even on a Sunday morning.Our guides were of a very high standard and their English was spot on. Farouk in Istanbul, and Haroon in Cappadoccia were 2 that stood out for us.My parents are planning on going to Turkey in the near future and I will be reccomending Chora travel.

Istanbul and Cappadoccia with Chora Travel. My wife and I recently visited Turkey for a second time. We chose Chora Travel to help with hotel arrangements, local flights (Istanbul to Cappadoccia) and private guides for walking tours. Nejo was VERY helpful to make the arrangements. Hotels were great (Hotel Levni in Istanbul and CCR in Cappadoccia). Our guides were fantastic - very good English and very interested in telling the story of their country. Even when a hiccup occurred (our transfer from the hotel to the airport for our final departure was a bit late) a quick phone call to Nejo on his cellphone and problem solved - quickly! We would recommend Chora Travel to anyone!

The best experience i have ever had... I contacted with Mr Yusuf on last minute for 9 days western Anatolia tour. Even though it was last minute, they arranged my trip perfectly. We were picked up on time from airport and hotels. I did not imagine they could do their jobs like that. My girl friend cant speak English so they gave us multi language speaker guide. We loved all the places we visited. Thank you Chora team. Absolutely recommended!!

Best time un Turkey!. My wife, mother in law and I had a wonderful 8 day trip around Turkey (Istambul, Kusadasi and Capadocia). Everything worked perfectly, on time, very kind and knowledgeable people and excellent transportation. Turkey is definitely a place to visit and the way to do it is with Chora Travel, fantastic value for money and will arrange anything you can come up with while visiting, they are much more than day trips. Thank you very much to all the team in Chora Travel.

Turkish delight 2013!. The word "service" and "punctuality" got a new meaning with the dedication of Yusuf and his team from Chora Travel. No trouble was too much for them - even outside normal working hours - before and during our visit to Turkey. Yusuf and Nejo, your support during the unhappy and unforseen incident (our friend broke his ankle and were hospitalised and needed surgery and all their travel arrangements had to be changed) were truly commendable! Yusuf, thank very much - we appreciate!

The Thompson's to Turkey!. We (Rob and Sue Thompson) have just returned from a whirlwind trip of Turkey in Chora's very capable hands. What a perfect trip it was! Yusuf's arrangements were precision perfect and the itinerary delivered an experience of a lifetime. We would most definitely do another trip with Chora Travel and we plan to do that soonest possible. A brilliant introduction to Turkey and all that it has to offer! Thank you Chora and Yusuf!!

Outstanding organisation friendly trust worthy people a personal touch all the way.. We have literally just completed a 19 day semi private tour of turkey. We were so impressed from the moment we stepped off the plane in Istanbul that every tiny detail of organisation had been thought about and just happened. Our trip had been on planning since last year. Nejo answered e mails promptly and was never flustered by my continual questioning. On arrival we were told that Nejo would be our driver. What we learnt was the reason Chora travel works is because of the honest values of this man and everyone connected to him At all times we were picked up on time all tours were professional with outstanding knowledgable guides. Our guide in Gallipoli was amazing and Huran in capadoccia just a delight. If you want an amazing experience seeing a fabulous diverse country and want peace of mind with organisation Chora travel is the way to go. For Aussies Nejo is " fair dinkum" !

Recomendo 100%. Me and my wife were looking for a good agency for our trip to Turkey. It was our first time and we enjoyed a lot thank to Chora Travel that works profesionaly. Everything was great, we had no problems, we like to go back to Turkey again.

Great Trip, breathtaking. We spent a beautiful 8 days Trip with Chora Travel and Shah Mat. We travelled from Istanbul to Ephes, Pamukkale (a w e s o m e place) and finally accross Capadoccia, Göreme and the unforgetable underground city. I definitely will go back to capadoccia with my GF next time. Our Guide Eren was very friendly and she spent a lot of time explaining everything and responding to our questions for the mural paints. She even took of her time to arrange a Türkish bath in Göreme. Accomodation was good and food was typical. High Service Level I must say. I'm living all year in the hotel, but a night in a cave hotel, that's something different.TOP TOUR!

Great tour operator. We just returned from our trip to Turkey and I felt I had to put in a review right away. We were very happy with Chora Travel - we were well looked after every step of the way. Chora Travel and its affiliates run an organized, and informative operation. We loved the small tours, the tour guides and each and every place we visited. We have already recommended this company to friends. All that and reasonably priced as well. Thank you for a wonderful trip,

Yusuf at Chora Travel is responsive, reliable, pleasant and efficient - superb service!. I was the organiser for a group of four ladies travelling for three weeks in Turkey. Yusuf ensured all details of our transport and accommodations were efficiently planned, booked and executed smoothly, with no hitches at all, during the trip. Yusuf was extremely responsive for months as we planned the trip, and despite my asking endless questions he promptly and patiently replied to everything and graciously made changes when asked. We felt we were in excellent hands and could completely rely on Yusuf. When we met Yusuf and his brother in person they were both charming and continued to be as helpful as possible. Our guide Sirhan was extremely pleasant and did all he could to please us and make the trip as memorable as possible. The accommodations Yusuf suggested were all of good standards. Since we are the kind to enjoy ourselves no matter what, we had a fun few days on the gulet from Fethiye, and thoroughly enjoyed our companions on the sail. The food was terrific and the gulet captain and cook were extremely pleasant and helpful, but the gulet itself and its accommodation and cleanliness were extremely sub-standard - we were quite shocked as were our companions. Perhaps Chora Travel should change gulet operators or demand better from the company they use. We also would have liked a little more opportunity to customise our itinerary (away from the standardised one, to avoid some of the tacky tourist places (e.g. the baths at Pamukkale). We want to thank Chora Travel, but Yusuf in particular, for his outstanding service. Without hesitation, we recommend his service to anyone. We had a marvellous holiday - thanks to Yusuf, who made what could have been complicated and stressful planning, very easy! Thank you Yusuf!

Top of the world!. My wife and I went to Turkey for our honeymoon and we were very thankful that we have chosen Chora Travel to handle our 12-days trip from A-Z! They were so fabulous that we have not even once worry or disappointed. Once there were a misunderstanding on OUR SIDE, we boarded a coach instead of waiting for the guide. To our surprise, few minutes after that, the coach attendant passed his phone to us and Chora's staff was on the line! The staff explained CLEARLY what we should do since we have boarded the bus wrongly. We even get the refund of the bus ticket we paid earlier as according to Chora's staff all bus tickets have already been paid for. We were extremely very impressed with their aptness, quick troubleshooting and efficiency. Chora is very very punctual, their tours and itinerary are also perfect and i must say they are indeed second to none! How i wish all travel agent in the world be like Chora....

Valuable advice and efficient service. My husband and I vacationed in Turkey for about 2 weeks in February, 2013. I usually like to make travel arrangements myself, but didn't have the energy to do it this time around. Enter Nejo at Chora Travel, who provided valuable advice on how to structure our itinerary, where to stay, and what to do. He responded to emails at lightning speed with thorough and detailed answers. After we settled on an itinerary, he and his team made all of the arrangements (2 intra-country flights, 5 hotels, 2 bus trips, 1 private driver, 4 day tours/excursions, and at least 10 transfers between various hotel / bus stations / airport / etc.) and ta-da! I had a customized vacation all ready to go! It was like magic. Each leg of the journey was smooth and every tour / transfer was on time. The transfers were invaluable to us -- it was a relief to stumble off of a plane or bus and find the driver holding a sign with our name on it, ready to whisk us off to our next destination vs trying to figure out the local transportation system or possibly getting scammed by a taxi. In summary, we were very satisfied with Chora Travel and would recommend Nejo and his team to anyone in need of travel services in Turkey. My parents have also booked through Nejo for their trip in October, 2013 and are looking forward to the experience!

BEST TOUR OPERATOR IN TURKEY-CHORA TRAVER. A family happy holidays and happy home with Chora Travel- Istanbul .Appreciated with theirs excellent service operating skillful and proffessional tour teams covered all the areas in Turkey.No worries whenever you encountered,excellence arrangement by Mr.Yusof Ozen the tour teams are always on time be there made the itineraries smoothly went through with theirs hospitalityservices made the journey safe ,realiable and enjoyable. Thanks so much withthem each sector tour guides and private driver.

Remarkable & Unforgetable time with Chora. Experienced a well planned tour, humorous & charming tour guide, punctual departure, great choice of accomodations, worth the spend. The only regrets would have been lenghtening the tour for better quality of travel. Visited Ankara, Cappadocia, Konya, Pamukkale, Kusadasi, Canakkale, Antalya and etc. Will definitely not missing the chance to come back again to create another remarkable memory with Chora.

Excellent time with Chora. We a group of 4 couples had a great experience with Chora Travels. They were prompt in their timings and had excellent and jovial guides. They accommodated our choices of places to no qualms. we visited Istanbul, Cappadocia, Kusadesi, Pammakkule and the surounding areas.I would definitely recommend it. One bit of advise to the salesmen & reataurants(about 20% of them) in Turkey...we are regular travelers so don't try and fleece us... we know it...and you will loose your business...cos we just walk out. To all intending travelers to Turkey...you will find ease and convenience like we did with Chora Travels.

Turkish Delight. Have just returned from a 10 day tour booked through Chora. We opted for the free and easy at istanbul and a guided tour in Cappadocia and Ismir. Yusuf is very prompt on enquiry and did his best to accommodate our request. Upon arrival at Istanbul there was a slight hip cup on picking up however it was resolved quickly and we were comfortably transfer to the hotel. We were offer a free guided Bosphorus tour and very happy with Sergen. He speaks well and we get alot of information from him during the tour.During our 2 day tour in Cappdocia, Harun our tour guide did a fantastic job. Not only is he knowledgeable, he was able to make my history lesson so interesting and on top of it he is caring as he lookout of possible danger while we tour the region on foot. He make sure the path is safe before us. We are really impressed. Thanks again Harun. Credit goes also to the driver who give us a comfortable ride throughout.While we were in Pamukkale and Ephesus our guide is equally efficient. In all, we are very happy to have chosen Chora and would strongly recommend anyone who want to visit Turkey.Thank you Yusuf for making it one of our memorable holiday.

Turkey highlights. Did a last minute booking with Chora and was pleasantly surprised that they managed to arrange the trip over the New Year period. The guides that Yusuf arranged were informative and pleasant and at times humorous. Most importantly Yusuf was very responsive to my queries and request. My family enjoyed the trip very much.

Istanbul thanks to Chora Travel. Me and my husband were thinking to visit IStanbul since a while. We use to travel a lot during these last years but to be honest, we were little afraid to approach Istanbul by ouserlves, with any knowledge of the language and being so huge city,We contacted though several agents and we decided to book with contact referent of Chora Travel. She was somehow able to make us feel at ease and safe. She also transmitted us a enthousiastic feelings towards Istanbul and Turkish Culture in general. We agreed an indvidual solution for 7 days stay in Istanbul, including 2 daily tours with private guide and some nice extra (hammam and turkish night cruising the Bosphorus). All the services were excellent from our arrival at the airport, we immediately felt home somehow, like we were going to pay to visit to some relatives or friends. Some delay it's easy, almost normal in Istanbul where lot of differences live all together, where somehow we had the chance to smell past, present and future. Thanks to Chora Travel team, we will surely come back to visit other regions in Turkey.

"Sanza infamia sanza lode" - could be better. I went visiting Istanbul and Kappadokia (Northern and Souther major actractions) with a short but intensive trip, organized on request over 4 nights stays and 3 full visiting days, and with all the services and accomodations directly managed by this local tour operator, that we contacted from Italy. I booked all the services by a single contact point (an Italian Tourist Agent, living in Istanbul and working as freelance tourist guide for ChoraTravel) and we arrived with no major issues at the hotel in Istanbul, directly from the airtport with a private car, that was waiting us after the landing. Unfortunately, despite the information received prior leaving Italy, at the arrival at the hotel no one from Chora Travel was waiting us at the hotel or contacted us somehow, so I had to contact the single contact point by myself, in order to define schedules for the day after. The appointment has been fixed at 9.00 a.m. for a guided tour in Istanbul city: our guide (the single contact point in that case) arrived half an hour later with no advice, and we had to contact her by ourself again. The rest of the day went almost fine, apart a long stop (pretty an hour!) at the Chora Travel agency offices, to receive payement receipts and to pay for the air balloon booking. The second day we moved to Goreme in Kappadokia, with an internal fligth. We arrived as per the schedules with no issues, but again with no information provided by our single contact point about the person who was expected to meet that day there. Our private driver arrived later (about an hour delay) and the the local organization decided with no advice to change the tour plan for the first day, from the original Northern visit to Souther visit. Again, we had to contact by ourself the single contact point, and require for an explaination on those changes. Unclear the motivations, and very disappointing the trip that day (driver and car not at the level of the price payed). After my complains to the single contact point, third day went and passed very fine: different driver and differt car, the driver very polite and keeping attention to our interests, made that final day a fantastic one, the best over the entire visit in Turkey. Perfectly organized also the air balloon trip, started at the dawn that day, and resulting in a very exciting experience.In conclusion: I cannot say Chora Travel worked bad, but nevertheless the global quality of the services provided was not at the top, until I complained with them. On the other side, they reacted quickly and saved the last day, but honestly they should have payed more attention to the overall organization by the beginning. Considering the high price payed for the non standard tour I bought, I have to rate not fully acceptable the quality. To all of whome are interested in this travel agency, I certainly suggest you to evaluate their offert, but please be aware some difficulties can appear if you do not pay attention.

No worries with Chora Travel. as with most other satisfied customers of Chora Travel, I can only repeat that you won't regret choosing them to organize your trip in Turkey. all the rave reviews they received are most definitely well deserved. particular mention to Yusuf, who besides beings very prompt in replying the e mails, also arranged everything with a lot of thought and care for our convenience and the total holiday experience. Thank you Yusuf.KP Ng, Malaysia

Great Trip Ever. This was the first time our family visited Turkey. After reading several reviews from Tripadvisor.com, I decided to choose Chora Travel, and am glad that I have made a right decision: excellent service, always on time, and great, responsive service. Thank you very much Yusuf.

Everything was excellent from start till end. If anyone is looking for a land tour package to Turkey, I strongly recommend Yusuf and Chora Travel. Our family has traveled far and wide but thanks to the excellent service of Yusuf and Chora Travel, Turkey has turned out to be our best vacation ever. On a scale of 1 to 10, I give them a 9.5 with double thumbs up. Would like make special mention also to the excellent guides we had especially Harun and Serjan. We will surely revisit Turkey and we will surely re-engage the services of Yusuf and Chora Travel.

Everything was perfect from time we arrived till time we departed. Anyone looking for a land tour package to Turkey, I would strongly suggest Yusuf and Chora Travel. My family has travelled far and wide but thanks to excellent service by Chora Travel, my visit to Turkey was our best vacation ever. On scale of 1 to 10, I'd rate them 9.5. Would definitely revisit Turkey and engage Chora again.

Great 15 day trip with Chora Travel. Very positive and good experience, highly recommended..All tours were punctual and on time and the guides gave very detailed explanations, good quality hotels and nice lunch during tourthanks Yusuf & Chora Team!

GREAT TRIP !. My sister and I have just returned from a 10-day vacation in Turkey. We had a great time and would like to say a big thank you to Yusuf and team at Chora Travel. We opted for the semi private tour and the itinerary arranged by Chora suited us well as it gave us a lot of flexibility - we had time to explore on our own and at the same time the small group tours was a good way to make new friends from other countries. Transfers went smoothly and on time. No issues with accommodation, nice hotels! They provided knowledgeable guides with good English. In short, we're happy with their service, professional and attentive. So thanks again Chora Travel, in particular Yusuf, guides Serchan and Harun, and Adem our responsible driver for 3 days who helped with our sightseeing and introduced us to Hamsi sandwich in Kusadasi :)

Istanbul October 2012. We had an excellent experience again - this time I sent my parents to experience the same tour I had last year with my wife. My parents enjoyed Turkey like nobody - they had a blast with the food, with the attractions, loved the cave hotel, the caves in Cappadoccia, the tour in Ephesus, they found Izmir as an unbelievably beautiful place, and of course, Istanbul was simply magic. Thank you!

Joyful moments in every journey. The itinerary planned was very detailed and comprehensive. For a 10 day trip, we got to visit the important landmarks in turkey. It got more interesting as days went by. It was a cosy trip as most of the guided tour was in small groups. We even made more friends during this trip. The hotels recommended by Chora was amazing even though they were 3 star hotels! Overall, I was very satisfied with the trip! Thank you!

Professional service with a personal feel. Chora Travel organized a five-day itinerary for me when I was traveling solo during my last week of a three-week holiday in Turkey. I contacted Chora Travel because they were mentioned by other travelers as the agency that arranged for a stay at Vineyard Cave Hotel in Goreme, Cappadocia region. I also noted the many positive reviews on TA about Chora Travel itself. I appreciated the quick response from Yusuf to the initial inquiry I sent via their website, even though I sent it very late at night. The subsequent e-mail exchanges were no earlier either because I was out and about Istanbul during the day, yet Yusuf promptly responded to all of them and addressed all of my questions. On the first day of the tour, Engin picked me up from the ISG Airport Hotel at 5 a.m. because I would be meeting a group in Taksim, about 40 km away. He even bought me breakfast at a borekcisi on our way to Taksim. Freshly-baked borek and apple tea helped ease my worries about traveling solo for the next few days. In Taksim, I joined a small group for a tour of Gallipoli. RSL Tours, the agency in Cannakale that Chora Travel worked with, was great. We were a van of 12 tourists who had booked the tour with various agencies in Istanbul. The drive from Istanbul (Taksim Square) to the RSL Tours office in Eacebat was about five hours. When the Gallipoli tour ran longer than expected and I missed the ferry to cross the Dardanelles, our RSL Tours guide, Hassan, drove me to another ferry terminal on the peninsula, so that I could catch another ferry instead of waiting an hour for the next ferry at the original terminal. It was great that Hassan was also our tour guide to Troy the following day. Transportation from Canakkale to Kusadasi following the Troy tour was via public buses, Truva from Canakkale to Izmer, then Pamukkale from Izmir to Kusadasi. I was fortunate to have befriended another American family so I did not have to do this leg of the journey on my own. I e-mailed Yusuf regarding some concerns I had about the transportation logistics of this part of the itinerary, and he was very open to my feedback and addressed my concerns.  The following day, when I shared some questions and concerns I had of the arrangements with Crossroads Travel private driver in Ephesus, Yusuf amended the situation and I was promptly refunded. I truly appreciated this level of customer service from Chora Travel; I felt reassured that even though I was traveling alone and far from Istanbul, Yusuf (and any assistance) was only a phone call/text/e-mail away. Yusuf’s openness to feedback and prompt responses to my e-mails demonstrated professionalism with a personal feel. On the next leg of the journey, the bus transportation, again with Pamukkale, as well as the transfer from Kusadasi to Antalya was much improved. T4T travel agency in Pamukkale was very helpful in getting to the right bus on time following a small group tour of Hierapolis-Pamukkale. I was also very happy with the accommodations at Mediterra Art Hotel in Kaleici (old town) Antalya, which Chora Travel booked for me at no extra cost when the original accommodations had no room. In Antalya, there was no group tour available for me to join, so Chora booked me an excellent private car driver, Hussein. He not only had an excellent command of English, but also very well-versed in a variety of topics. I enjoyed our discussions during the drive between sites and learned a lot from him about Turkish culture. It was Mr. Hussein who picked me up from the Antalya otogar when I arrived, drive me to the ruins of Perge, Aspendos, and Side, and dropped me off at Antalya airport when I left. It was a joy to explore the ruins on my own instead of being part of a tour group, because I could spend as much or as little time on seeing something without inconveniencing anyone. Upon my return to Istanbul, I was keen on meeting Yusuf in person so I could thank him for the assistance he gave. I had tried to meet up with him in Sultanahmet before I left, we seemed to miss each other every time. Consequently, my entire itinerary had been arranged online and apart from a couple of minor glitches, my five-day itinerary was truly enjoyable. Yusuf went out of his way to meet up with me for a drink on my last night in Istanbul,and was so kind to drop me off at the Metro so I can go to Sultanahmet to meet up with another friend. Because of the help from Chora Travel, Yusuf, Engin, their team, and their travel agency partners in Canakkale, Aydin, Denizli, and Antalya, I had an enriching travel experience in Turkey. I hope to have a return visit soon and plan to have Chora Travel a part of that.

Excellent organisation. We contacted Chora Travel several months before we were going to travel in Turkey. Over that time,between what I wanted to do and with their suggestions we agreed upon an itinerary that suited our requirements.Our trip to Turkey couldn't have been better. Accommodation was fantastic, organised travel arrangements were spot on and the tours that we took in various parts of the country were exceptional.Nero, who we met in Goreme, was very keen to ensure that our on-going arrangements were well understood. Particular mention has to be made of Engin, who picked us up at the bus depot in Istanbul and several days later took us to Istanbul airport for departure. Nero, Engin and the other Chora Travel members that we met could not have been more helpful, friendly and accommodating.Whilst we had a problem with Crossroads Travel in Selcuk when they failed to book us onto a bus to Canakkale, this was not Chora Travel's fault and when we contacted Chora Travel regarding this they compensated us.Having spent almost three weeks in Turkey we couldn't speak highly enough of Nejo and ChoraTravel. Our time in Turkey was great, we saw everything we wanted to see in our time there and Chora Travel took the plane/car/bus time organisation out of our hands.

Best tour I ever had !!!. My friend and I really enjoy our trip in Turkey. We thought of going back there again in different part of Turkey. The tour guide is very knowledgable. We really enjoy our stay in Cappadocia and Ephesus . Coral travel did a gd job in organizing the tour.

Best way to travel Turkey. This was a reunion tour for 4 on the fortieth anniversary of our meeting at university. Never having been to Turkey before, we had no idea where to start with planning the trip, but tripadvisor's great reviews of Chora Travel led us to them. After a lot of back-and forth we ended up with a comprehensively planned, well-balanced 18-day tour which went off without a single hitch. Yusuf was amazingly patient, exchanging literally dozens of emails and meeting us on the first day to go over the plans in detail. He hand-picked the hotels according to our preferences, and they were all fantastic, many with swimming pools which is a great way to wind up a long day of touring. Our guide, Sarjan, and driver, Walid, good-humouredly put up with our incessant questions and requests for deviation from the schedule, and as a result we not only saw the travel highlights, we experienced a lot of local colour and cuisine as well. The gulet trip on the Turkish Mediterranean was a particular highlight, strategically timed to provide some downtime in the middle of an otherwise quite intensive tour. I would recommend Chora without reservation; the only advice I would give is to do some advance research of your own as well. There are so many options it is impossible to do everything, so it is better if you can help Chora slant the tour towards your own personal interests and energy level.

Lovely, worry-free trip in Turkey. My mum and I have just returned from a great trip in Turkey thanks to the guys at Chora Travel. It was smooth from the start with Nejo patiently tweaking our itinerary for our 14 day trip through Istanbul, Cappadocia, Ephesus and Fethiye. All the guides (Eren, Burak, Aşkın) were friendly and knowledgeable and the groups were small so you make friends easily and feel like you are travelling with friends. All our transfers from place to place ran like clockwork, and for once it was nice not to have to worry about anything and just focus on enjoying ourselves. Even though there was a small hiccup in our hotel room booking at Fethiye, it was promptly attended to and resolved by Yusuf (and this was already late in the night after office hours). I really appreciate that we had him as our main point of contact in Turkey – it is great knowing there was someone who was always there to make our trip as smooth and enjoyable as possible.So thumbs up for Chora Travel and I would not hesitate to recommend them for anyone thinking of travelling around Turkey.

5* for Chora Travel. I had an 18 day Turkey adventure booked through Chora Travel. I can say that everything ran smoothly. As a single traveller, I like to have the transfers all taken care of so I don't have to worry. Everything was as it should have been. No hiccups at all.My agent was Nejo and he was very professional. I loved the way he got back to me with suggestions and we worked together.Anyone who has any hestitations about booking through them need not worry at all.For me, one of the great things was that my trip was exclusively mine ie I was not part of a huge tour. I had different people with me on the day trips. I really liked the idea of being part of smaller groups for a day rather than travelling on the same bus with the same people all of the time. As a solo traveller, I got to meet so many interesting people, tourists and locals (on the local buses).In fact one of my memorable experiences was being seated next to a Turkish woman on a local bus. I was suprised how good and effecient they were (I think Australia can take a leaf out of their book). My trip also included local flights.Also, whilst I had a few 1 night stays, they were in between 2 and 3 night stays. Flexibility plus.In general the Turkish people are friendly and helpful. It is a great country with such a rich history. Chora Travel helped me to experience this and so much more. It would be wonderful to find other local travel agents this good - it would make travelling the world so much easier!!

Turkey tour. From first emails Nejo was most helpful and able to answer all queries. He arranged a personalised tour to suit our wishes as to dates and places to see. Yousfe helpes out with our hotel and Engin did a great job driving. Engin was eager to meet all our wishes and suggested some good lunch stops as well as extra sightseeing. I would be happy to use Chora again in Turkey.

Gallipoli day trip from Istanbul!. I used these guys for a day trip to Gallipoli from Istanbul and they were great! I emailed to enquire about the tour, I have a family member buried at one of the cemeteries there and wanted to make sure I'd be able to visit. Nejo who booked us on the tour was great, answered all my questions for the booking and advised to send the information for my family member and would organise the visit even tho we were on a group tour. When we got to the main hotel the manager had printed the information of my family members grave and had arranged for the guide to help me find it. The guide was very informative and had loads of information, him and driver were both lovely... It's a long day, pick up at 6.30am and drop off around 9.30pm but it's well worth it! Book with these guys, you won't regret it!!!!
Excellent way to travel in Turkey. I had wonderful experience traveling with Chora. I travel alone with my little daughter, so security and flexibility were important. Transfers and tours super !!!.

BY FAR THE BEST WAY TO EXPERIENCE TURKEY. Forget about impersonal coach tours! If you want an experience to remember you cannot do any better than a small private tour with Chora Travel. Our group of four adults recently enjoyed a fantastic holiday with this wonderful company. From the earliest emails right through to our last day in Turkey the emphasis was on what we wanted. Hence our itinerary was personalised but with built in flexibility that allowed us to take advantage of opportunities that arose throughout our travels. Even so, the holiday went off without a hitch - all transfers were on time, as were our pre-arranged guided tours and the hotels (mainly small boutique style) were exactly what we wanted. I cannot sing the praises of Nejo and his staff highly enough - their professionalism and attention to detail is second to none. Similarly, Chora's team of drivers and guides cannot be faulted. For the whole 2 weeks the four of us felt that it was like holidaying with some long-time Turkish friends whose genuine warmth, sense of humour and friendliness helped us to better appreciate what it is that makes Turkey such a special place. We were fortunate to have Nejo with us for the whole time. What a fun-loving, caring and affable person! He quickly appreciated that we weren't interested in just the usual tourist destinations and throughout our time with him introduced us to some wonderful traditions which gave us a better understanding of the Turkish people and their culture. Simple activities like eating at small family roadside "restaurants" and meeting the local people were very special indeed. Needless to say, at the end of our holiday with him it was like saying goodbye to a good friend - a sad departure but we are hopeful of returning some day. And who will we use for our next Turkish adventure? Nejo and his fabulous team at Chora Travel, of course!

Marvellous, beautiful people. A lovely place to visit, enjoyed every moment from the day we landed till departed. Well guided by burc, our tour planner. Had selected lovely places to visit other than Istanbul, (pamukale and capadocia). Being vegetrian, had little issue getting food @ pamukale and capadocia, but was manageable. In capadocia, if you enjoy trekking, please take trekking shoes.......Special thanks to Burc, for making perfect arrangements and organising our tour....

A Trip To Remember. As a group of four adults we have recently completed a 16 day private tour in Turkey with Chora Travel. From beginning to end everything went smoothly. Our communications with Nejo via email helped us to decide on an itinerary that we were happy with and allowed us to create the flexibility we wanted. Whilst Nejo oversaw our holiday, in some places we had a guide and a driver for the day, at others a driver and at others the time to explore ourselves. The itinerary was also flexible enough for us to make some spur of the moment decisions. All transfers and pick ups were punctual and all hotels were well chosen for their location, friendliness and cleanliness? All guides and drivers were knowledgable and professional but with a much appreciated warmth and sense of humour.We especially appreciated our guide in Gallipoli whose keen interest in the events gave us some very interesting insights to consider. Overall, we were given a very positive view of Turkey and welcomed by local Turkish communities. Nejo's knowledge helped us, amongst other things, to eat outside the tourist places and experience home style cooking. It was fabulous to experience the cuisine we tasted , the marvellously preserved ancient sites , lwhich could rival many places in the world , and for an understanding of the customs. Our guides in Gallipoli, Ephesus , Aphrodesias, Permakale and Cappadocia left us all more enlightened about Turkey's past and Turkey today. Nejo's genuine belief in the value of Turkey and it's culture is an added bonus and he shares this more as a friend having a conversation than a guide giving a lecture. We thoroughly recommend the private tour and hope we will be back some day.We thoroughly recommend Chora Travel.

Heartfelt Thank you from South Africa. HI we would like to Thank Yusuf Ozzen and Chora travel for making our trip to Turkey a memorable experience. This was our first trip to Turkey and we were a liitle apprehensive but all worked out well.Thank you Yusuf for your patience from the beginning when we were unsure about our iteneary.The hotels were clean and neat and also centrally located and this was to our advantage.We would like to also say a heartfelt Thank you to all our Guides and drivers who were friendly and professional.I would definitely recommend Chora travels to all my friends and family from South Africa seeking to visit Turkey.Thanking youAadilla Nagdee
Chira travel is the best travel agency for Turkey trip.. Chora travel are very good in commitment and punctuality. That is how they made my trip wonderfull. Full marks to chora travel.

Great team of travel agents. I was in Turkey between August 22-August 30th 2012. This was a last minute trip . I had planned to meet up with my sister and travel with her . I was fascinated by Capadocia and Ephesus and was eager to explore these historical sites thus I wanted to be able to explore them in the little time we had in Turkey. I corresponded with Mr. Nejjo of Chora travels to arrange an itinerary for us. He very patiently tailored fitting plan for us. I did email him several times and made several changes to the itinerary based on my needs and called him several times. He always emailed me in a timely fashion and was able to understand exactly what I needed at all times. The best Holiday experince!. My parents and I are so pleased with the service Nejo had rendered. We booked a 7days trip to Turkey, Konya, Cappadocia and Pamukkale. Beautiful Holidays. Chora travel has arranges for us a tour of two weeks in Turkey. Fantabulous Trip. Two thumbs up for CHORA !Great organization, professional operator, perfect service .... the family had a great time from Kusadaci all the way to Antalya and all places in between! we loved the old city in Antalya and it was a good idea that chora booked our hotel in the area! Responsive, timely. We booked a 10-day tour of western Turkey and Cappadocia with Chora. The entire trip went very smoothly: we were always picked up at the stated time, accommodations were good, Chora remained responsive to my email inquiries before and during the trip. One note: I think side trips to different rug, onyx, leather, etc factories are pretty common. Goods are always vastly overpriced at these facilities, and in general they give off a bit of an uncomfortable vibe as you are dragged through an awkward sales presentation. We were taken on a couple tours during one of the days mid-way through our trip. I emailed my contact at Chora to request that we not be subjected to any more of them, and we weren't, which I appreciated.
Amazing experience. Everything was well prepared and the cost of the package was very good,I would definitely recommend it to my friends.

Great experience in Istanbul!!!!. I want to give Chora Travel five stars for the great experience we had in Istanbul. Everyone treated us wonderfully and we are really happy with everything that we experienced. The city tour was amazing and our tour guide was very informative. He was easy to understand and knew lots of information. If anyone is thinking of doing day tours book with Chora travel, you won't regret it!!

Turkey tour. From our first contact with Yusuf from Chora Travel we were impressed with his ability, prompt replies and his suggestions for our planned tour of Turkey. Burc Bahar (Chora Travel) - the magnificent travel agent. We visited Turkey between mid June 2012 for a 13 day tour which included Istanbul 3 days, Galipolli, Troy, Kusadasi, Ephesus, Pergamon, Cappadocia, Pamukkalle, . It has taken us a while to add our comments about Chora travels. A big Thank you to Burc for being a great travel agent - you will do well in your career, you have great people skills and are very helpful. It did not matter what time of the day or night; Burc from Chora Travel was available to us 24 x 7 on his mobile to answer any queries that we had. I only have good things to say about Chora Travels; these guys are professionals; they know exactly what they are doing. Right from the time we landed in Turkey till (13 days after) us boarding the plane back home everything was like clock work. I do not know how they do it but it all seems like a supercomputer managing our tour itinerary. Initially we were not sure about booking our tour online with someone you dint know, but thanks to the many reviews from tourists, it gave us the confidence to go ahead and do it online. Turkey itself was just amazing, my total outlook about Turkey changed after this visit. I will surely love to visit again. This trip was made memorable through Chora travels and the way Burc Bahar organised our accommodation, travels etc. Always right on time to pick us up in the morning. They were very considerate and more importantly made us feel at home and we felt safe, especially travelling with a 3 year-old.I would highly recommend Burc Bahar from Chora Travel to anyone wishing to visit Turkey.

Excellent tour agent who makes the effort. Like many others, Yusuf handled our arrangements from start to end. He was always available to attend to our needs and requests.You tell him what you would like to do and how much time you have, he'll make all the arrangements for you and ensure you are more than satisfied. We deeply appreciated the speed at which he gets to work and gets things done.On our first day of arrival in Istanbul, we had an airport transfer waiting for us to bring us directly to our hotel without any other stops. Amazing-Stunning-Turkey. Chora travel is the BEST. Yusuf was so patient and informative and quick to respond to my many changes once we had finally decided on a 16 day holiday to Turkey. What a great decision we made in both Turkey and using Chora Travel. From the moment we landed in Istanbul, our every need was catered for. I was very apprehensive booking via the internet, but once arriving at Chora's comfortable office and arriving at our lovely hotel, The Gulhane Park Hotel, I felt reassured that I had made the right decision. All our day trips in Istanbul were very informative and we enjoyed the days with Baruk our guide. Our hotel in Kusadasi was quite unbelievable with a 180 degree sea view, we could have spent another day here. We had a lovely day trip in Ephasus. and Pamukkale including the ancient town of Hierapolis. Our Blue Cruise was unbelievable with the most amazing staff of husband and wife, Captain Yusuf and Fathima - a wonderful cook and Hussain, the deck hand, as well as the great company we enjoyed - we were really lucky to get such a great bunch of people. Antalaya and Perge was a lovely, unexpected experience and then onto Konya and Goreme (Cappadocia) in a private car enjoying the scenery and drive. Erin was our lovely guide in Goreme for 2 days and was well informed on the vast history that we experienced here. Then it was back to Istanbul. All of this amazing trip would not have been possible if it wasn't for the great arrangements made by Yusuf Ozen. All the guides on the various day trips were well informed and accommodating. Next time I visit Turkey, we would like to explore the Black Sea and Eastern side of Turkey and would without a doubt use Yusuf at Chora Travel.

Awesome Travel Agent. Our july family vacation was planned for Turkey, but we wanted to sightsee more than the usual travel agents had to offer but at the same time be flexible to accommodate the 6 children we were traveling with.After sending out enquiries to a few Turkish travel agents the quick and effecient response I received from Chora Travel was what helped make my decision . Considering we were travelling with 6 children ranging between the ages of 13 to 1years, these two really made every effort to make sure our journey was comfortable and obligingly made stops whenever we needed. Yusuf called regulary to check up if we were all well and needed anything. 1 week in Turkey. Beautiful Istanbul. My holiday plan to Istanbul was to see all the great historical sights and also to meet friends. So I had to make sure that my family will enjoy our stay. Yusuf was indeed efficient and friendly. We enjoyed all our tours; the guides were very well-informed, courteous and helpful especially Burak Kabas. He was wonderful! We truly appreciate his excellent service, in fact we felt like we were sight-seeing with an old friend :)Asur Hotel, where we stayed was very clean and comfortable; the staff polite and helpful. Great time in Turkey. I and a friend had a great time in Turkey from the 2nd until 14th of July 2012. It was made possible with the help of Chora Travel, especially by the agent, Burc Bahar. Great experience tailor-made to us. How does one fit hundreds of travelers with different itineraries, different arrival times, different preferences, etc and make their trip memorable? Turkey 12 Days Chora Travel. It was challenging to pack 11 destinations including a half day boat cruise in 12 Days but Chora did an excellent job. Yusuf who did the arrangement was very responsive. For anyone deciding to travel from Istanbul to Canakkale by car, it's a 6 hrs journey plus traffic conditions in Istanbul so starting early is more ideal.

The best travel experience we've had. My Son & Daughter surprised us with an all expenses paid trip to Turkey through Chora Travel. Where do I start? fantastic trip thanks to burc!!!!!!. we went to Istanbul for a short trip but after speaking with burc we extended our holiday Burc arranged me and my family various trips including a 4 day tour seeing fantastic sites in Gallipoli Pammukale and Epheusus. Burc. was an amazing trip thanks burc :) will do it again sometime, such amazing things to see was gorgeous

4 days tour in Turkey. We asked for a 4-day tour in Turkey- Gallipoli, Troy, Pammukale and Epheusu. The contact from the agent was very good and overall we are very happy for the tour. The hotels we stayed were of 4 stars and very clean and tidy. The tour guide for Gallipoli was brilliant and very knowledgable about the war. He gave us a very different perspective about the war compared to what we heard at home (we are Australians). Highly recommended to be guided by him again for the same tour.The only thing we were not so happy about was that during the 4-day tour, we were taken to the carpet factories twice. If once, we are okay with it as supporting local business during low tourist season is important. However twice in 2 days was a bit too much for us. We would like to fly back to istanbul in an earlier flght instead of the latest one of the day because we were taken to a carpet shop and a leather shop!

14 day tour everything we asked for, but needed an extra day. We did the 14 day tour around Turkey, including Istanbul, Troy, Ephesus, Pamukkale, 4 day boat cruise and Cappadocia. First up, this was an excellent tour and we had a fabulous time. We saw everything we wanted to and felt very comfortable traveling around. Something which may not be clear when looking at the website, this is not a bus tour where you get on a bus and travel with the same people the whole time. It's more like a backpacker tour without all the work. Most of the attractions are handled by different companies and traveling from one destination to another is either by local bus, plane or tour guide. For us, this was the perfect combination of both worlds. We still had the freedom to do our own thing in the evening, but still met many great people and discovered much more about the various sites than we may have done on our own.Perhaps if we had realized up front the flexibility this type of tour offered we would have been more willing to modify it before hand. At one point in the tour we travel from Demre to Olympos to Antalya to Cappadocia. The bus ride from Demre to Olympos is part of the Blue Cruise portion. We thought the boat was dropping us off at Olympos. We did know about the bus to Antalya and then taking the overnight bus from Antalya to Cappadocia. In hindsight, wish we had either booked a night in Olympos or Antalya, to break up all the bus travel, or opted to take the flight option from Antalya to Cappadocia. We arrived in Cappadocia around 7am, extremely tired and hungry. And we couldn't check in to the hotel until 10am, which is normal, but still made for a difficult day. Personally, I think the best option would be to travel straight to Antalya from Demre and take the flight option, spend an extra night in Cappadocia, wake up fresh the next day, take a horse back ride, rent an ATV or hike some of the local valleys. There is a lot to see in Cappadocia and an extra day wouldn't be a problem. One last head's up. Bring your own towel for the boat cruise. This is standard for most boat cruises of this size but I forgot and had to buy a towel in Kas. Overall, we had an excellent time. Yusuf was extremely helpful, even driving us to the airport at 5:30 in the morning!! Thanks Yusuf for organizing a great trip!

Private?.....not private. My friend and I booked "8 day Istanbul, Cappadocia, Konya, Pamukkale, Ephesus by plane and private car" through Chora Travel. Nejo was very prompt in replying to our emails and remarkable in organizing our trip. The only problem I had with the tour is that it was NOT private. In Istanbul, we had a private tour with Burak who was excellent and extremely knowledgeable. Engin was prompt and an excellent driver. The problem came when we went to Cappadocia. Our tour was a group, some English speaking, some Spanish speaking, with two guides. We actually learned more from the Spanish speaking guide than the English speaking one. Two other sets of people on parts of this tour were also under the impression that they had booked a PRIVATE tour. The drive to Konya...well the driver did not speak English or any other language the four of us on the minivan tried (remember I was travelling with one friend). In Pamukkale, not private. In Ephesus, we were led about by Zeti (excuse if the spelling is wrong) and a blue umbrella. Decidedly NOT PRIVATE. I have never had to follow an umbrella on a PRIVATE tour. However knowledgeable the guides, however wonderous the sights, however efficient the organization, I was utterly disappointed that it was NOT a private tour. They need to take the word PRIVATE out of the description.

Unforgettable trip to Turkey. Like many others I found Chora Travel by pure chance on the net. As my cousin and I had litle time to prepare for our trip we researched where we wanted go and then gave Nejo a rough outline. Nejo was very patient as we altered our requirements and our final itinerary was excellent. Our subsequent trip fulfilled all our expectations and beyond. I am not saying that all our accomodation was perfect and up to the 4-star standard we had been promised. There were a couple of hiccups mainly due to sub-contracted firms and a fairly scary local bus ride but on every occasion help and reassurance was only a phone call away. Yusuf in Istanbul was a great help. A total highlight of this trip were the two days we spent with a car and driver organised by Nejo to take us from Goreme to Konya and down to the coast at Olympe. The trip was made totally memorable by the courtesy, charm and patience of our chauffeur - we will never forget him. Our gulet trip was also a magical time but then we always seemed to be reaching for superlatives as each experience unfolded. I am now in the middle of planning another trip in Turkey and Nejo is once again being very patient with my queries. First time travellers to Turkey especially can feel very confident that Chora Travel will try their best to make their trip a true taste of Turkey.

Istanbul means Chora Travel. I had my annual leave, and no idea where to go. And finally Istanbul. I email many Travel agents but only Chora Travel replying my email. 5 days in Istambul was unforgettable, I just ask them to set up everything on our very short vacation. Excellent programs, very good tour guide, Thank you Mr.Engine,Mr.Burak and others tour guides ( I'm sorry I can't remember all ).And also Mr. Yusuf Thank you for making my dreams about Istanbul came true.To all people going to Turkey, Highly recommended to contact Chora Travel.

chora travel. I would highly recommend Chora Travel. I had no idea where to start when it came to my Turkey holiday. So after surfing the net I find Chora Travel and took a gamble on their company. What a great decision that was. I sent Nejo the number of days we had in Turkey and a rough idea of where we wanted to go. So he came up with a great intinery for us. We had a mixture of private driver and bus tours all of our accommodation, transfers and drivers were prompt and enjoyable. We meet Mr Yusuf Ozen on our arrival in Istanbul and had contact with him during our stay nothing was to much trouble for him he was very efficent and friendly.I must give a special mention to Burak Kabas he was our tour guide on three separate occasions whilst in Instanbul. He was prompt, knowledgeable and very friendly. He made our visit to this incredable city of Instanbul even more memorable. My travel party consisted of my sister and my 70year old mother. We travelled to Istanbul, Gallipolli, Kusadasi, Pamukkal and Cappadocia. As three women travelling alone we felt very safe and knowing that we could call on Yusuf if we needed to was very comforting.So I would like to thank all of the staff at Chora Travel for making our holiday to Turkey very relaxed and trouble free. I wish your company all the very best for the future. Jackie Russell

A Memorable Trip!. My first travel agency was a disaster... I almost lost hope... But one day, I was surfing the net when I accidentally saw Chora Travels... I checked it out and tried to send a message... It was really amazing that they replied immediately and were very willing to handle our trip... Mr. Yusuf was very helpful and he was able to organize our tour with the very little time that I gave him...Being quick in replying and organizing is one thing... Providing a well-organized and smooth trip is another... And Chora Travels met all of those characteristics very well... Whenever I look back and assess our tour, I can never find a fault with anything regarding the services that Chora Travels provided us... The hotels were amazing, the airport transfers were efficient, the tour guides were very nice and knowledgeable, and Mr. Yusuf himself had been helpful every step of the way...That Turkey trip was my first vacation abroad and Chora Travels made it very memorable... Istanbul tour. I'm glad I chose to do my tours with Chora. They did exactly what I asked for and were very efficient. Always arrived on time when it came to transfers and the tour guide (Borac) was very knowledgeable and friendly and very patient with us as we were travelling with very young kids and an elderley person, so thanks for your patience Borac. I would definitely recommend booking tours with these guys, very reliable. Thanks Yusuf.

Chora Travel Superb Tourist Operator. It was not easy to choose trustworthy and good serviced tourist operators thru internet from many agencies, until we found Chora Travel, organized by Mr. Yusuf Ozen which seemed to match our expectation. He has arranged the itinerary agreed package (6 Days Tours for Istanbul, Ephesus, Pamukkale, Kusadasi) with additional two days as our choice. With Chora travel we had enjoyed unforgettable memories for our travel in Turkey by their professionalism and friendliness. Yudi-Mila-Zenith-Reinaldo-Reimundo. Indonesia living in SA.

Chora Travel...Excellent!. Chora Travel is excellent! Yusuf was extremely helpful in planning our itinerary to Turkey and put together for us a great trip. Tours were wonderful, prompt and organized. Excellent guides and I am especially greatful to our drivers, who were prompt, friendly and very helpful.I would recommend Chora Travel to anyone who is visiting Turkey for the first time.

well-coordinated trip. Almost everything went smoothly during our trip to Turkey thanks to this wonderful travel agency! From the time we got picked up at the airport by their pleasant driver Engin to each and every transfer from one city to the next (all in all, 6 cities), to the choice of hotels and day tours, to the very last day when they take us to the airport -- not one major inconvenience. They are extremely accommodating and their coordination with every person involved in our tour like the driver, the guide and the hotel people was very efficient. Except for one particular tour guide, we enjoyed the tour guides and companies they selected. Their managers Yusuf and Nejo can be reached anytime of day for whatever questions we had. I highly recommend booking your Turkey trip with this agency.

“Highly Impressive Trip Advisor - Burc Bahar”. My Husband and I planned to visit Istanbul for a couple of days and its a must say, the most top listed memory we ever brought back home is the few moments we spent with our Trip Advisor - Mr. Burc Bahar. We had no plans to take a tour package and always had the misconception of being over priced doing it through any travel agent. As we strolled through the Tourist hub, Sultanahmet, we spotted this Travel Agency, not so flashy and not so noticeable. We were greeted by this wonderful person and right from the first word to the foremost, we felt like home and us, who did not even have a plan of how to spend our rest of the days in Istanbul got out so relieved and happy. We visited Cappadocia and Pammukkale which were miles away and we were able to get there without any hassle only through his intelligent coordination as language was indeed a great drawback for us, not many could speak english. Knowledgeable, Professional, Accommodating. I have been booking my own hotels and flights for the last 25 years, and I am good at it, but it takes a lot of work and research. In Turkey, based on Tripadvisor recommendation, I had Nejo from Chora travel (aka Daily Istanbul Tours) create a custom tour for us. Nejo made changes to the standard 9 day tour, and was flexible with the changes and fair and honest with pricing.Nejo booked all our hotels, flights, airport transfers and 4 different day tours.I could not have asked for better hotels - see my reviews for Vineyard in Goreme and Valide Sultan Konagi in Istanbul. Nejo found a flight from Cappadocia to Ephesus, which flies only twice a week, that was not on any of US airline search engines.The tour of Istanbul, and 2-day tour of Cappadocia were run by Chora and were superb. Adem, in Cappadocia, was knowledgeable, charming and accommodating. Burak in Istanbul was knowledgeable and went out of his way to please everybody. Both tours were just 6 people.Unfortunately, there were issues when Chora subcontracted to others. Crossroads Travel in Ephesus picked us up from hotel, and had us wait in the plaza for 1 hour 20 minutes for the rest of group (24 people total) to join us.Tur-ista tour in Istanbul started disastrously – English tour guide did not show up for the first 30 minutes, so we just followed Spanish and Russian guides. Fortunately, once I spoke to Nejo, he immediately organized a private tour for us, that was, again, great. Burak has encyclopedic knowledge of Istanbul and was more than happy to share it.So, as long you get Chora staff, you can’t have a better tour of Turkey.

Excellent trip... loved it!!. It was a great trip arranged by Chora Travels. thank you Yusuf Ozen. They took care of everything - we had young children with us so the guides were extremely accommodating and friendly. One of our requirements was vegetarian food and it was taken care of. The trip was paced in the manner we wanted and everything was perfect. We did the following trips - Istanbul walking tour, Cappadocia 2-day tour which were amazing. Thank you for making our holiday so memorable.

Couldn't ask for better. Chora was wonderful in arranging all tours, transportation, and lodging. We could call them at anytime when plans changed and problems were averted immediately. Personally i would have taken out a few stops because of personal taste. A must...all of Istanbul on a walking tour, Cappadocia for at least 2 days which really wasn't enough because it was full, Pamukkale but don't stay...take a night bus to next destination, and Ephesus add a day off in the hotel to admire the scenery in Izmir. The hotels we chose were 3-4 star and were fine, 5 star not needed for as busy as we were plus it felt like i was a family member. All guides were above and beyond. Thumbs up for this travel agency!

Fantastic trip!. Thanks so much Nejo and Chora Travel - having been very happy with how you assisted us with our 1st trip to Turkey, the opportunity arose to go with our adult children and partners to Istanbul and Cappadocia in a group of 9. No easy feat to organize but we loved your suggestions, flexibility and generous time spent in organizing things to suit our needs. All our children loved it and we fell in love with Turkey again. Thanks so much

Chora Travel. If you are thinking about going to Turkey and seeing all the fabulous sites then book with Chora Travel. They took care of all touring details which included hotels, meals and travel which was by car, bus and plane. We went in a hot air balloon above Cappadocia and saw fairy castles and stayed in a cave motel with the nicest hosts, we traveled to Pamukkale and swam in Cleopatra's pool and walked on travatine tiles near thermal pools and then to Efes and to a wonderful hotel and a visit to the Virgin Mary's house. Our favorite trip!. We booked our trip to Turkey with Nejo, who is now working at Chora Travel, in May of 2010. Our most magical trip ever. I met Chora through another colleague who travelled to Turkey 6 months earlier. We took exactly the same tour and hotels she did. The location of the hotel in Istanbul (Gulhane Park) was privileged; the cave hotel in Cappadoccia (Taskonaklar in the Dove Valley) was gorgeous - a one in a lifetime experience - the air balloon travel in Capadoccia was unforgivable. Turkey is facinating and you need a good agency to make sure you see the best parts.. Look, research, work out what you want to do . . .then present it to Nejo for suggestions, advise and a quote. Then be guided by what he suggests . . . . He genuinely wants your individual experience of Turkey to be a positive and happy one.My Husband, my girlfriend, and I wanted to add a trip to Turkey after our tour of Italy in 2010. We did not want a big tour, but did not know what type of travelling we could do in Turkey or how to go about booking. I looked through trip advisor, Lonely planet, eyewitness travel and after much reading decided to try Elite travel, which is managed by a efficient and delightful man called Nejo. ( now Chora travel http://www.choratravel.com/ )Nejo took into account all my ideas and made many suggestions regarding an itinerary, sights to see, accommodation and tours that would work for the time we had and the places we wished to see. We did not want a big tour or the real touristy destinations, all the time. We wished to experience some of the culture and meet the people whenever possible, but in comfort. We decided to have Nejo organize a hire car and a driver. He suggested we choose a larger air-conditioned car, which we appreciated. The driver paid for the tolls, parked, picked up, waited, and organized our timing, which made the entire tour an unhindered delight.Roads were in good condition when we travelled in 2010. However, Turkey is HUGE.One thing I would have done different is the time we allocated to travel. I would have allowed more time to have impromptu stops to look at things of interest on the way.(Nejo did suggest this to me through his email contact, but we were limited with our time) Sometimes there was 5 hours driving in-between our destinations. Highlights Corresponding with Nejo, who Loves his country and is prepared to share his time and extensive knowledge with humor and extreme patience.Staying in the Sultanahmet area of Istanbul. Laying amongst the pillows outside of an evening, eating. Walking & looking. . . .you could spend days here. Istanbul walking tour, with Sonar as our guide. (Topkapi palace,Harem,Blue mosque,Hagia Sophia, Basilica cistern were all fascinating)Trip on the Bospherus to see buildings. Grand Bazaar. Spice marketsGallipoli – this is a must see experience. Very emotional.Troy. Don’t miss the Terrace houses in EphesusRest in Hot water spa in Pamukkale at night time. Walking up the cotton candy cliffs of Pamukkale. Hierapolis bathing pools.Shopping in Selcuk at night. We Visited the Black sheep carpet place. Moonlight silver shop. Visiting a caravansary at night, to see the whirling Dervishes. Early morning Ballooning in Cappadocia. Sunrise and ChampagneStaying in the Anatolian cave houses – unique and beautiful.Turkey is a wonderful country and Chora travel does ensure you have an exceptional experience.Please give my very best wishes to Nejo . . . . Cheers,Sharon,Cameron & Ann Queesland Australia

Very efficient service. We organised our 5 days in Turkey last September through Yusef at Chora Travel. Our initial queries were answered very quickly. Further emails were also prompt and helpful.
